140b2(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po rab tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dang por re shig rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gang zhig/ pad+ma rab tu zab pa'i dkyil 'khor ram/ pad+ma rgyal po gang yang rung ba'i dbang dang gnong ba thob pas/ rtsa ba'i sngags la bsnyen
140b3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'bum phrug gsum skyong naste/ slob ma rjesu bzung bar 'dod na/ gnas dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i sar/ slob ma nI dad pa dang snying rje dang shes rab che ba/ 'khor ba la skyon du mi lta zhing mang du thos pa/ bla ma la gus shing theg
140b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i chos la the tshom med pa/ khyad par du nges pa'i don dang / spyan ras gzigs la mos shing dbang po rno ba'i gang zag des/ bla ma la gsol ba bdebs pa ni/ sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas kyi// pad ma'i rigs kyi
140b5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dang // pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor tshon po ru// pad+ma'i dbang bskur zhu bor bgyi// de nas bla mas gnang ba sbyin pa ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// mi mkhas pa ni 'ching bar 'gyur// mkhas pa rnams ni grol
140b6(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur// sems can dang can smin par byed// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // srid pa'i 'dam las 'di yis brgal// pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// nga yis 'bod kyi yid gnyis spongs// zhes brjod
141a1(rgyud 'grel): cing slob ma bzung bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon gyi dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// pad+ma 'i zla rab tu zab pa dang // pad+ma rgyal po gang gi byed kyang rung ste/ de la drung por sa brtag pa dang / sa bslang ba dang / sna
141a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyang bar bya ba ni/ lto 'phye lA~M dA nas brkos te// sa bslangs nas/ gnas khang dang 'tshemu par si stegs gru bzhi pa byasasau yi lha mo la gtor ma phule tAM/ sa byin gyis brlag// de nas pa'i rnam lnga dang / dr-i
141a3(rgyud 'grel): bzangs kyi chus byug la/ thig gi cho ga lag len bzhin du gdab bo// tshon gyis bri b+ha ni/ tshen kha dog lha ye shes lngar byin gyis brlabs la/ pad+ma zab pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbus kyi lte ba dang phyogs bzhir pad+ma 'dab
141a4(rgyud 'grel): nidamar po la/ mtshams kyi 'dab ma dang gong ras mdzes tshon/ mu khyud la pad+ma'i phreng ba bri'o// pad+ma rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ni// lte ba dmar po la ze'u 'bru dang gong ras ci mdzes/ 'dab brgyad kyi phyogs bzhi
141a5(rgyud 'grel): dmar po mtshams bzhi dang mu khyud rnams mdzes chen du bya'o// de'i rgyob tu pad+ma bad ba brgyad phyogs bzhi phyogs tshon la/ mtshams mdzes tshon du bya'o// de'i phyi rol yang pad+ma 'dab ma bcu dmar po 'om ser por
141a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'am/ lha snam dmar po 'am/ yang na 'khyams phyin chad spyi dang 'dra bar bris la/ rgyan bkram po ni/ bla res dang / yol ba bre/ rten dgram ste/ mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma lnga la sogs pas
141b1(rgyud 'grel): mtha' ma legs par bskor la/ gzhan yang dgos pa rnams gzhung bzhin bsham mo// bum pa gtsang ma la bgegs bskrad pa ni/ gu gul gyis bdug cing khro bo'i sngags bzlas te/ nang du bcung chu gtsang ma dang / sman
141b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / dri lnga dang / 'bru lnga dang / snying po lnga dang / rat+na lA/ 'o ma la sogs pa blug la/ dar ram ras kyi mgul chings dang gzungs thag btags te/ 'bras bu can gyi shing lo rlon pas brgyan pa'i bum pa gnyis la rnam rgyal
141b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi bum pa dang / las thams cad pa'i bum pa dang / dbang gi bum pa la sogs ci 'byor bshams/ nang du lha bskyed la/ mchod pa phul nas/ dbang gi bsnyen pa bya'o// rnam rgyal gyi bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
141b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhago/ las bum gang bder dgod/ de nas rang bstan bde ba la 'dug nas/ bris pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / bum pa'i nang du dkyil 'khor rgyas pa bsgoms/ las bum nang du rta mgrin bsgom pa ni/ hrIHlas rta mgrin
141b5(rgyud 'grel): dmar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ zhal dbus dmar ba/ g.yas dkar/ g.yon s+ho/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba/ rta mgo ljang zhur rdog ma dmyur ba/ rta skad sgrogs pa/ phyag g.yas kha T+wAM gA rtse gsum
141b6(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa/ g.yon no rnge'u chung khrol ba/ bar ma gnyis kyis lha srin sde brgyad kyi tsit+taM'i phreng ba bsnams pa/ g.yas 'og mas zhing dbyug/ g.yon gyi 'og mas thod pa lhung lo can lho ma srin sde brgyad kyi khrag gis
142a1(rgyud 'grel): bkang ba zhal du gsol ba/ zhabs g.yas bskum/ g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ sku smad stag lpags kyi sham thabs byas la/ sku stong zhing lpags kyi g.yang gzhi mnabs pa/ sbrul rigs bzhi
142a2(rgyud 'grel): dbu dang yan lag brgyan pa/ me dpung gi dbus su bzhugs par bsam/ sngags ni/ oM hrIHha ya gr-I ba pad+me ta kr-i ta badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gr-I ba hu lu hu lu sarba pA paM shud+d+he shud+d+he shud+d+he ye hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes brjod pas khro bo'i sku
142a3(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs kyi bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar bsam/ de nas slob ma rnams la las bum gyi phyir khrus bya ste/ nang du btang la maN+Dal phul nas glal la rim par bzhag gi/ de nas gdong g.yogs bcings la/ lag tu ma
142a4(rgyud 'grel): tog bzung la gsol ba gdab bo// de nas bdag nyid dang dkyil 'khor dang bum pa gsum ka mi dmigs pa'i ngang las/ bsod nams kyi sprin kha dog lnga lnga las 'og phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab/
142a5(rgyud 'grel): de yi steng du rnam par shes pa yi ge hrIHdkar po thig le gnyis dang bcas par bsgom/ de las yig 'bru kha dog sna tshogs pa sprin gyi thog tu 'phros pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi 'od zer las
142a6(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i gzhal yas khang chen po// shar shel dkar po/ lho bai DUr+ya/ nub pad+ma rA ga/ byang in+d+ra nI la las grub pa gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi pa/ ka ba dang rta babs bzhis mdzes pa/ rin po che'i pha gu dang / dra ba dra phyed kyis
142b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ ri dwags gdugs/ chos 'khor dang bcas pa mtho ba/ 'dod yon gyi snam bu dmar po la/ mchod pa'i lha mos bskor ba'i nang du/ pad+ma rim gnyis pa'i gdan gyi dbus su yi ge hrIHlas pad+ma nyi ma zla ba'i gdan gyi
142b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus su/ rang nyid thugs rje chen po sku mdog dkar ba/ zhal bcu gcig pa/ rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po/ g.yas ltung ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ de'i steng la dbus ljang khu/ g.yas dmar/ g.yon dkar/ de'i steng ma dbus dmar
142b3(rgyud 'grel): ba/ g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon ljang khu/ zhal de rnams ni/ kun nas zhi ba bzhad pa 'dzum pa/ spyan gsum gsum zhi bas gzigs pa/ de'i steng du khri ba'i zhal nag po/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ dbu skye
142b4(rgyud 'grel): dmar ser me ltar babar ba'o// zhal dgu po ni/ dbu skra nag po la rin po ches brgyan pa'o// zhal nug po'i steng na 'od dpag med kyi zhal dmar po mgrin pa yan chad byung ba/ spyan gsum pa/ gtsug tor dang bcas pa'i//
142b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag brgyad kyi dang po gnyis kyis yum la 'khyud pa thal mo sbyar ba'o// g.yas 'og mas mu tig gi phreng ba/ g.yon 'og ma pad+ma dmar po/ g.yas gsum pas mchog sbyin/ g.yon gsum pas spyi blugs/ g.yas
142b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pas chos kyi 'khor lo// g.yas g.yon bzhi pas pad+ma'i mda' gzhu'o// sku dang yan lag thams cad la rin po ches brgyan pa'o// yum rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sku mdog dmar mo/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ spyan
143a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa/ g.yas kyi zangs gri bsnams pa/ g.yon thod khrag yab la 'khyud pa/ skra grol ba rus pa'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yon yab dang sbyar nas brkyang ba/ g.yas kyis yab kyi
143a2(rgyud 'grel): dar sham grol ba la 'khyud pa'o// yab kyi phyag dgu pa rgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis/ mchog sbyin pa'i phyag mthil la mdzes par gzigs pa'i spyan stong mnga' ba/ sku'i phyag stong dang spyan stong los 'od zer kha dog sna lngas
143a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par khyab par bsam mo// mdun gyi pad+ma la rdo rje phag mo domar mo zhal gnyis ma'i spyi bor phag zhal/ g.yos gri gug/ g.yon thod pa/ mtshan khung na kha T+wAM ga bsnams pa/ rus pa'i
143a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// ga ya su yum chen mo ser mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ g.yas thugs gar rdo rje 'dzin po/ g.yon pa ut+pal gyi steng na pi te bsnams pa/ 'og ma gnyis mnyamaM bzhag mdzad pa'o// rgyab
143a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogasu sgrol ma ljang khu/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ phyag dang po gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyor ba/ g.yas skyabs sbyin/ g.yon 'og mas ut+pa la 'dzin pa'o// g.yon phyogasu yum yi ge drug ma dkar mo zhal
143a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag bzhi'i dang po gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyor ba/ g.yas 'og mas mu tig gi phreng ba 'dzin pa/ g.yon 'og mos pad+ma bsnams pa'o// mtshams bzhir bum pa bdud rtsis bkang ba'i steng du ka pA la re re
143b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bsam mo// lha mo bzhi po dar gyi sham thangs can rin po che'i rgyun dang bcas pa'o// de'i phyi'i pad+ma'i gdan la/ shar phyogasu mi bskyod pa sgyu mdog sngon po/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ dang po gnyis kyis/
143b2(rgyud 'grel): yum mA ma kI la 'khyud pas thal mo sbyar ba// g.yas 'og mas rdo rje/ g.yon 'og mas pad+ma 'dzin po/ zho sa g.yas brkyang ba mAM ma kIs 'khyud pa'o// lho phyogasu rin chen 'byung ldan zhal gcig sngon ma gri gug dang tha~M
143b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhi pa ser po/ dang po gnyis kyi yum sangs rgyas spyan ma'i rgyab tu thal mo sbyor pa/ gi yas 'og mas rin po che 'dzi no na ma gri phug dang thaM pa 'dzin pa'o// rgya bo phyogasu rnam par snang mdzad/ dkar po zhal gcig
143b4(rgyud 'grel): phyog bzhi pa/ dang po gnyis kyis yum gos smye rmi klag d+ha dzin pas yas la 'byung ba dkar mo la 'khyud pas thal g.yan sag mes pa/ mo sbyor ba/ g.yas 'og mas 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// byang phyogasu don yod grub pa ljang
143b5(rgyud 'grel): khu/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi'i dang po gnyis kyis yum dam tshig gi sgrol ma la 'khyud pas thul mo sbyor ba/ g.yas 'og mas ral gri bsnams pa'o// zhab gsan po gams sa g.yas brkyang go yon bskum pa/

144a1(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa zhabs gnyis kyis yab kyi dar sham cung zad grol ba la 'khyud bar bsgoms/ yab kyi g.yon gyi gnyis pa ni pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// mtshams bzhir ni/ mkha' 'gro ma bzhi zhal
144a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag nga po gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyor ba/ g.yas gri khug/ g.yon thed khrig bsnams pa/ sku mdog ni dkar mo dang / ser mo dang / dmar mo dang / ljang khu'o// zhabs g.yas brkyang ba/
144a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon po/ ba'o// de'i phyi'i rgyab pad 'dab bcu'i gdan la/ phyogs bcu'i pad ma rigs kyi sangs rgyas brtsu ba ni/ gser gyi mdog can/ chos gos dmyur ser gsol ba/ phyag na pad+ma 'dab ma spong
144a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan bsnams po/ dbu reg zhabs d+hIn can no// gra bo ni la/ byang shar du 'jam dpal dmar se rA/ g.yas ral gri/ g+ha yon ut+pa la'i steng du po ti bsams pa'o// ra lhor phyag na rdo rje l+h+wa
144a5(rgyud 'grel): khre/ gas sa rdo rje/ g.yon ut+pa la'o// lho nub tu byams pa dmar skyer/ ning gA yas kA shi d+yA/ g.yon ut+pa la'i skyeng na bum pa'o// nr-i byung du sgrib pa rnam par sel ba saur s+thA// ga yo
144a6(rgyud 'grel): nor bu/ g.yon gyis ut+pala'o// zhabs gnyis bzhengs pa/ rin po che dang dar gyis brgyan pa'o// shar sgor 'dod pa'i rgyal po dkar po// zhal gtsog po/ g.yas 'khor lo// g.yon sdigs
144b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jub mdzad pa'o// lho sgor gshin rje bshed ser nag/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag g.yas be con/ g.yon sdigs 'dzub/ nub sgor rta mgrin dmar po/ rta mgo ljang gu/ phyag g.yas pad+ma'i dbyug pa g.yon sdigs
144b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzub mdzad pa'o// byang sgor bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang nag/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag g.yas ral gri/ g.yon sdigs 'dzub mdzad pa/ dbu skra dmar ser 'bar ba/ sbrul rigs bzhis brgyan pa/ sku smad stag gi sham
144b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs can/ zhabs g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum gyis bzhugs pa'o// phyi rol du lha mo me tog ma dkar mo/ bdug spos ma ser mo/ mer me ma dmar me/ dri tshab ma ljang gu/ zhal zas ma dkar mo// sil
144b4(rgyud 'grel): snyan ma zla ba'i mdog can ma rnams kyis gtso bo la mchod par bsam mo// sgo khang du tshad med pa'i lha mo bzhi bsgo mo// bya chad med pa lha ma gar ma dadus gyim mang stsa ta ma ma ma 'a migs kyi kyi ma mang ga 'i lha ma dmar me mas kyi
144b5(rgyud 'grel): snyoms kyi lha mo kun ma gdu'i cha mo lta de'i phyi rol tu rgyal po chen po bzhi ni/ byang phyogasu rnam thos sras ser po/ g.yas me tog u dum wa ra gtso bo la 'bul ba/ g.yon ne'u le'i rgyal ba 'dzin pa'o// shar phyogs
144b6(rgyud 'grel): su yul 'khor bsrung dkar po/ g.yos me tog g.yon pa waM 'dzin pa'o// lho phyogasu 'phags skyes po sngon po/ g.yas me tig g.yon ral gri 'dzin pa/ nub phyogasu spyan ma gaM bzang dmar po/ g.yas
145a1(rgyud 'grel): me tog g.yon sbrul zhag 'dzin pa'o// de'i phyi rol tu ye shes lnga'i 'od kha dog lnga rdo rje'i gur du bsam mo// 'od kyi nang du yi ge drug pa'i gsung gi sgra rang bzhin gyis grag par bsam mo// de nas thu
145a2(rgyud 'grel): kwa'i hrIHlhas 'od kha dog lnga 'phros nas/ 'og min gyi gnas nas ye shes sems dpa' rang bsgom pa dang 'dra ba gcig spyan drangs la mdun gyi na mkhar gzhugs pa la/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba//
145a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i tshigasu bcad pa brjod cing ye shes pa dgug gzhug bya ste/ sku gsung thugs byin gyis bu rlabs par bya'o// de nos lha thams cad gsal btab la snyen pa bya ba ni/ thugs ka'i hrIHla/ oM AHhUM hrIH
145a4(rgyud 'grel): oM ma Ni pad+me hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bA ra hi/ oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI yau/ badz+ra war+Na nI ye/ badz+ri bai ro tsa nI ye hUM phaT/ hU~M ri ni sa hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis bskor baM la dmigs nas bzlas pa bya ba dang / 'od zer
145a5(rgyud 'grel): g+hi phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa phul te/ de rnams kyi byin rlabs rang gi thugs ka'i hrIHla bsdu'o// bum pa'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bsams la/ de dog zhu bas bdud
145a6(rgyud 'grel): brtsi'i chur bsam zhing bsnyen pa bya'o// pad+ma zab pa byed na ni/ sgrub thobs las byung ba bzhin du/ bsgom zhing bzlas par bya'o// cho ga gzhan dag rnams ni 'dra bas thun mong du shes par bya'o// de nas slob ma la
145b1(rgyud 'grel): skyabasu 'gro ba thun mong pa byin la/ sems bskyed pa ni sgrol ma'i rgyud nas gsungs pa/ dkon mchog gsum la sbyangasu mchi// sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags// 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas
145b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub yid kyis bzung // sems can rnams la phan slad du// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// de ltar skyabasu 'gro ba dang sems bskyed la/ yang dam tshig dang sdom pa sbyin pa ni/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge
145b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dun la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabasu mchi// sangs rgyas pad+ma rnams rgyas dang // gsang sngags rgyal ba mkha' 'gro mo// bdag ni rtag tu skyabasu mtsha// byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che// khyad par du yang slob
145b4(rgyud 'grel): dpon la// rtag par bdag ni skye bsu mchi// mgron po spyan ras gzigs dbang po// rnal 'byor ma snang mdzad tshogs// thams cad bdog la dgongasu gsol// bdag ni dus 'di nas bzung ste/ ji srid gnyis med
145b5(rgyud 'grel): la gnas par// de yi tshangs spyod gnyis med pa// nyi shu rtsa gnyis legs par bsrung // zhes khas blang ngo // de nas zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos bshad de ngos shes bskyed pa ni/ rnam snang mngon pang nas gsungs te// 'jig
145b6(rgyud 'grel): rten du ni kun mkhyen nyid// u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin// brgya lam na ni re 'ga' zhi / 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo // gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba// de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste// gang gi sems
146a1(rgyud 'grel): can mnyam med don// mya ngan mi 'dra' byed par nus// bskal pa bye ba du ma ru// sngon chad sdig pa bgyis pa gang // de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba// mthong bas byung bar 'gyur ba na// grags pa/
146a2(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i// tshul la gnas na smos ci dgos// sgrib pa'i gsang sngags bzlas nas ni// go 'phangs bla na med par 'gro/ gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la// blo gros shin tu mi g.yo ba// de dag gis
146a3(rgyud 'grel): ni ngan 'gro'i rgyu// rdzu 'ophrul kun 'byung rab tu bcad// bdag nyid tshon po khyed rnams kyis// rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed// gang phyir rgyal ba sras btsos pa// bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni// bstan pa 'di la khyed
146a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun// yongasu bzung la skye bzhin par// de phyir khyed rnams theg tshon la// dbang bskur ba ru skye bar 'gyur// theg pa chen po tshor 'byung ba'i// lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan// khyed rnams lam 'odar
146a5(rgyud 'grel): bgro ba na// de bzhin gshegs pa rnamasu 'gyur// zhes gsungs pa la/ de yang 'jig rten 'dir sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu dkon te/ dper na me tog u dum wa ra dang budra'o// me tog de gang du skye na/ mtsho
146a6(rgyud 'grel): ma dros pa'i byang phyogs na ri rtse lnga bces pa yod/ de'i phyi rol na u dum wa ra'i tshal yod pa de ni nam zhig sangs rgyas dga' ldan du byon te/ yum gyi lhum su zhugs pa'i tshe/ tshal ngo kha 'bus par 'gyuraro//
146b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan pa'i tshe kha bye bar 'gyur ro// dka' ba spyod pa'i tshe rnying la// sangs rgyas pa'i tshe rab tu rgyas par 'gyuraro// nam tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba'i tshe snying par 'gyur ro// tshad ni shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam mo// kha dogs
146b2(rgyud 'grel): ni sangs rgyas de rgyal ri gosu 'byon na ni dkar po rab tu 'byung // bram ze'i rigs kyi nang du dkar por 'byung bar 'gyur ces gsungaso// gtan la dbab pa'i mdo las/ 'byung ba kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ u dum
146b3(rgyud 'grel): ri'i me tog ni/ sangs rgyas skye bo dang dus gcig tu 'byung ste/ kha dog dang ldan zhing gsal ba/ 'od bzang ba/ dri nI dpag tshad gcig 'khor yug tu khyab par byed do// me tog de'i yon tan no// mig gi rab
146b4(rgyud 'grel): rib med par byed/ dran pa gsol bar byed/ nad rab tu zhi bar byed/ dri ngan pa thams cad rab tu sel bar byed pa/ dri zhim po 'byin pas sems can thams cad kyi khams dngas shing lus yang bar 'gyur bar byed do//
146b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten du gser gyi 'khor lo bsgyur ba 'byung yang / me tog de mi 'byung ngo zhes gsungaso// de bas kyang gsang sngags 'byung ba dkon te/ bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas stong 'byon te/ sangs rgyas shAkya
146b6(rgyud 'grel): thub pa dang / phyag na rdo rje sangs rgyas pa'i tshe ma yin par gsang sngags mi 'byung zhes gsung so// u dum wa ri'i me tog pas/ sangs rgyas stong 'byon pa dang / gsang sngags 'byung bar dkon zhes mdo sde
147a1(rgyud 'grel): dang rgyud sde gnyis ka nas gsungs te/ de yang de ltar sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig/ gser thub/ 'od srung 'byon pas kyang rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa min pa gsang sngags ma gsungs/ shUkya
147a2(rgyud 'grel): thub pa 'di nyid kyi bstan pa laM/ ri bo po ta la'i shar phyogasu spyan ras gzigs kyi/ oMn pad+ma 'byung gnas la dbang bskur/ des za hor gtsug lag 'dzin gyi pho brang du/ dza lan d+ha ra la dbang bskur/ ke/ des tshe'i
147a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thob nas lo nyis stong nyi shu rtsa lnga nas bram ze me tro pa la dbang bskur/ des rgya gor gyi rgyal rigs badz+ra pU NI la rdo rje gdan gyi shar phyogasu dbang bskuraro// des bal yul rin chen tshul gyi gtsug lag
147a4(rgyud 'grel): khang du bal po ye rangs pa la dbang bskur/ des bral yul yam bur ras pa badz+ra ki r-i ti la dbang bskur/ des lo ro tshe kong gi dgon par mgos ston dbang phyug rdo rje la dbang bskur/ des yar lungs sogs
147a5(rgyud 'grel): kAr gru gu ra swa la dbang bskur/ des karme ras pa puN+ye badz+ra la dbang bskur/ des po ma rag snur d+harma bla ma la dbang bskur/ des shar phyogs sbung ri'i dgon par/ bla ma mnyan ras pa la dbang bskur/ des rin
147a6(rgyud 'grel): po che rang byung rdo rje la dbang bskur/ khe zhes brjod/ de nas slob ma'i mgor rdo rje bzung la/ khyod kyi pad+ma rgyal po dang / pad+ma zab pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di/ snod min pa la bstan na/ dam tshig nyams
147b1(rgyud 'grel): bur 'gyur du'i phyir/ sngon dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba dang / 'di la ma dad pa'i snod la/ 'di lta bu 'di khyod kyi yang su rung rung la smra zhing brjod par mi bya'o// de nas ka b+hA lA'i nang gi bdud rtsi'i chu byin la/ 'di ni rdo
147b2(rgyud 'grel): rje'i bdud rtsi'i chu/ ma gsang sreg par byed pa'i dug/ bsrungs na dngos grub thob pa ni// bdud rtsi lnga yi chus grub po// oM pany+tsa i mr-i tA u da ka tha thaM/ de nas slob mra'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag s+t+wa~M/ spyan ras gzigs
147b3(rgyud 'grel): dpung rdo rje phag mi dang // khyod kyi snying lo yang dag zhugs par 'gyur// gal te tshul 'di gzhan la sgra mi bya// smras na de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// yang spyi bor rdo rje bzhag la/ de ring khyod dpa' bo dang rnal
147b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma rnams kyi rigasu zhugs kyi/ ngas khyod la sangs rgyas pad+ma rnam rgyas spyan ras gzigs kyi ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / spyan+da ras gzi
147b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong po rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya ste/ dam tshig nyams
147b6(rgyud 'grel): par gyur ta re/ yang rdo rje spyi bor bzhag la/ deng phyin chad khyod kyi spyan ras gzigs pa yin gyis/ gang ngas pad+ma'i rgyal po spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bsgoms shig ces bgo ba de khyod
148a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis bya'o// khyod kyis nga la brnyas par mi bya ste/ khyod mi bde ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ dmyal bar lhung bar 'gyur ta re/ zhes brjod do// ye shes gzhug pa ni/ bdag nyid kyi dkyil
148a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gsal bar bsgoms nas/ slob ma rnams spyan ras gzigasu gsal bar bskyed la/ 'og min gyi gnas gtsang ma'i gzhalo yas nas/ sangs rgyas pad+ma'i rgyal po dang / spyan ras kyis gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor
148a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi lha tshegs thams cad spyan drangs la/ bdag nyid dang slob ma rnams la gzhug go// spos la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i bye brag rnams kyang dbul/ ngag tu/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas skye 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi sku// bdag
148a4(rgyud 'grel): la byin gyis brlab tu gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// sku yi byin gyis brlab tu gsol// oM/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas gsung 'chang ba// zhes tshig bsgyur la shwa
148a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// AHzhes pa dang / dpal ldan sangs rgyas thugs 'chang ba// hUMHzhes pa dang / oM AHhUM hrIH/ oM ma Ni pad+me d+h+waM/ oM badz+rI bA rA hi/ sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye/ badz+ra war+Nan+d+ri yaM/ badz+re bai ro tsa nI ye/ ha ri ni sa/ A be
148a6(rgyud 'grel): sha yo A be sha ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta e b+hi Shiny+tsa hA AHzhes brjod cing ye shes pa gzhug go/ ye shes pa zhugs pa'i rtags sems bde gsal mi rtog pa'i rtags la sogs pa'ibyung ba dang / lha la dbang bskur
148b1(rgyud 'grel): bar gsol ba gdab pa ni/ sangs rgyas pad+ma rnam rgyas dkyil 'khor du// 'od dpag med pa'i rgyal sras spyan ras gzigs// pad+ma'i rigs kyi mchog gyur chen po yi// skal ldan rnams la dbang bzhi bskur du gsol/ ces maN+Dal
148b2(rgyud 'grel): dbul la gsol ba gdab bo// de nas bum dbang bskur ba ni/ bdag dkyil 'khor gtso bor gsal ba'i thugs ka nas/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma bzhi dang lha spros te/ bum pa thogs nas/ slob ma'i spyi bor dbang
148b3(rgyud 'grel): bskur bar bsam zhing / bkra shis brjod pa dang / yid la spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bum po'i chus dbang bskur bar bas zhing / dngosu rnam rgyal bum pa slob ma'i spyi bor bzung nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas pad+ma rnam rgyas
148b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi'od dpag med pa'i rgyal sras spyan ras gzigs// chos kyi rgyal srid chen por dbang bskur ltar// de bzhin bdag gis khyod la dbang bskur ro// ci ltar bltams po tsam gyis ni// de bzhin gshegs lci khrus
148b5(rgyud 'grel): gsol lhurar+ya// lha yi chu ni dge pa yi s+ya// s+thAn+da ras gzigs dbang dbang thob bo// oM A~MHd+hU d+hI/ oM ma NI pad+me nAM/ oM badz+ra bA rA hI/ oM sarbaM bud+d+ha D+ha kin+ti ye/ badz+ra war+d+ha nI ye badz+rI bai ro tsa nI ye/ ta ri ni sa/ oM sairba ta thA
148b6(rgyud 'grel): ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa ma/ zhes brjod de/ slob ma mgon po pad+ma'i snang ba rab tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs te/ bskyed rims rgyas par bsgom pa la dbang zer dgos so// bum chu yar 'khyil pa las
149a1(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor 'od dpag med pas dbu brgyan par bsgoms/ des lus dag pa ye shes lnga'i ngo bo// mgon po spyan ras gzigs kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor du dbang thod pa yin no// slob ma la mchod pa rnam
149a2(rgyud 'grel): nga lnga dbul lo// de nas gosang ba'i dbang ni/ ka pA la bdud rtsis bkang ba lag du bzung la/ de'i dbus su sangs rgyas pad+ma rnam rgyas yab yum gyi sbyor mtshams nas bdud rtsi bab par bsams la/ de'i 'od zer yi ge drug
149a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgra dang bcas pa phyogs bcur spros pas/ phyogs bcu'i de ba dang / bdag gis gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar bsam zhing / 'od dpag med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gsung gi mdzod// yi ge drug pa phyogs bcur
149a4(rgyud 'grel): sa 'khor bskor bi'i gsung // rgyal ba'i gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu'i dbang thob pas// brgyad khri bzhi stong gsang ba'i chos kyi dbang bskuro// sngags gong ma dang / sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hI Shiny+tsa hUM/ zhes brjed
149a5(rgyud 'grel): des ngag sgrib pa dag nas/ skye ba med pa'i sku gsung chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ga pA'i dbang bskur ba thob pa yin no// de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ni/ me ldong g.ya' dag pa la/ rdo rje phag/ me'o gzun
149a6(rgyud 'grel): rnyan 'char du bcug la/ de la sprin ras gzigs kyi yum mar me las mar me chad pa bzhin du chad nas de dang gnyisu med par bzhugs nas/ thugs ka nas 'od zer gyi phreng ba kha dog sna lnga 'phros/ phyogs bcu
149b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yum rnaMs bskul nas/ de dag rnal 'byor mA la thim/ de mthong pa tsam gyis zag med kyi bde ba ster nus pa'i lha mo me long nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bu/ bdag dang dkyil 'khor gyi
149b2(rgyud 'grel): lha tshogs de yang / me long nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bu/ me long nang gi lha mo lag pa g.yon pas gtang la/ dus gsum byang chub sems dpa' rnams// shes rab rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/ bde chen nyid du/
149b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam sbyar bas// nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs/ shes rA ba na mkha' lta bu yi/ rnal 'byor ma dang 'bral ma bya// gong gi sngags dang / tsit+taM pradz+nyA sarba ta thA ga tA na a b+hA Shiny+tsa maM des shes rab ye
149b4(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi dbang thob pa yin no// da ni chog dbang rin po che bskur ba ni// bzhi pa'i mi dmigs pa'i ye shes kyis// 'gro ba drug gi snang ba'i yul med do// snang med ye shes na mkha' dang mnyam pas//
149b5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi sku las longs spyod rdzogs su dang // sprul pa'i sku ni yi shes dpag med che// mkha' dang mnyam pa bdag med don mdzad do// zhes brjod do// rjes la slob ma ltar gyur pa la mchod pa lnga 'bul
149b6(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis kyi tshig rnams brjod do// de ni tshig dbang ngo // de nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga bzhin du bskor bar bya'o// gter ma rnams rgyas par bsngos la btang ba dang / lhag ma'i gtor ma dang / rjes
150a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi cho ga rnams byas la/ slob dpon la mye tog dbul ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos te/ dkyil 'khor mi dmigs par bya'o// sbyin sreg bya bar 'dod na/ rlung gi sbyin sreg rtsa gsum 'dus
150a2(rgyud 'grel): mdor/ ma las thob pa'i nyi ma byang chub kyi sems kyi me 'byung ba bzhi'i rlung gi sna sbar nas/ bzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa skye ba med par bsreg pa'i dbu ma nos snying gir phyin pas/ pha las thob pa'i zla ba byang chub kyi sems dang /
150a3(rgyud 'grel): snying gar 'dzom pas lus sems mi dmigs pa'i bde gsal chen po na/ sbyin sreg rnams kyi mchog go// zhes spyan ras gzigs kyi rgyud nas gsungaso// phyi'i sbyin sreg ni sa khru gang la 'dzub gango mar brus/ kha khyer
150a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzub gang phyir bskyed/ dbus su pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyud pa dmar po byaM/ mu khyud pad+ma'i phreng bas bskor/ de'i nang du tsan dan gyis zla gam du rtsigs/ dbang gi bsreg rjes dang dgang blugs dang gautor ma dong /
150a5(rgyud 'grel): de rnams g.yos go yon dang mdun du bzhag la/ rgyan dang gis dang lta sprang mo rnams las dang mthun par byas te/ me lha bskyed la mchod pa dang sreg rjes dbul/ bstod pa bya'o// de nas me lce mer gyur pa'i dbus
150a6(rgyud 'grel): sunispyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus gong rung bskyed/ bsreg rjes rnams byin gyis brlabs te/ dbul po ni rgyal po'i rim pa can nam/ rgyal po'i rim po dang / bram ze'i rim pa med de/ gang
150b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis dbul lo// gsol ba gdab pa dang / sngags kyi 'od zer ni zhi ba dang / dbang rgyas dang / drug po rnams gang byed kyang / rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bsham du las bzhi'i sngags btags pas dngos grub bsgrub bya'o//
150b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg gi rim pa'o// spyan raswA gzigs kyi rgyud bad mya rtsub byA dang / pad+ma ma rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bsgyur ba'i rab tu byed pa 'di/ dpalaM dza lan d+ha ra bes mdzad pa'o// mnga' po dag mo tri pa'i
150b3(rgyud 'grel): phyog dpe las/ rgya gar phyog na'i zhal snga nas dang bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba pradz+nyA kIr tis posgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'i rdzog so//
151a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i gzhung
151b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya Sha Ta k+Sha ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo// dang po re zhig sngags pas gdong bkrus nas stan bde
151b2(rgyud 'grel): ba la 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa bsams la skyabasu 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o// bdag ni dkon mtshig gsum la skyabasu song ba yin no// zhes mos par byas la/ sems can ji snyed bsdu bas yang dge bar
151b3(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa sgro nga las skyes pa'am/ mang lnga las skyes pa'am/ drod bsher las skyes pa'am/ brdzus te skyes pa'am/ gzugs can nam/ gzugs can ma yin po'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes med pa'am/

151b5(rgyud 'grel): d+harmA swa b+hA wa shud+d+ho&haM/ de ltar stong pa nyid du bsdus tsam gyis bsgoms la/ de'i 'og tu rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du yaM ge hrIHlas 'od zer brgya stong du ma bsgoms te/ yang de nyid kyis
151b6(rgyud 'grel): thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa ma lus pa thams cad rnam par dag par byas nas bdag nyid kyi snying gar zhugs pa las/ bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku rgyun
152a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyug bzhi pa/ g.yas na phreng ba/ g.yon pA na pad+ma bsnams bya/ phyag dang po gnyis kyis kar thal mo sbyar ba'o// grwa ya su
152a2(rgyud 'grel): nor bu 'dzin pa sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa de dang 'dra/ g.yon du 'bru drug ma rig sngags chen mo phyag bzhi ma ston kwa'i sprin lta bu'o// oM ma hA suM kha badz+ra satwa a la la hoHaHaHaHaHzhes bya
152a3(rgyud 'grel): pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjod par bya'o// de ltar bsgoms nas de'i 'og tu 'jig rten dbang phyug gi thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las phreng ba 'dra ba skor/ zhal nas phyung zhing lci

160b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan mngon 'dod 'bras bu ster po'i gzi ldan dpag bsam rkang 'thung ni// bde bar gshegs rnams bzhed pa'i don chen bzod mdzod dang dpon chen po ste// srid dang zhi ba mnyam pa'i dngos gyur dngos
160b3(rgyud 'grel): po kun gyi ngo bo nyid// phyag na pad+ma de yis 'gro ba'i sdig pa zhi bar mdzad du gsol// skye bos dben pa'i gnas dag tu// sngar langs kha sogs dag byas nas// 'jam pa'i stan la yang dag gnas/
160b4(rgyud 'grel): snying zla rgyus 'od gsal ba'o// steng du rang gi sa bon bsam// snying ga'i zla 'od kyis sa bon// yongs bskul de yi 'od zer gyis// khar sa pa Na mgon dpal ldan// bla ma sangs rgyas de smras tshogs/
160b5(rgyud 'grel): mdun gyi na mkhar spyan drangs la// sa ben de dag las byung ba'i// sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod// de nas mngon par phyag byas nas/ sdig pa bshags pa la stegs bye// thog
160b6(rgyud 'grel): med 'khor bar gang zhig rnal 'byor tshe// bdag gis mi dge bgyis dang bgyid stsal ba'i// gzhan gyis bgyis la rjes su yi rang ba// thams cad bcom ldan rnams kyi spyan sngor bsha
161a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas dang rgyal sras 'phags rnams dang // gzhan dag gis kyang dge ba gang bgyis la// rje su yi rang de dag ma lus pa// rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni yongasu bsngo// snying rje dam pa las
161a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khrungs pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams la skyabasu mchi// chos kun ro gcig ring bzhin can// gos pa med pa'i gos dag dang // rab dga' la sogs par bzhugs pa'i// byang sems rnams la'ang de bzhino// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'da'
161a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhid gyur pa rnams// gzhan la phan phyir yun du bzhugs par gsol// sgrib pa thams cad dpyis 'byin gyur pa yi// rgyur gyur byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyi zhing // bde gshegs rnam dag lam gyi dgongs po rnams//
161a4(rgyud 'grel): rtag par yang dag kun nas bsten par bog+h+ri// de ni sa rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba 'di dag kun// gcig dang du ma rnam bral stong po nyid du rnam bsam bya// oM d+hoshUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+re swa b+hA wa at+ma ko&/ zhes bya bas stong pa nyid lhag pa
161a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bya'o// chos 'di dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa'o// zhes lhag par gnas pa de ltar bdag nyid la'ang kun tu blta sngo nas/ oM sta~M b+hA waM shud+d+haHsar+b+baM d+hArmAHsaM b+hA wa shud+d+ho&ha~M/ zhes brjod par bya'o// de
161a6(rgyud 'grel): nas sbom po pos sngon gyi smon lam gyis yang dag par bskul ba'i rnam par shes pa tsam gyi baM yig yongasu gyur pa las kha dog sna tshogs pa'i pad+mar/ aM yig las skyes po'i dri ma med pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongasu
161b1(rgyud 'grel): ba de'i steng du d+hIHyig 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis na mkha'i khyon yang dag par gsal ba bsam par bya zhing / de yongasu gyur pa las pad+ma'i snying por rang gi sa bon 'od zer gyi phreng bas brgyan pa blta bar bya'o// de nas 'di
161b2(rgyud 'grel): dag yongasu gyur pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das bas mo par bya ste/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od sbyor dkar ba'i sku tsinA/ ral pa bcings pa las dbu rgyun dang / spyi gtsug tu 'od dpag med bkod pa/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang
161b3(rgyud 'grel): zla bya la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/ sku le mchog gi brgyan dang ldan zhing zhal 'dzum pa/ brgyud gnyis len pa'i lang tshwa can// phyag g.yas mchog sbyin dang / g.yon pa sdong bu dang bcas pa'i pad+ma 'dzin pa/ de'i 'og tu
161b4(rgyud 'grel): mdog lhag par rnyog pa'i yi dgas gdong pa gyen du phyogs shing kha gedangs pa/ gre ga khab kyi mog can bsus pa che ba/ shin tu ring po rnams/ phyag nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun sim par 'bab par mthong bas tshim par mdzad pa/
161b5(rgyud 'grel): snying rjes brlan pa'i dpal dang ldan zhing gru 'dzin gyi ro bo'i spo la bzhugs pa/ lhag par zhi bas rnam par gzigs pa can/ sgrogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ sna tshogs pa'i mtshan rnams kyis brgyan pa'o// de'i mdun du
161b6(rgyud 'grel): sbrel me dang / g.yas logasu gzhon nu nor bzangs po// de la sgrol ma ljang gu phyag g.yon pas sdong bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pal 'dzin cing / g.yas pase kha 'byed pa'i tshul can/ sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ lang tsho gzhin
162a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing nu 'bur rgyas pa'o// gzhon nu nor bzang gser gyi mdog can/ thal mo sbyar ba/ gzhon nu'i gzugs 'chang zhing mchan khung g.yon du glegs bam bcug pa/ rgyan thams
162a2(rgyud 'grel): cad dang ldan pa'o// rgyab tu khro gnyer can dang / g.yon du rta mgrin te/ de la khro gnyer can ser mo/ phyag bzhi ma/ ral pa'i cha shas rdzogs pa/ g.yon pas dbyug gu gsum pa dang spyi blugs/

162a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod phyir thogs dang ldan pa/ bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la sma ra dmar ser gyis spros pa/ spyan gsum dmar zhing zlum pa/ khro gnyer dong smin ma 'khyogs pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs
162a5(rgyud 'grel): 'chang po/ g.yon pas dbyug pa'i mtshon cha dang / g.yas pas phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul tson te/ 'di dag thams cad rang gi gtso bo la ji ltar mdzes pa'i mig gis blta zhing 'dug pa/ rnam
162a6(rgyud 'grel): par bsam par bya'o// de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng d+hI yig bsams la/ de las rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer 'phros pas/ khams gsum po yongasu gang
162b1(rgyud 'grel): zhing sems can thams cad 'jig rten dbang phyug gi go 'phyang la rab tu bkod nas/ slar yang 'od zer de/ sa bon gyi yi ge de la gzhug par bya'o// phye nas 'od zer nga nyid kyis ye shes sems dpa'
162b2(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs te/ dam tshig sems dpa' dang chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa ltar gcig tu gyur pa'i skur bsam par bya'o// de nas lus dge yid gsum rnam par dag par bya ste/ rim pa ji ltar bar spyi

162b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi phung po thams cad kyi sdig pa'i tshogs gzhom par bya'o// zhes nus pa ji lta bas gsal bar bsgom par bya'o// rnal 'byor brtson ldan sgom pa pos sgrib pa rab

163a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur na bsod nams yongs su bsngo zhing / langs la ji ltar bde bar lha'i nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o// dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ yid 'ong

164b5(rgyud 'grel): par sgeg pa'i dpral ba yi// gnas las dbang phyug chen po lha yi bu ni nges phyung bas// lha dang chen po'i mi yi shin tu lta drob dbang phyug khyod// pad ma'i skye ba po rnams gdul zhing khyod du chud don du//

165a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa rnams gdul dang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// m+bI bu lcang phyug na pad+ma 'dzin pa'i thugs ka la swA// nges phyung 'di ni srid pa'i dbang phyug nyid de de'i slad du// khyod ni
165a2(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu rnams kyi mchog las mchod nyid gzhan yong min// nyi zlar gus bcas rim gro bosnyen bskur stobs stobs rnams la ni// yang dge bstan phyir mthon mthing mdzes pa'i spyan ni gang dag los//
165a3(rgyud 'grel): ri bong spyan dang bla ma nges phyung sa la mig rnams kyi// nang gi mun nag 'joms pa de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo// dpal mor rim gro bsnyen bku ro sbyor ba po rnams gdul ba dang // rtogs phyir 'dir
165a4(rgyud 'grel): ni nges par bcom ldan ma ste dbyangs can 'di// rgyal ba'i sras po khyod kyi mche ba'i rtsa las rab phyong bas// mngon 'dod shes rab 'bras bu ster ba la bdag phyag 'tshal// rlung gi skye ba pa rnams
165a5(rgyud 'grel): gdul dang mi bzang lam grub phyir// de nas 'jig rten mgron po'i zhal gang zhig lhas nges phyung 'di// rlung lha mchog gi bla ma sa la skye ba pa rnams kyi// spyod lam rnam bzhi'i 'bras bu stir ba de
165a6(rgyud 'grel): la bdag phyag 'tshal// chu lta pa rnams gdul dang zhi ba'i lam 'dod ldan rnams kyi// yang dag khong du chu phyir bde gshegs sras po'i lte ba las// yang dag phyung ba chu lce'i gtso bo yang
165b1(rgyud 'grel): ste myur ba ru// 'dod dga'i dbang phyug nyid kyi 'bras bu ster la rtag phyag 'tshal// mthun pa'i 'bras bu la sogs mngon par 'dod rnams nges gdul zhing // yang dag grub phyir rab mchog mtshan

165b3(rgyud 'grel): le yang dag gnas pa ni// sems can tshogs lnga snying brtse nyid las srid pa'i spyod tshul gyis// srid mtha'i bar du brtan pa bla dag ni rtag gnas gyur snyam du// dam pa'i bsam pa chen po'i mchog gyur

166a1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba gzhon nu'i mdzes pa yang dag par// ston pa'i sku mchog 'di yang lung tsho mA yi yin nam ci// 'jigs byed drag po gnon las mi ljongs ci yang du ba
166a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // gdul bar dka' ba'i bdud 'joms pa ni khyod kyi spyod tshul lags/ kye legs 'di ltar chen po'i skye bo'i ral phreng dang mtshungs par rang gi dbu skyes mdzes pa'i lan bu

166a4(rgyud 'grel): nagro bo'i phyogs zang chung ngu cha bcas 'od kyis mdzes pa ni/ srid pa rnams su 'dod pa gang myur ri bong can gang de// cung zad las ni ma lus bsnam pa rnam par mdzes// mthun por spros
166a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ngan po'i lam can lugs 'joms shing // mi dang mi min bsam pa rton la lamra dang la mo// snang dag thob byed gzhan don spyod tshul mchog gis ni// mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang
166a6(rgyud 'grel): phyug la phyag bgyi'o// mya ngan 'das dang srid mi gnas kyang khyod gnas pa// 'od gsal rang byin gyis rlab ste sbyor dang phan pa po// ma lus skye bo'i mi dge mi mdzad dge ba yis// mdzes
166b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la phyag bgyi'o// rigs par dpag mang 'od zer phreng bas yang dag bskor// de las bde skyed mtsho skyes rang gi phyag gis 'dzin// rjes mthun dga' ba thob pa

169a1(rgyud 'grel): khu khrag rlung ni skye dang gnas// 'gag pa kun yang byed pa ste// lus kyi bde sdug kyang 'di yin// rtag tu snying gi dbus na gnas// lus dang sems las ngag 'byung ba// 'di ni tshangs pa'i sgo

169a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang po med// yod pa med cing med pa med// bde ba'i ye shes bzhi pa yin// rdul dag 'gags pa lha yi sku// lus yin 'di ni lus ma yin// 'gro dang 'ong ba 'gro 'ong med// sangs rgyas gsung de

169b1(rgyud 'grel): lnga sogs// bud med sgyu mas rab bsgrub bya// dwe ru lus ngag yid kyi sems// rdo rje bu mo'i sbyor bas shes// de nas phyag rgya chen por 'gyur// 'di yi sgrub pa rab bsgrub pa// da ni de nas shes par bya// rma
169b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi bdag nyid che'i// bu mo ut+pal mthong ga'i mdog/ lo grangs bcu gnyis len pa'amo// yang na nyi shu lnga lon rnyed// bzhin sdug mig ni dkyus ring ba// rab tu bzang la legs par sbyangs// cho ga bzhin
169b3(rgyud 'grel): du byin rlabs nas// pang par bzhag ste rab tu bsgo/ leng bu gar mkhan gyi bdag nyid kyi bu mo su dral dmar ba'i mdog ces pang 'byung gsung 'an kyang dkyus dga' 3/ 'khyud dang tsum+ba rjes chags pas// 'dod pa lnga dgra spyod par bya// dga'
169b4(rgyud 'grel): dang bde ba'i sbyor ba 'dis// lus drugaM yid ni snying gAr brtag/ reg pa bsnyen pa zhesu brjod// nye bar bsgrub pa mnyam sbyor ba// nor bur rdul ni rgyas pa las// 'dod chags chen po ye shes mthong /
169b5(rgyud 'grel): lus ni ngag l-i thim par 'gyur// bsgrub sa pa'i dam tshig bsrubs pa yis// ngag ni sems la rab tu 'jug/ thig le rlung gi sbyor bcas pa// yi ge gsum gyi tshul gyis 'bab// rmongs pas lhung ba
169b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid gyur na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'am chos kyang rung // tshal bar 'gos par gdon mi za// me long la ni dbugs kyi tshogs// thim pa'i sbyor ba ji lnga pa// yang na srog dang rtsol ba yis// bde ba mchog gi
170a1(rgyud 'grel): go 'phang bsgrub// dang po la ni bskyod pa dang // gzhan du dbang dang bdag por 'gyur// lha dang yi dgas nor sbyin dang // rig 'dzin lha min bu mo 'am// ma sogs che ba'i sbyor yang
170a2(rgyud 'grel): rung byol song las kyang rab tu brtag/ thig le mnyam par sbyor ba ni// sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag ste// 'khor lo gsang gsum ye shes mthong // de nas lhan cig skyes par 'gyur// gang la lus gnas
170a3(rgyud 'grel): zla tshes dang // 'gro ba rgyal mdzad thig le dang // don dam ye shes bsgom pa ste// sgrub byed 'di ni rig par byos// thig le spyi dang bsdu ba ni// sems kyi rgyud ni dri medo byed// steng gi sbyor ba rnam lnga pa/
170a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byam yig/ rlung dang thig le bsam pa/ rim gshig tan dang // bde ba'i shes lta ru 'gyur// dga' ba'i ye shes rdo rje gsum// sku gsum rdo rje rab tu sgrub// de ngag yan lag rnam pa
170a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi/ bsnyen pa'i ye shes chen po'o// yan lag drug gi sbyor ba yis// mchog gi sgrub pa brtsam par bya// rnam pa gzhan du bsgrubs na ni// bskal pa gsum gyi yun du'ang man// so sor bsdud dang bsam gtan
170a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / srog rtsol 'dzin pa rjesu dran// ting 'dzin yan lag drug tu brjod// dbang po bcu po rang gnas dang // thig le la yang rnam par sbyang // 'dod yon lnga po ltar sbyar bas// bde ba'i ye shes bsam gtan yin//
170b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes yan lag dang po ste// longs spyod gnyis pa yin par brjod// rang bzhin shes dang bde ba dang // gzung dang 'dzin dang gnyis meng pa// lnga dang ldan pa'i srog stsol ni// dbang po ye shes rnam zhing //
170b2(rgyud 'grel): bde ba yi yang rlung dgra pa// drangs ma lha yi gong bu ni// lte ba'i sna rtse rnamasu bsgom// rin chen rlung du rab tu brjod// rang sngags kha sbyor lte ba la// phra mo srog gi thig le bzhag/ rnam gsum rin chen rab tu
170b3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ bde ba'i ye shes 'dzin par brjeng // byang chub rdo rje 'di nyid la// mtshan ma mkha' snang lnga ru 'gyur// 'od zer du ba mkha' snang dang // sgron ma dri med mkha' rnam lnga// thig le spro dang bsdu ba yis// byad
170b4(rgyud 'grel): ba bla med gzugasu 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzod rdo rje chos// rdo rje sems dpa' rigs khro bo// thigs pas mchod dang dkyil 'khor dang // sku gsung thugs dang sems can dang // rdo rje gsum dang dam tshig
170b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / shes rab dam tshig ma skyes pa// zhe sdang rigs rnams rje su dran// 'di las so sor snang ba skye// snyoms 'jug sbyor bas dngos rnams kun// gong bu'i dbus su gzugs rnams brtag/ yud kyis ye
170b6(rgyud 'grel): shes rdzogs byed pa// ting 'dzin zhes bya bar brjod// de ltar yon lag drug gis ni// dngos grub mchog la sbyar por hU~M// rnal 'byor drug po 'di dag ni// byang chub rdo rjes bshad pa yin// thig le rna
171a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi g.yo ba las// 'di ltar ye shes rnam pa bzhi// rlung rnams gang la thim pa ni// ting 'dzin gyi dbye ba'o// snang ba la ni spro ba dang // mi snang bsdu ba zhesu brjod// rang dang gzhan gyi
171a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos po la// de bzhin spro dang bsdu ba'o// bde dang gdung ba stong pa dang // rnam shes ye shes rnam bzhi'o// 'dod dang dga' ba g.yo dang g.yo// gang ba dgabri ba 'char bya dang // nub pa med dang yang
171a3(rgyud 'grel): chags bral// sems med thig la oT+Ta dang // rang byung gnyid spur sgra zhes pa// snang ba lhag par snang ba dang // mi snang thog ma lhan skyes te// skad cig nyi shu zhes bya'o// skad cig thams cad las
171a4(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa'i// dga' ba don ngam mngon byang chub// gang dag rang bzhin lhan cig skyes// kun tu 'gro zhing kun tu zhi// rang las rtag tu 'ongs po ste// 'di ni zab cing rgya tsho bas// 'jig rten rmongs pas mi
171a5(rgyud 'grel): shes shing // 'phags pa yis kyang de mi gtogs// sangs rgyas rnams kyis spyod yul 'di// byis pa'i sems dpa' rnams mi shes// gtso bo bdag dang dbang phyug dang // gang zag sems tsam rnam
171a6(rgyud 'grel): par brtags// yid kyi dmigs pa yang ji snyed// de dag lhan cig skyes pa min// yid bzang mo dang snying dbus dang // dbugs dgag sems med sbyor ba dang // gsang sngags bzlas byed 'dod pa yi// tshe
171b1(rgyud 'grel): ga'i ye shes de dag ni// rang bzhin lhan skyes zhes mi brjod// sangs rgyas lhan cig skyes pa ni// bla ma'i drin gyis gsal 'gyur te// thabs kyi rang nyid mtshon par bya// chos kun ring dang nye ba med//
171b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gnyis med lhan cig skyes// sangs rgyas bye brag med pa ste// 'gro ba kun las rab tu 'byung // de ltar sngon mtha' med pa dang // sems can dbye ba med yin to// 'di ste ye shes ldan yin na//
171b3(rgyud 'grel): s+ya la sogs pa'ang thar min tso// rnam snang rdo rje nyi ma dang // gar dbang rdo rje rta rgyal po// rdo rje sems dpa' he ruM ka/ gti mug rdo rje la sogs dang // de bzhin ltung byed ma la sogs// 'byung ba la sogs phung
171b4(rgyud 'grel): po la// gnyisu med tshul gyis grub pa'o// phung po sangs rgyas rnam lnga dang // 'byung ba lha mi byang chub sems// mi gsegs de bzhin gzugs lnga sogs// 'dir ni gzungs ma rnam par brtag/ tshigs
171b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams khro bo'i tshogs yin no// srid pa sku gsum rang bzhin dang // 'pho ba sa ru shes pari bya// lam gnyis zung du sbyor ba nyid// ji ltar na mkha'i khams nyid la// 'od kyis dkyil 'khor snang ba ltar//
171b6(rgyud 'grel): sems ni za ba dang rgya che ba// gnyis med tshul gyis rtag tu gnas// gang gi dngos po ma skye bo// stong pa shin tu rang bzhin med// snang ba med cing brjod pa med// yul dang yul can med pa yi//
172a1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba dam pa yin// dngos po thams cad tha dad dang // gcig min mtshan nyid yongasu rdzogs// rdul dang dus ni yongs bral ba// zab mo rdo rje gsum 'dzin pa'i// dkyil 'khor rgyu
172a2(rgyud 'grel): che zhesu brjod// de nyid mi phyed rdo rje ste// brjod du med cing bsam du med// bsam du med pas bsgom bya zhes// thub pa chen pos bka' stsal to// gsang ba dbang po yul phrad pas// rnam shes dri ma med
172a3(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba// lhan+da skyes spros spang shes rab mthong // thams cad mnyam par shes pa na// zab myo ldog par mos pa 'thob// lhan skyes yongasu gyur pa na// bag chags rten dang bral bar 'gyur// bde
172a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ye shes dkyil 'khor rgyas// 'di skad rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das// lang kar gshegs mdo las gsungs te// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang // 'du shes rnam par spangs pa yo// sems kyi rgyal po

172b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / rlung dang thog le 'pho ba rnams// dag pa yi yang sa ru brtag// brda dang tshogs kyi rim pa rnams// 'dir ni de nyid rig pas sgrub// dben pa'am yang na dur khrod du// paT+Ta la sogs brgyan pa'amo//
172b3(rgyud 'grel): yang na bsam gtan kho nas kyang // dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis spyod// zab dang rgya che'i spyod pa 'di// rim pa dang pos rab sgrub la// rdo rje sems dpa' gzigs 'gyur zhing // mig sman la sogs
172b4(rgyud 'grel): rig 'dzin 'gyur// rang dang gzhan gyi grub mtha' la// sngags rgyu brten pa bde bar 'grub// bskal pa gsum du ngal bas kyang // byang chub sgrub par mi nus pa// lus gcig la yang 'gyur ba ni//
172b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags shes rnams kyis byas pa yin// bskyed pa'i rim pa ma grub la// stong pa nyid ni yun rings bsgom// legs bris gzugs brnyan shar ba la// rtse gcig tu ni rab bltas nas// yang dang yang
172b6(rgyud 'grel): du bsgom par bya// lha yo de nyid grub par 'gyur// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang // yi ge gsum gyis bskul ba shis// spyod pa'i dngos grub g.yel ba la'ang // 'dis ni sngags kyi

173b2(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur// spyan drangs bzhugs dang gshegasu gsol// ye shes rdo rje gsum bong byed// 'gro'ing bskyed dang sdud pa lo// thung ngu ma lus ngag tu 'gyur// 'ong dang 'gro ba g.yo dang brtan//
173b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pas brtan g.yo ye shes byed// AHyis yongasu spro bar bya// oM gyis spyan drangs bya bo ste/ hUM gis gas sngags gnas pa'o// rlung gis nga nyid rab grub la/ sngags kyi rgya

173b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje snga bshig nas kyang // ye shes thig le ting 'dzin gyis// sems dpa' de ni don dam sgrub// rnal 'byor 'di ni bsgom gyur ni// nyi la 'dun gyi sa gdon mi za// ye shes rnam par g.yongs pa na//

177b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni a zhes brjod par 'dod// gnyid stug log dang mnyam par 'gyur// khu ba lhung po'i skad cig la// de bzhin tshim dang 'jigs pa la// a A thos par 'gyur ba'o// chu ltung me ni gyen
178a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro dang // rmi lam de bzhin gnyid sad dang // 'od gsal ba las sems ldang dang // yid ni nang du gyur pa na// ta yig mngon brjod 'dod pa'o// chungs pa'i 'jig rten bde ba
178a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / gdengs can yul la zla ba shar// bya gdong nas ni sha mi'i bar// nor bu 'od lnga ldan pa gnas// 'di ni 'khor dang zhi ba'ang yin// sangs rgyas sgyu ma rnams kyang 'di// gang la rgod dang gang gis
178a3(rgyud 'grel): rgod// ci yi phyir na rgod pa yin// ci ltar de dang ldan par 'gyur// de la 'di ltar brjod bya ste// rlung ni lus ngag rdul bcas pa// de la'o rgod pa 'di ni bde// stong pa la ni lus ngag yid// bde ba
178a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang ldan pa'o// ha ra lus 'brog yid 'phrog bde// se twa ra s+pha yA NA bde// skyed pararo byed pas de yin no// e pa ra dzi ta na mkha'// dngos po kun las rgyal bar gyur// tA thA'i tshul ni rnam med
178a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ dngos po kun yang song ba'o// rdo rje bla ma sA d+haM lter bshad// satwA mu dra'o// yi ge bzhi po'i don ston pa// spyan ras gzigs dpung bdag phyag 'tshal// slob dpon dra kon+ti chen po// sems kyi phyag rgya gsung bar
178a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// khaD+ga pa yi man ngag go// sngon chad gangs ri'i khrid du ma byon pa'i// gzhung bzang 'di yang bla ma'i drin las thobo// sangs rgyas sbas pa'i gsung bzhin 'di bsgyur te// rmongs pa kun dga' snying pos g.yar khrol du'o//
179a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rdo rje gtum pa chen po khros pa zhes bya ba'i sprub thabs bzhug sa/
179b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ badz+ra pA Ni tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sad tA na ba lA/ bod sbyang du/ phyag na rdo rje gtum po chen po khros pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tsha lo// bla ma rgyung
179b2(rgyud 'grel): gA'i rim pa yi// man dgra rin chen bdud rtsi'i rgyun// gsang bdag mngon rtogs rim pa 'di// sgro sgor med par bri bar bya// rdo rje 'chang nas da lto'i ba// tshig don rgyud bya bor ma ched// dbang gi rgyal po lta bu
179b3(rgyud 'grel): yi/ mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla mra la// snying rje ljon zhing shes rUb che// bzod ldan byartson 'grus dad pas brgyan// skyabaso 'gro sems/ bskyed dbang thob cing // dam tshi go sdom pa ldan pa yi// dben zhing nyams
179b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' yid bde dang // bkra shis dpal 'phel dbang dbang 'dzin// dur khrod chen po 'jigs pa'i gnas// ri gsum rtsa 'am brag gi 'og/ khro bo'i cha byang 'dra ba'i gnas// drir ni gsung bdag sgrub par bya//
179b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i mthun rkyen bsags byas nas// der ni bkod pa bsham byas nas// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// skyabs 'gro dang ni sems bskyed bya// bla ma'i rnal 'byor sgom nas ni// oM swa b+ha wa shud+d+ho
179b6(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harma swa b+ha wa shud+d+ho&haM/ sngogs 'di lan gsum brjod pa yis// gzung 'dzin snod bcud chos rnams kun// ba ra snang gang ba'i dkyilta sgom// de nas hUM zhes brjod po yis// sems nyid yi ge hUM mthong /
180a1(rgyud 'grel): nagaHbadz+ra brjod pas rdo rjer gyur// oM badz+ra swa ma ya s+t+waM// de skad lan gsum brjod pa yis// mthu stobs phyag na rdo rje ni// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa gnam
180a2(rgyud 'grel): lcags rdo rje bsnams// g.yon pa sngags 'dzub zhags pa bsnams// srid gsum sku yi khyon du rdzogs// klu 'bum gnyan khri saM bdag stong // nyi zla pad ma'i gdan stengs na// g.yas skum g.yon brkyang gar gyis
180a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// dug lnga 'joms pa'i ye shes kyis// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil ni// ye shes sku mchog rngam pa'i tshul// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// rma ra smin ma maM ltar 'bar// thugs rje spyan

180a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan// dbul ner rgyas dung skyong ser// snyan le dga' bo nyir dga' dmar// dpung pa pad ma chu lha dkar// se ral 'dab bzangs rigs ldan gnag/ sku gsung thugs ni byin gyis brlab// thugs kha'i

180b2(rgyud 'grel): par bsam// ma hUM ro// lan e raM phaT phaT// khro rgyalo sna tshogs mtshon cha thigs// ye shes me dpung phyogs bcur 'phro// lha yi sku ni sgom pa yis// bsod nams tshogs ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de nyid chu lter

194b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ uSh+NI la an+ta u pa de sha sad da nA nA ma/ bod skad du/ U Ni sha sngags kyi man ngag gi bsgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba la phyag 'che lo//
194b2(rgyud 'grel): drag po sngags kyi rba thabs// man+da dag las kyi rim pa// bzlog pa kun gyi yang snying // srung ba kun gyi gsang mchog/ bca' thabaso las kyi khyad pa ro// dga' ra ba rnga rje bo'i man ngag/ 'jam dpral
194b3(rgyud 'grel): bshes gnyen thugs dam// shri seng nga'i brnag pa// u Ni sha'i man ngag bshad// ci phyir byad ka bzlog pa dang // yul khams bsrung dngo sa bdag bsrung // dam nyams bsgral dang 'dre sr-in
194b4(rgyud 'grel): gdul// rims nad lta 'dre'i chad pa srung // sangs rgyas bstan pa rgyas phyir bri// de'i mon dog bstan pa ni// rnam pa gsum du bsdus te bstan// rtogs pa lta bas bsrung pa dang // rten 'brel
194b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzas kyis bsrung ba dang // drag sngags nus pas bsrung po'o// lte bas baspyad blo rnam gnyis te// mtshan med stong pas bslang ba dang // mtshan bcus lha skus bsrung ba'i// mtshan med stong pas bsru
194b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni// phyi'i yul gyi snang ba rnams// snang srid sgra mchen por gnas// ning gi reg pa byang chub sems// skye 'jig med pas ye sangs rgyas// phyi nang snong bcud thams cad ni// lus pa med par
195a1(rgyud 'grel): shes dang // mkha' dang bem po gsal ba yang // gsal NA bar rgyun dang khyud rdzogs par sgom// rin chenu khri rkang sen dang // nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan bshams nas// rgyu las bskyed
195a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags brjod pas// gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba ni// zhal cig phyag gnyis mthong nug sku// sdigs mdzub lcags kyu'i phyag rgyu can// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan par bsam// hU~M ka ra dang
195a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rgyal// dbyug sngon gshin rje mi g.yo mgon// rta mgrin 'dod rgyal bdud rtsi 'khyil// khams gsum rnam rgyal stobos po che// hUM gi rgyu las rang sngogs brjod// sku mdog phyag
195a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan rdzogs par bsgoms// bsten pa'i sngags la 'bad de bzlas// gang la dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// spyi don gnyis 'dir bstan pa// rten 'brel rdzas kyi bsrung ba ni// rnam pa gnyis su
195a5(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// phyi'i ri rab bcas lugs dang // nang gi 'khor lo'i bcas lugaso// phyi'i ri rab bca' lugs ni// dbyi bos dang kha dog rgyu dang ni// nang gi mtshan nyid bzhi ru btso'o// dang por ri rab rmang dag tu
195a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor khru gong gru bzhi la// rgya dang 'phang du khru re btang // gling dang gling phran ro bdun bcas// gru bzhi zlum po zla gam dang // sogs ka'i dbyibasu legs par bya// kha dog dmar ser dkar sngo byug
195b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu ni lha khang hrul po dang // re'u rul 'dre can skyes pa dri ra shi'i sa// phung sa bkra mi shis pa'i sa// mdze po yugs sa'i khrag dang ni// dgra bo'i dri chen dri chur sbyar// mkhas pas rang gi dri ma ni// ma song pa ru legs
195b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de'i nang du gru gsum bya// de'i steng du brtsigs pa ni// dug dang khrag dang ro bsregs sol// bkra mi shis pa'i sa dag dang // kam sa bzang pos bsres pa'i rgyud// dbyibs ni gru bzhi lam pa la// mdog
195b3(rgyud 'grel): ni nago por byug par bya// 'phrin las mtshan pa'i sgo btod la// rang gi kha dog bzhin du bri// 'phang du sor bzhi legs par bya// nang gi grwa gsum dag tu bya// de steng bong chung btang nas ni// khri 'phang
195b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ni brtsig par byo// de rgyu dbang po che yi mi// thams cad dbang du sdud pa de'i// zhing sa blangs la kham par bsre// rta mi bud maud khyi blang dmar// drug po dam ri ba'i khrag dang sbyar// dbyibs ni gru bzhi pa rim
195b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i// mdog ni phyi nong dmar por byug/ nang gi zla gam dmar por bru// las ni dbang gi las mtshon no// bad rim gong ma'i steng du yang // klu rigs bzhi'i sbrul bzhi bzhag/ klu gonas pa dong sa bzangs paste//
195b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dmar rgyud pas srog shing bya// kha dog dkar khra ser khra dang // dmar khra nag khra zur bzhir bzhag/ de yi steng du bzhag pa ni// gru bzhi sogs kar byas pa'i dbyibs// rgyu ni rgyal po la sogs pa// 'byor pa
196a1(rgyud 'grel): can gyis blangs te// khyam sa dag dang bskye ba dang // mkhas pas byas la bad chung bya dang // mdog ni phyi nAng ser por byug/ nang ni rgyus pa mtshon pa'i phyir// glu bzhi dag tu bya bar bya// de'i
196a2(rgyud 'grel): steng du rgyal chen bzhi// sku mdog phyag mtshan rdzogs par bya// phyogs bzhi dag tu legs par bzhag/ de'i steng du brtsigs pa ni// rgyu ni phyug po bkra shis cing // 'byor po ldan pa'i sa dang ni// 'ibru sno lnga dang
196a3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen lnga// bdud rtsi lnga dang spos lnga dang // bzang drug sgron rnams sbyar tI bya// dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni// rmang du pad+ma 'a da'i brgyud bya// nang du bshig po'i 'khor lo bzhug/ pad+ma bdo bi mA bcu
196a4(rgyud 'grel): drug go// steng du bde chung gtang bar bya// de steng yid bzhin rin po che// rtse mo rno bo dpal dang ldan// bang chung steng du gzugs pa ni// sde brgyad bzlog pa'i phur pA gzugs// thams cad de byibs ni rgyum+b+ha
196a5(rgyud 'grel): po ste// pad+me 'dub brgyad phyogs mtshon btang // rin chen myadang s+ya lhun nag po ljang // dmar sir kar byas mo ris bcas// yid du'i zhing mdzes par bya// phyi nang gnyis ka zlum bor bri// las ni zhe
196a6(rgyud 'grel): ba mtshan par nges// ri rob de yi nang dag tu// nang gi 'khor mo'i bca' thab po ni// drag po mtshan pa'i ri rab smang // gru gsum ning du bzhugs pa ni// sbrul dong sbal pa sdig pa'i sha// klu gzhanas
196b1(rgyud 'grel): dang dkar gsum dang // dad+mar gsum bsres la gzugs bya ba// gsong byed mgo dgu nag po ni// klu glang dmar po chibasu bcibs// g.yas pa nad kyi rkyal pa ste// g.yon pa sbrul nag thogs pa'i gzugs
196b2(rgyud 'grel): mkhas par byas te khyod par ni// pheM 'khor me 'khor l-I sbyar gzhag/ ri rab+ho rmang gi bang chung la// 'og tu rdo rje rgya glum bri// steng du glu gsum nag por bya// de yi legs par kha yeng gcad// de steng ri rang sor
196b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i nang // dgra bro'i rdzas la gzugs byas la// snying gor gsad pa'i 'khor lo bzhug/ phyogs bzhi zhi rgyas sgo nang du// lho srin sde brgyad gnang dbab phyir// rang gshed dbab pa'i 'khor lo brgyad//
196b4(rgyud 'grel): sheg dag la b+his te bzhag/ phyogs mtshon zhi rgyus dbang drug gi/ gzungs thag btags te phur pa la// baurjod de dus su sngags kyi gzor// de steng bang rkyong dag la yang // 'og tu rdo rje rgya bram bri// r-i ni phyog
196b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshon dag ru bI// steng du zla ga mo dmar po bri// bong rims bzhi pophyi nang du yang // lho srin sngo brgyad dbang bsdu'i phyir// rtsi bse brgyad rigs bzhi sbrul ldan gyi// 'khor lo chen po brgyad pa'i steng // sheg bu
196b6(rgyud 'grel): bzang po dag li yang // mdun rgyab gnyisu bri bya ba// ya ba ni bya rgod 'og rkyang btso bas// dbyug to g.yas l-i khram shing g.yon// tha ma rang gi srog sngags bskor// snang sring skos kyi bdag po yis//
197a1(rgyud 'grel): pho 'dre thams cad dbang du sdud// yum ni dug sbrul nag po zhon// g.yas pa tsit+ta dmar po 'dzin// g.yon pa nad kyi rgyal pa bsnams// rang sngags srog snying mtha' bskor tAM// srid pa 'byung
197a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yid drod snyoms sam// mi rigs dbang du sdud par bsgom// nang gi 'khor lo'i zur bzhi ru// gshin rje bzhi ya phur pa gzugs// dar gyi cod pan re re gzugs// sku gsung thugs kyi snying pi dgod// rang
197a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags dpal laM byi ste gzugs// de steng rdo rje rgya grim yang // 'og tu sna tshogs rgyu gram bri// steng ma gru bzhi ser por bya// sa bdag klu gnyen bsrung ba'i phyir// klu'i 'khor lo gzugs par bya// 'khor lo
197a4(rgyud 'grel): phur pa dag la brting // gzungs thag btags te bzlas pa bya// sa bdag klu srung sngags kyis bzlas// de steng rdo rje rgya gram gcad// dri stong yuli khams srung ba yi// yungs dkar yungs nog thal chen gyi/
197a5(rgyud 'grel): thun rdzas de'i nang du blugs// steng du 'khor lo bzhag pa yang // yul khams srung ba'i 'khor lo'o// de'i thad kar thun bug gzhag/ ser bsrung ba'i sngags bzlas te// ser ba byung na thun rnams gtor//
197a6(rgyud 'grel): de steng rdo rje rgya gram gyis// khaM gtsang legs par gnon par bya// nga steng rin tshon tog gi nang // bkra shis sa la gzugs bya ba// rnam par rgyal ba'i sku gzugs yang // byas te nang du gang srung ba'i/
197b1(rgyud 'grel): snying rus bris te gzhug pa dang // rnam rgyal rten 'brel snying po bris pa dang // 'bru dang dar zab gzhug par bya// rang nyid de ru bsgom bya zhing // bzlog pa'i 'khor lo rgyab tu gdags// srung ba'i 'khor lo mdun du
197b2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ mtshon tsha'i 'khor lo gdan du gdong // de ya tha ma khro bcus bskor// rgyu shog dag la sku gzugs bri// rgyub tu rang rang sngogs kyis brgyan// nang du kha bltas bsrung bar bsam// gzungs thag druka
197b3(rgyud 'grel): popo bkra shis gdags// zlog dang bsrung ba'i sngags bzlas shing // yid bzhin rin chen khang par bsgom// lha 'dre'i spyod gtong byung ba na// yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba las// 'dod pa'i longs spyod ci dgos
197b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung // gang 'dod lha 'dri mnyes par bsam// de ni srung ba dam pa'i mchog/ nang gi bca' gzhi'i khyad par ro// spyi don gsum pa bshad pa ni// drag sngags nus pas bsrung ba na// sngags ni rnam pa gnyis
197b5(rgyud 'grel): yin te// 'khor lo phur dgod sngags dang ni// bzlas pa las kyi sngags dag go/ 'khor lo phur dged sngags bstan pa// gsod byed 'go rgyu'i lto pa ru// pho 'khor mo 'khor gnyis pa la// re'u mig brgyud la
197b6(rgyud 'grel): klu sreg sngags// thang 'byams gnan pa'i sngags kyi dag/ lha srin sde brgyad 'khor lo la// rang rang srog gi sngags kyis brgyan// lha srin dbang sdus 'khor lo la// lha srin sde brgyad dbang bsdu'i sngags//
198a1(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs brgyad dag la bri bar bya// rigs bzhi klu rnams dbang bsdu'i phyir// sprul par rigs bzhi'i sngags kyis dgang // 'byung bzhi'i ming dang sngags dang ni// 'dre srin dbang bsdu'i
198a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyang bri// bsrung bzlog gsad pa'i 'khor lo la// rang rang sngags kyis brgyan par bya// srung ba'i sngags la rnam gsum yod// yul khams sa bdag rang srung sngags// bri dang bzlas par bya ba'o//
198a3(rgyud 'grel): dri ltar bstan pa'i gsang sngags rnams// 'khor lo dag la brgyan par bya// de ni nang gi 'khor lo sngags/ phyi'i phur pa rgyal mtshan la// bri ba'i sngags rnams bstan pa ni// ri rab zur la gzugs pa
198a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ byang shaMr phyogasu gzugs pa ni// mchod byed sbal pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis// klu rigs rang zhi rang la bzlog/ de mi bzlog sngags 'di dag go/ oM ka ru na tsa le tsi le hUM phaT/ nA ga sarba duSh+TA na/ mA ra
198a5(rgyud 'grel): yA zlog zlog/ shar lho mtshamasu gzugs pa ni// brjid gnon seng ge'i rgyal mtshon gyis// sdang ba'i dgra la seng ltar 'tshong // de yi lha 'dre bzlog pa'i sngags// 'di dag rgyan du bri bar bya// aM
198a6(rgyud 'grel): ma hi b+ha r-i hi sa man tram mu tra/ sa ma ti ma ra ba sarba lo ke swA hA// lho nub mtshamasu gzugs pa ni// stobs chen srin po'i rgyal mtshan gyis// pheM bdud da le ka ga ya su rgyur// de yoM bzlo go sngags
198b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag go// oM mahA kA la man traM sarba lo ke swA hA// nub byang mchem su gzugs pa ni// gsong byed sin mo'i rgyal mtshan gyis// mo bdud dal ka g.yon du bsgyur// de la bri bra'i sngags 'di'o// e ma hA tsan
198b2(rgyud 'grel): ti man tre man tra sarba lo ke swA hA// shog bu dag la gzugs bris te// mtshams bzhi dag tu legs par gzugs// rgyal chen bzhi la rang rang sngags// legs pa ra bris te rgyab yel bya// yang na khong par
198b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhug par bya// phur pa brgyad la bri ba ni/ shwar du rgyal po bzlog pa yi// sngags 'di phur pa'i dpal la dgod// oM ra tsa ma hA sarba li ka du stan mA ra ya swA hA lo ko swA hA/ shor lha mo'i dpal la bri ba
198b4(rgyud 'grel): naMni/ lha chen bzlog po'i sngags 'di'o// oM ma hA b+he ra b+h+ra man traM// sirba lo ke swA hA// lce phyogs 'god po bzlog pa'i sngags// oM ma hA ka la g+hA na tri ta sarbe lo ki pa ra na ma ha kaM la sarba ma ra na zlog zlog b+h+yo// lho
198b5(rgyud 'grel): nub gza' rgyal bzlog pa'i sngags// a ra hUM lA ra ma trigs sogs mya ya zlog/ nub tu bdud po bzlog pa'i sngags// oM badz+ra sarba dus stan pra ma yai hUM phaT zlog b+h+yo// nub byung 'gong po bzlog pa'i sngags// oM
198b6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra sa ma sa ma ya kyai kye has bye hus bya tri pa sha lings sa ma ya sarba lo ka sarba la ka sarba dus stan mA ra ya/ byang shar ma mo bzlog pa'i sngags zlog/ byang phyogs btson gyi bzlog sngags ni oM ma hA shu tse ra tsa sarba
199a1(rgyud 'grel): lo ka dus stan zlog/ byang shar ma mo bzlog pa'i sngags// phaT mU tA de bi ki li dus stan+na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa sarba dus stan b+hAn d+hU pa tse ma ra ya hUM phaT// tra ga rag sha ma ma sarba ma rA ya b+h+yog+sa/ d+has
199a2(rgyud 'grel): nam mo bzlog pa'i sngags// sbyar pa kun gyi dpal la bri// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge dgod// bzlas pa las kyi sngags bstan pa// bsnyen sngags las sngags rnam pa gnyis// las sngags rnam pa gsum yin te//
199a3(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bzlog bsad pa'i drag sngags so// bsnyen pa dag gi sngags 'di'o// oM a us sni shi badz+ra tsakra rbarti sarba lo kI pU bruM bruM bruM lo kos ta ra yan+ta man+ta tan+te shAn+ye Na tsur+Na pA yo gi ye na ke ne ma ma kri ta gar ta tan tsatsA ta/
199a4(rgyud 'grel): na sarba lo ki tshin+na tshin+na/ b+hin+ti b+hin+taM/ ha na hA na/ daM hA da ha/ pa tsa pe tsa/ bi tan sa ya/ sa ta si tA/ pra ta prA ta/ bi tsu ra na/ au au usaM NI sha badz+dzan+teka?dz+nyAM rA ti bruM sarba li ki swAhwA// bsrung ba'i sngags nA ga sum+b+ha yin
199a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ yul kha maHsa bsr-iH dang bgegs spyir bsrung // gdug pa klu bsrung rnam gsum mo// deng pi yul khams bsrung ba ni// au a ush+tsi sha pa tsI bi to shai sha ya mo ha yi snyam pa ya hUM pha Te// gnyis pa spyi'i
199a6(rgyud 'grel): bgegs srung ba// oM ai ush+tsi sha sarba tsi ta khaM tham srog gzir sbur non 'drod phung hri shag rbad// gsum pa klu'i bsrung sdigs ni// oM a uSh+NI sha ka ri ba ma bi po ta na ga nan swA hA// bzlog pa bsnyen pa'i she bu de/
199b1(rgyud 'grel): gong du bstan pas 'dir mi brjod// de yang bzlog dang gshig par gsungs// 'khor lo gshegs pa'i sngags bstan pa// aM a us Ni sha ya ma ra tsa b+h+yo zlog rbad// ki lI ki ya b+h+yo zlog rbad// oM ma ma te ka ra
199b2(rgyud 'grel): pram b+h+yo zlog rbad// sngags ni mas bu bzlog byas la// 'khor lo g.yon du bskor byas na// gang gis byas pa shigs par 'gyur// ri rab pad+ma 'drab brgyad lA'o// gsang pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// dngos dang mnan pa rnam pa
199b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis// gsad pa srogi sngags 'di'o// au o us shrI sha yA ya rbang // yan+na tsin+ta rbad// man+t+ra ya tsa mo rba / gnyis pa mnan pa'i sngags ni// oM a ush+tsi sha du dus du ai ka du Sh+pe du na na// paM ni hUM laM staM ba nAn// de naM mnan
199b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngagaso// stobs can dpa' bo'i rgyud dag las bsrung ba'i man ngag bsdus pa 'dis// sems can sdug bsngal grol gyur nas// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung bar shog// lnga brgya'i dus kyi snyigs ma lnga//
199b5(rgyud 'grel): drag sngags 'di yis don byed shog/ 'di la brtsams nings gyur pa na// lha dang mkha 'gro tshe skyong la// mi mngon dbyingasu 'thol zhing gshegs// dzA ra dzag par dgyi ma dang // gsal ba'i mdeng so ston sgyogs gcag yin//
199b6(rgyud 'grel): us+thi she ri rab ma'i bsgrub thabaso// slon shri sing ngas mdzad pa rdzogs// / rgya gar gyi ba nau b+hI ta de nyid dang / bod kyo lo tse ba be ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // de nas rgyal mo g.yul spre laM babaso// I//
200b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badz+rA byi d+ha ra ma d+ha la bi ti Ti na ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi che ga zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms la phyug 'tshalo//
200b2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon de nyid bcu shos shing // mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan// sngags dang phyag rgya'i cho ga shes// las rnams kun la shin tu mkhas// shes nas mtshan nyid la mkhas pas// dkyil 'khor
200b3(rgyud 'grel): chog bri bar bya// de yang dang por gnas dben par// rang lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas// mtshan ma mthong ba 'am/ 'bum du bzlas pa ni/ sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga bya'o// de nas bdag gzhan 'khor

200b6(rgyud 'grel): snang po bskos la rus pa dang / gyo mo dang / sol dum rnams rtsol te/ sa gzhon bzang po sdum pa dang // dri na wa zhim po'i chu ngadang sras la dun rdzogs 'o thos par po cag kyi man
201a1(rgyud 'grel): lag mthil ltar mnyam par bcag cing de'i steng du/ gzhal yas khang sgo na dang / rta babs bzhis brgyan par byas pa'i nang du/ chud par bsam mo// brag phug dang ltas la sogs pa/
201a2(rgyud 'grel): sngar byas pa'i gnasu ni spyang mi dgos so// spos chus sa phyogs da gas nga zhing gtor ro// de nas rin po che la sogs pa de'i dbus su gzhug par bya'o// de nas khro po zil dang ldan pas/ thams cad du lta zhing
201a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'ogros kyis bskor zho'i bgegs thams cad bskyang por bya'o// slob dpon mi 'dri zhes bya bas/ \u0f7fswa ba rnas pa slob ma mi 'di zhes bya baM/ bla na med pa \u0f7fnI'i byang chub thob par bya'i phyir// sa phyogs
201a4(rgyud 'grel): da dro ba dang []'di lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin da / srin po dang / sa garnang bayi dwags dang / sha za dang / 'byung po da // mkha' 'gro ma dang / rig sngogs grub pa rga do pa dong / rgan mi
201a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa/ de dag thams cad dengs shog/ 'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos pa tsam gyis/ myur bu nyid du dengs shig ces brjod do// hUM zhes lan gsum brjod do// de nas
201a6(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi de brdzes pa sku zhes byin gyis brlabs dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/ bdag nyid spro bskyed de/ deng du bdag tshe dang 'bras sa ge sungs bu yod/ bdag gis bsod nams dbang dang 'bras bur bcas/ deng
201b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyi ma dngas pa ste/ bdag gis mchod sbyin bla na med// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs pas// dang bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no// de nas phyag byas la gdug spos dbul te/ sangs rgyas thams
201b2(rgyud 'grel): la gsol ba gdab po// ma lus phyogs nos bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas thams cad dgongasu gsol// rdo rje can gyis dgongasu gsol// deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te// dngos grub 'dir
201b3(rgyud 'grel): ni gsal du gsol// zhes brjod la/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/ lha gtso 'khor bsam ste/ ye shes sems dpa' bsdoms la/ mchod pa dang bstod pa bya'o// gser dngul las/ rnam par rgyal ba'i
201b4(rgyud 'grel): bul pa bya'o// ma 'byor na kham pa las byas pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la/ sman dang 'bru dang / rin po dam tshig pa la che dang / spos dang / snying po la sogs pa dang ldan rang bzhin med par bya gzhal yas khang ko na dang bcas
201b5(rgyud 'grel): par byas la/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa lo sogs pa la bum pa lnga/ las thams cad pa'i gcig dang drug la/ rang rang gi phyag rgya bri la/ rgyan gzungs pag mgul chings yab yum 'od du zhu bas ye shes kyi bdud
201b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsi'i tshur gyur par bas mo// gtso bo'i bum pa la la dbang bskur ba'i don rnam rdzas lum par gan tha'i ku brgyam ba thams du/ rdo rje 'tshang gi mdun du bzhag/ las thams cad pa'i bum pa byang shar du bzhag la/ 'di
202a1(rgyud 'grel): skad gsol gdab bo// khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma rdzogs kyi bar du/ bgegs rnams bsrungs shig ces bya ba ni/ bum pa sta gon gyi cho ga'o// de nas phyi rol tu byung la/ phyogs skyong
202a2(rgyud 'grel): la gtor ma btang la/ zhi ba'i sbyin bsregs bya/ de nas las sumo 'di snyed gsol pa gdab po// rdo rje 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das// rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshalo// slob ma rnams gca ba'i ngargyal gyis rol
202a3(rgyud 'grel): brtse ba tshagasasaHdang / khyed rnams l-i yang tsun dzo mchod pa'i phyir// dus ni dkyil the nang du leg pa 'khor bri bar dzin la gnas nas 'tshal// bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la// de nas gnang ba mdzad pa rigs/

202a5(rgyud 'grel): chen dang // gang su lha yi spyan ma pa'i// sems can ste la dga' ba rnams// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi sde// srang ni dkyil 'khor bzang po myong // 'di zhes bgyi bo tsi nus kyis// cho ga bzhin du 'dri lags na//

202b1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ bsrung ba dang / gos sar pa gon te/ snyim par me tog thogs te/ slob dpon la phyag byas te/ gsol ba gdab bo// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa yi// slob dpon khyod ni dgongasu gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul
202b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan no// mgon po chen po rgyan gyi rgyan bdag 'tsho lo// dam tshig de nyid ga/ bras la ro sal du gsol// byang chub sems kyang spobams brjod bdag la gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // skyabs gsu mAM de
