251a2(rgyud 'grel): ba gang btab dngos grub thams cad dang // brtse ba chen pos skad cig nyid la ste// mi bsnyil skyob mdzad yum lnga phyag 'tshalo// rgyal ba rin po che'i dgongs po ltar// phun sumo tshogs pa'i dge 'dun rgya mtsho rnams// 'dun pa
251a3(rgyud 'grel): mthun zhing byams pa'i sems ldan nas// bde ldan zhing ltar byin gyis rlab du gsol// sa stong 'dzam bu gling 'di thams cad kyang // phra rol gdug pa'i tshogs ni zhi gyur cing // bka' rgyud rin chen dar zhing rgyas pa dang // 'phrin
251a4(rgyud 'grel): las rgyun tshang med par mdzad du gsol// thub pa'i bstan pa nyo bzhin gsal gyur cing // sgrub pa po rnams gang du gnas pa'i sngar// byin gyis rlob cing mnyam par gzhog pa dang // sgrub pa'i 'bras bu myur du smin mdzad gsol
251a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag cag gang du gnas pa'i sa phyogasu// mngon dga'o zhing dang dga' tshal lta bur ni// sems can sdug bsngal thams cad zhi gyur cing // 'gro rnams bde tshan sa la 'god par she ga/ dang nas bzung nas byang chub snying po'i
251a6(rgyud 'grel): bar// bcom ldan 'das ma khyod dang mi 'brel zhing // thugs rje'i lcags kyus rtag tu bzung nas kyang // dus rnams thams cad byin gyis brlab du gsol// yon tan mtha' yas bcom ldan 'das ma la// cung zad bstod pa'i
251b1(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams ci mchis pa// 'gro drug 'khor ba'i sems can ma lus pa// blo med byang chub dam pa myur thob shog// 'di mtshan yongasu grags pa rin po ches gsungs pa rdzogaso//
251b2(rgyud 'grel): bod kyi sgyu bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba gnyen dge slong d+harma kIrtis ras 'gyur du gtan la pab bya'o// oM thams cad grub pA dpal 'brel lha mi khyod lags kyi// rnam thar yongs rdzogs dri med shA
251b3(rgyud 'grel): rab pha rol phyi na// kun la mnga' mdzad bsdu ba'i tog ltar mdzes// zhabs gnyis rol pas gzhan don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshad med bzhi'i bdud bzhi'i dpung rnams bcom pa kye// gang gis 'dod ngan gsol bde
251b4(rgyud 'grel): ngag grub pa kyi// sku dang phyag zhabs rin chen du mas rnam brgyan kye// bsdu ba dngos po bzhi ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal po stong // dpa' mo rab brjid dus gsum sa ler mkhyen pa kye// 'khor ba'i 'dam nus 'gro ba ma lus 'dren mdzad
251b5(rgyud 'grel): ma// hrI dang hUM phaT rab sgrogs dus gsum dbang phyug ma// bgegs kyi tshigs rnams myur sgrol khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// rnam ngag spyan gyis yul kun dus kun gzigs pa kye// sprul pa'i tshugs kyis srid pa'i 'jigs
251b6(rgyud 'grel): chen 'joms// thugs sgyu mi mnga' rin chen nor 'dra ma sring tshul// thugs rje'i dbang nyid sgrol ma khyod lo phyag 'tshalo// mkhar gnas zla ba nya 'dra bsil ba'i 'od ldan kye// rims stsogs nyon mongs gdung ba kun sel cing //
252a1(rgyud 'grel): gang gis bsam pa'i don grub thams cad rtsol mdzad ma// yid bzhin rin chen sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// thams cad kun la dbang sgyur ye shes 'od 'bar kye// srid gsum skye 'gro ma lus smin+da
252a2(rgyud 'grel): grol mdzad pa ni// yid bzhin 'phrin las bzhi'i yal bAr mi 'dor cing // mkhyen brtse mthu ldan ma cig khyod la phyag 'tshol bstod// phyag bzhi mda' gzhu lcags kyi ud pal 'dzin pa ste// bdag gi las sgrib sdug bsngal ni
252a3(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad pa dang // 'dred don gang gsol myur du 'grub cing dpal la sogs// 'phel bar mdzad cing zhabs la gsol 'debs phyag 'tshal bstod// na mkha'i lta bu rgyal yum rig pa 'dzin ma kye// 'phrin las bzhi mdzad khyed
252a4(rgyud 'grel): zhabs lha dang lha min gyis// tshogs kyis btu tsong kun la dbang bskur mkha' 'gro ma// sa gzhi lta bu'i mthu mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// slob dpon klu grub kyis bstod pa'o//
252a5(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// rang bzhin mtha' bral yid 'ong mngon dga' zhing // yon tan lhun grub bde chen rnam dag pa'i// chos kyi mtho bas dpal ldan po ta la// 'dod yon rin chen spras pa'i
252a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing khams na// gnyis meng 'od gsal dbyings las ma bskyod kyang // 'od dpag med pa'i thugs rje rin chen ltar// 'dzam glong chags chen skye bo'i don bsgrub phyir// bud med mtshan dpos gzhan la snang mdzad nas// sa bcu'i
252b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug byams sems rig 'dzin dang // rta mgrin la sogs khro rgyal khro mo dang // lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dri za'i tshogs// rig pa'i rgyal mo la sogs skal bzang ma// bstan pa rgya mtshon mkha'i rin chen mdzod// zab cing rgya ma
252b2(rgyud 'grel): re skad dpag dka'i bcud// brjod pas don che thog mtha' dar dge ba// 'jigs dang sdug bsngal nyon mongs las grol ba// rtogs pa'i don la dus gsum 'du 'bral med// 'gro la mos pa'i skabs dang dus snang zhing // sdig
252b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dag byed mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis// thos pas grol phyir gzhan la brjod par bya// chos nyid spros bral bde chen zab mo'i don// gnyis meng blang dor med par thugasu chud// mtshan ma'i rtog pa skye med dbyings su grolnga// dus
252b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum gcig tu mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas ma// dgongs pa'i don la mnyam nyid mi g.yo yang // brtse ba'i thugs rjes sems can gzhan don la// mdzad pa'i thabs kyis gang la gang 'dul ba'i// ma ngos cir yang 'tsher bI'i sgra'i
252b5(rgyud 'grel): ba ma// shin tu dpag med ya nga'i gnas rnamasu// 'jigs pa brgyad sogs gdon gyis nyen pa la// bsnyems pa med pa 'phrul gyis blo gros kyis// 'khor gyi 'jigs pa sel ba'i rje blon ma// gzhon nu'i las la tshul khrims dri
252b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom nas// khrel yong ngo tsha shes pa'i gsang gos bsgris// chog shes rnam ngag mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// 'chal ba'i skyon gyis me gos khrims btsun ma// rnam shes sdug bsngal rgya mtshor bying ba la// 'dren pa'i
253a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje thabs kyi zhags pa yis// 'gro drug byang chub skam sar 'don mdzad pa'i// srid pa'i skyon gyis ma gos khyad 'phags ma// snang skyong gnyis med mkha' dbyings zung 'jug cing // rtogs pa'i
253a2(rgyud 'grel): rig pas gnas lugs don la sbyor// ting 'dzin thabs kyis bde ba'i ye shes skyed // dus gsum sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i yum gcig mo// skye rgas na 'tsho'i chu bo rgal dka' ba// rgyud ldi'i mi dge rab kair 'khyam pa la//
253a3(rgyud 'grel): snying rje byang chub sems kyis gru gzengs kyis// sdug bsngal chu bo sgrol ba'i kun sgrol ma// 'gro ba 'dron po srid pa'i lam rgyun rnams// zag med bde ba'i nor gyis 'phangs pa la// thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin chen gser gling
253a4(rgyud 'grel): gis// thar pa'i grong du 'dren pa'i deng dpon ma// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal khang pa na// dug gsum gcong gis zin pa'i nad pa rnams// dam chos bdud rtsi sman gyis chu rgyun gyis// sdug bsngal zug rngu sel ba'i
253a5(rgyud 'grel): sman mdzad ma// 'dod pas gdung ba'i skye bo chags can la// rini chen+da gter mdzad 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang // zag med yon tan gdul bya'i bsam pa bzhin// dgos 'dod rwa ba steng bA'i nor bu ma// snyigs ma'i skal par
253a6(rgyud 'grel): nond mtshon mu ge'o// sems can dus man blo bur 'chi ba la// skye 'chi 'pho 'gyur med par thugs chud nas// dus gsum bsgres rgung med po'i rigs 'dzin ma// rang rgyud nyes pa'i dmag gis bcom pa la// bzod pa'i go gyon
253b1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab mtshon cha yis// nyon mongs log pa'i dpung rnams 'jom mdzad cing // 'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal ba'i dpa' mdzad ma// 'gro kun sred pa'i nyes pas skom pa la// chags med bdud rtsi'i chu yis 'gro rnams la/
253b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyun chad med par rab tu tshim byed cing // nad med chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ma// gzi brjid 'od kyis gza' bdud zil gyis gnon// mkhyen pa'i zer gyis blo'i pad mo 'byed// thugs rje'i 'od kyis srid pa'i chu klung skems//
253b3(rgyud 'grel): mithon dman kun la gsal ba'i rnga bdun la// lha bran skar tshogs nang na zla nya'i zhal// nyes pa'i gza' bral sgrib pa'i rab rib bsal// nyon mongs gdung ba'i tshul khrims bsil zer can// yon tan ri bong 'dzin phyir yid
253b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zla rgyas ma// bsam gtan rdzing bur nyams kyi pad sdong 'khrungs// dred rtag lo 'dab bde ba'i gA sarI rgyas// gdangs pa'i dri bsung bung ba'i 'khor tshogs tshims// bying rgod 'dam gyis ma gos chu skyes ma// rna mo dag
253b5(rgyud 'grel): gangs ror nus pa'i rdul tshan rdzogs// rigs pa'i mchu sder mu stegs ri dgos 'joms// bdag med sgri'i nyan thos wa tshogs skyegs// theg dman zil gyis gnon phyir mau 'jigs ma// dga' ba'i tshol nas byang chub stobs
253b6(rgyud 'grel): chen rdzogs// ting 'dzin chang gi nus mthus glang chen myos// don pa'i mtshon chas bag med g.yul ngo 'joms// mos pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i rab brtan ma// 'khor ba mya ngan thang la 'khyam pa la// theg chen myur mgyogs
254a1(rgyud 'grel): shugs kyi zhon pa lnga// rdzu 'phrul rkang pas theg chen lam bskyod nas// smon lam shes rab rdzogs pa'i cang shes ma// nyon mongs dug la spyod kyang zhen pa med// nyes tshogs skyon gyis ma gos
254a2(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog mdzes// ma yengs chos nyid zab mo'i mad la gzigs// ngo mtshar mdzes pa skyed pa'i rma bya ma// stong pa'i mkha' ltar lta ba'i gshogs rlabs gcod// ngan song gcong rong g.yang sar nyam pa med// brtul zhugs
254a3(rgyud 'grel): mchu sder rtogs pa'i klu rgyal 'joms// tshangs pa'i gsung snyan ka la bing kra mA// bskal pa'i mun nag nyes pa'i rdul khrod du// rin chen sems stor btsal ba'i don chen du// zhi gnas lhag mthong snum gyis sgron me bskyed//
254a4(rgyud 'grel): mamo rig mun pa baM sel ba'i snang gsal ma// bag chag sA g.ya' bral kun gzhi me long gis// rtog med sgrib pa'i dri maM rnam bsal nas// bsal ba'i thugs lnga brtan pa'i gzugs brnyan shar// gnas lugs rang bzhin
254a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba'i mdzes ston ma// lnga phung btson rar yid kyi btson bu de// bdag 'dzin nyon mongs lcags kyis bcings pa la// stong nyid rnam thar rtogs pa'i lce mig gis// sdug bsngal 'a ching las sgrol ba'i thar byed ma//
254a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'i yul ngan sdig pa'i smig rum na// snyoms las le lo gnyis kyis non pa la// brtson 'grus glog dang chos kyi 'brug sgra yis// gsal zhing go bar sgrogs pa'i dbyangs chen ma// 'jig tshogs phung po mi gtsang
254b1(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod nas// lta ba'i tshe srog rtag chad mthar shi la// byang chub rga shi med pa'i bdud rtsi yis// skye 'gag med par gso ba'i bdud rtsi ma// lde lo g.yeng ba'i bsod nams rA ba na// nyes spyod dgra kun dge ba'i nor 'phrog la// dran pa'i
254b2(rgyud 'grel): so ba bslab bya nyams skobasu// shes bzhin mes rtses bsrung ba'i 'tsho byed ma// lig lta'i than pos dge ba'i myu gu gdungs// byams pa'i sprin 'dus thugs rje'i chu rgyun gyis// dad pa'i zhing sbrengs byang chub lo tog rnams// sman
254b3(rgyud 'grel): bas 'jig rten gso ba'i 'tsho byed ma// nam zhig srog gi dbang po 'gag pa'i tshe// bshes gnyen srog dang bral nas gshin rjes khrid// nyams reg nga ros 'o dad 'bod pa la// 'jigs pa skyob phyir srid gsum gnyen cig ma//
254b4(rgyud 'grel): rtsod dus lnga brgya'i skye bo dug lnga rig/ sangs rgyas bka' slong mkhas pa'i sku la bsngo// log lngas byang chub bar chad byed pa'i// dgra bo myur du gsod pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// shes rab mig bu ma rig ling thogs gis// mdongs nas mi
254b5(rgyud 'grel): khom gseng sar lhung ba la// bsdu ba'i lcags kyus bzung nas yang dag lam// ma nor drang por 'jug pa'i lam ston ma// sems bsgreng stobs dang smon lam 'phel stobs kyis// dus gsum mi bshol thugs rje phyi shol
254b6(rgyud 'grel): med// sems can don la 'khor ba ma stong par// dam bcas skyo du ba med pa'i byams sems ma// rtogs pa'i chos nyid mkha' la 'gro gyur kyang // gdug pa 'dul phyir khro mo'i skur sprul nas// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i bar chad
255a1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa yi// drag po myur du gsod pa'i sgrol byed ma// de ltar mtshan gyi me tog bcu rtsa gnyis// dpe byad brgyad cu 'bras bu'i bstod pa ni// don kun grub byed rin chen rgyan 'drar mdzes// rgyal ba kun gyi bstod
255a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyal po mchog/ mtshon thos pas ni skal pa steng gi bar// ngani song mi skye las ngan sdig sgrib 'dzangad // glo bur 'jigs pa kun las ther byed cing // blo ldan rigs dang skal bar ldan par byed// gang zhig gtsang sbra nang par sngar
255a3(rgyud 'grel): layang ste// spro zhing gus par ma yengs ting 'dzin gyis// gsum 'am bdun na mo nyi shu rtsa gcig sogs// klog gam kha ton brjod pa rab bsgrags na// tshe rabs sngon gyi las ngan bag chags sang // nyon mongs mi dge sdig sgrib
255a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar byed// mtshams yang lnga dang nye ba lnga la sogs// sdig pa stobs chen ma lus dag par byed// ngan 'gro sdug bsngal 'tshong ba gcod byed cing // srid pa'i sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur// mchog dang thun mongs
255a5(rgyud 'grel): yon tan rdzogs par byed// rgyal ba kun gyi sra su dbang bskur zhing // byang sems mkha' 'gro lha srin sde brgyad gyis// grogs dang rje bor bkur ba'i gnasu mthong // bgra la nyal dang shes bya'i sgrub pa rnams// dag cing sangs
255a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas go 'phang myur du 'thob// tshe 'dir 'jigs pa gnod sbyin srin po dang // 'byung po ro langs sha za mang po'i tshogs// grib gnon la sogs rtsub cing sdang sems kyis// gnod pa'i 'jigs pa dran pas sel bar byed//
255b1(rgyud 'grel): pha rol dmag tshogs gra can zan mi rgod pa dang // rkun po dugu sbrul rgyal po'i chad pa dang // seng ge glang po stag dang me dang chu// 'jigs pa brgyad sogs dus min 'chi ba rnams// mtshan 'di dran pas mos bla rab brjod na//
255b2(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal zhi zhing sdig las thar par 'gyur// mdzed dang rims dang dug nad la sogs pa'i// gnod pa'i sdug bsngal zhi zhing sel bar byed// grags dang bkra shis bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// dpal dang tshe/
255b3(rgyud 'grel): dang rang bzhin rgyas gyur te// nor dang ljongase sbyong bu tsa 'phel bar 'gyur// shes rab 'phel zhing bstan chos rig par 'gyur// gtsug log mkhas shing tha snyad rgyal 'gyur te// rten 'brel gsal zhing drod rtags yon
255b4(rgyud 'grel): tan 'byung // mngon shes 'char zhing skye ba dran par byed// gzi brjid ldan zhing yid 'ong mthong dgar 'gyur// gsung dbyangs tshangs pa'i dbyangs bzhin snyan 'gyur zhing // ngag tshig gsal zhing lus sems dpa' bar byed//
255b5(rgyud 'grel): gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du// sangs rgyas kun gyis rtag tu mi spang zhing // dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten cang mi 'bral bar// 'dod pa'i don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la
255b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bstod pa don thams cad grub par byed pa// rin chen brgyan 'dra zhes bya ba// kha tshe nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
256a1(rgyud 'grel): lags ma sgrol ma'i bkra shis bzhug so//
256b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ar+yA ta rA mang ga la gI ti/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bkru shis pa// dpal dag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum gyur dge ma che// das gsu
256b2(rgyud 'grel): rtag par zla rgyas zhal can yid 'ong sgregs// gzhon nu'i rol pas 'jig rten khyab par gsal mdzad sgrol// 'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde logs shog/ phyogs bcu'i dus gsum kun tu byang chub sems dpa' lcam// pad+ma
256b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i zhal nas 'od zer 'bum dang bcas// yud tsam skad cig blo 'gyur zhing khams du ma khyab// 'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs shog/ phyogs bcu'i gsung dbyangs du mas chos kyo cha pa 'beb// lan lag bcu
256b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gsung dbyangs yi ge bcur bsdus nas// pha rol phyin bcu'i tshul gyis gdul bya 'dul byed pa// 'gro ba'i sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde lag u shog/ phyogs bcur 'od kyis 'gangs mdzad mgron po bcom ldan 'das//
256b5(rgyud 'grel): tshe dpag med pa dbu la rgyan mdze saM khur du khur// bla ma skyong mdzad dam tshig mi spang sdom pa can// 'gro ba sgrol mdzad sbrul ma'i bde legs shog/ phyogs bcu'i 'phags lom 'gro ba ma lus pa// thugs rjes gzigs nas bde thebs du
256b6(rgyud 'grel): mas rtsol mdzad pa// dgra bcom rang rgyal sogs dang bu mo'i gzugs 'dzin rgyale// 'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs shog/ phyogs bcur 'gro ba rnamasu rtag par 'jigs pa brgyad sel phyir// kha dog dkar
257a1(rgyud 'grel): dmar sngo ljang ser nag sogs// du ma'i gzugs bzang rlung bzhin myur du rgyu bar mdzad// 'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis byang legs shog/ phyogs bcu kun tu gsal mdzad nyi ma'i 'od zer can//
257a2(rgyud 'grel): lha'i 'khor los gsang ba'i brag phug nang gnas pa// thugs rje'i spyan gyis rgyun chad med par gzigs pa'i// 'gro ba sgrol mdzad sbrel ma'i bkra shis shog/ phyogs rnams gzugs mdzes khyab pa'i lha'i 'khor lo ni// nor bzang
257a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer can dang phag mo khro gnyer can// rtag par phyi bzhin 'brang mdzod mdzes pa'i 'khor gyis brgyan// 'gro ba sgrol ba mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs shog/ po ta lar ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po'i mthus// rig pa'i lha
257a4(rgyud 'grel): mo tshogs rnams 'gro don bya'o zhes// rtag par zhal gyis bzhes nas nad gdon kun sel ba'i// 'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs shog/ phyogs bcu'i dad ldan bsgrub pu rnams kyis dran tsam gyis// rgyal po me chu
257a5(rgyud 'grel): glang chen rkun po gdon sbrul gdug/ mu ge mtshon 'khrug nad yams dran pas zhi byed pa'i// 'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shes bde legs shog/ phyogs bcur bud med gzugs mdzes rnams ni bsdus// sgrol ma'i sku'i brgya'i
257a6(rgyud 'grel): char nye bar lha mi klu mo lha min pa// gnod sbyin mo mdzes rnams kyis bcu drug char mi pod// 'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs shog/ phyogs bcu'i lha mo rnams dang rin chen rnams kyi 'od // kun bsdus sgrol ma'i
257b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi brgya'i char mi nye// 'on kyang rin chen tshogs mnga' rab sgags mdzad rnams brgyan// 'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bang lags shog/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams kyi mtshan ni yi ge bcu// oM yig ta re dang bcas
257b2(rgyud 'grel): khyad par tud ta re// ta raM swA hA sa mya ngan 'das mchog zhi bya bsgrub// 'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs shog/ phyogs bcur spyan dang mu ma gos kar la sogs rigs// mi'i chags kyi rnga yab dri za can thogasu nas/
257b3(rgyud 'grel): sobasnyan chags dang skan po'i dbyangs kyis sgrol mya bstod// 'gro ba sbre ba mdzad sgrol me'i bkra shrIs bde legs shog/ phyogs bcur rigs 'dzin tshogs rnams 'gro phan gang spyod kyang // rje ma khyod dran tsam gyis nyi ma'i 'od
257b4(rgyud 'grel): // nyon mongs mun pa sal cing sdug bsngal tshogs las skyob// 'gro ba sgrol mdzad spel ma'i bak+t+ra shis bde lags shog/ phyogs bcu'i khro bo chen po ga shin rtog sh+yeng so rnams// sgrol mo dran byed rnam kun bsrungs la
257b5(rgyud 'grel): brtson// khyad 'jug la sogs lnga chen rnams kyis rjes 'brang ba// 'gro ba spel mdzad sbrel mA'i bkra shis byeng legs shog/ 'phagos ma'i sbrel mo'i bkra shis brjod pa rdzogas+ho/ pan Ti te s+yAr+yA sr-i dang / lo ts+tsha
257b6(rgyud 'grel): longs sa dge slong tshul khrims rtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o// oM ku ru ku le hI hUM swa swA hA// oM ta re tud ta re tu re swA hA/ bkra shis par shog/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ kha d+hi ro d+ha re sto dra/
258a1(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ sreng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma la bstod pa/ 'phags ma seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma la phyag 'tsha lo// 'phags ma'i pho brang seng ljang nags na sgrol ma rtsa// u dum wa ra seng ldeng rgyu shug n+ya gro ta/
258a2(rgyud 'grel): tsacan dan 'bras bu gsum stong dza tI lI shi'i tshal// kha zum kha bye mo dreg shing lo nyams dge ri gnas// ljon shing 'obras bu srin dang ma sbyin tAM bo la// yan lag brgyad ldan chu ni lhung lhung sgra snyan la// rma d+ye na tse khri byug bzhad
258a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams sgra sbyin sgrags// stag gzig rgyug cing e nas gar byed dom dred mchongs// lha sbrang glu len sne ste khri snyan be'u sngun// lha'i bu mo gzhon nu nags na drug ljon le ni// dge slong klu grub seng ldeng nags na grub chen
258a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// sgrol ma gshegs bzhung zhing khams gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// skye med thugs rje'i mtsho las pad ma mar gad mdog/ me tog zla mdzes bud med rin chen bcud kyis mdzes// dang de'i 'gros lta dbying
258a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing gnyis 'thung dreg bzhin gzigs// bde gshegs thugs rje'i rlan gyis gang mos skur ston ma// gser gyi pad mas snyan brgyan ud pal dar dpyangs can// rin chen rje bran dbu la don grub cod pan bzhugs//
258a6(rgyud 'grel): rumu tig bcom b+hu ru'i chun 'byangs 'gur chu mdzes// phyag zhabs gdu gu dpung brgyan sku reg dar sgeg ma// thugs rje 'khor ba las sgrol phyag no pad me yis// spyan gyi cheb las lha mo sku 'khrungs 'od dpag
258b1(rgyud 'grel): med// smon lam mthu yis brtse chen gzhan gyi don la brtson// zhing mchog rnam drag seng ldeng nags kyi gzhon nu ma// zhal gyi pad+ma ma yid 'ong bzhin ni zla ltar rgyas// chu skyes spyan mdzes dkyus ring dkar nag mdangs
258b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba// mgor skyes khur bu gser gyis sgra brgyan bung ltar gnag/ ba'i rdo 'dra snum zhing mdzod spu dung 'khyal ma// bden gnyis phyag ni ud ngal kha 'byed bdag segs kyi// gti mug mun sel snying gi chu skyes kha
258b3(rgyud 'grel): dnga.a na// ud pal g.yon bsnams ye shes rgyas mdzad g.yas pa yis// 'gro po rnams bung ba'i me tig sngon po kha 'byeb ma// srid par lhung nas mya ngan smr-i sngags 'don pa la// sems can don mdzad steng lding nags
258b4(rgyud 'grel): nas bzhengs la gshegs// lang tso dar bab 'am rgyas pa'i nu 'bur can// sna tshogs thabs kyis sid zhi g.yo zhing bskyod mdzad ma// khyu mchog sbrang mo 'gyed bag lte ba pad ma tsun// dza ti tsam pa li shi d+hi drang bzang por
258b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan+da// phyag zhabs pad+ma ltar dmar 'khor ba'i skyon ma gos// pan tsa li ga lha dar sdeng smad brgyan byas ma// nyi tshe'i sku mi no khyab pas thugs rje'i 'dro ni las sku// thub pas rgya mtshor gsungs pa klu grub snying po yis// na gsu
258b6(rgyud 'grel): gzigs sems cani dal gyis khur tshan khyer// tshangs chings srid pa'i nags nas zhi bar sgrol mdzod ma// bsgres mi gzhon nu'i tshul 'dzin sangs rgyas kun gyi phyi// ming tsam dran pa nyid kyis 'jigs las bskyob mdzad ma//
259a1(rgyud 'grel): yun ring 'khor bar mi skyo zhi bar mi gnas pa'i// sa bcu'i dbang phyug rgyal sras rnams kyi thugs rje ma// rje btsun ston mtha' yas bdag gis brjod mi nus// kun tu rtogs spangs ye shes mang
259a2(rgyud 'grel): brnyes chos kyi sku// gzhan gyi don phyir sku ni seng ldeng nags na gshegs bzhud mdzad// srid las bdag grol nags kyi du me phyug 'tshal bstod// 'od zer ral gcig ser sde g.yas g.yon phyogs tshwar gshegs/
259a3(rgyud 'grel): zhi khro'i phyag ga nyis rdo rje a sho gri khug thigs// sde phyir bzhud cing dpe med gus ldan bsnyen bskur mdzad// mdzes ma nye 'khor 'od zer ral cig phyag 'tshal bstod// sngon mched phyi nas gdugs khur rigs rgyal bu
259a4(rgyud 'grel): mo'i tshe gos// rnga yab ting sheg rngu gling pi bang glu gar 'gangs// lha'i bu mo bco lnga rgyan ldan na bza' mdzes// sna tshogs sku yis mchod dasnams rol la phyag 'tshal bstod// na ges tshal lho me sku mdzes dag ma 'khor bcas
259a5(rgyud 'grel): la// bdag gis bstod bgyis mi bzad dge ba bzang po des// 'gro ba kun thugs rje'i chu'i nyon mongs kun dag nas// srid pa'i nags nas zhi ba'i tshal du phyin par shog/ gzhon nu kha ti ta re ma la bstod
259a6(rgyud 'grel): pa tshigasu bcad pa bcu drug pa// slob dpon 'phags pa klu grub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
260b1(rgyud 'grel): a tha ma hA b+hA ga b+hUHdz+nyA d+hA ra sarba tA b+hU gA tA grA ma hISh+TaM/ sa ma ya twAR+YA nU ma sar+b+ba ku la ta thA gat+sa/ bar+N+Narat+na bad+d+ha kar+m+ma d+hA bti/ tsA ra Ni tsA raklA r+N+NaHs+t+rI ra Na tsa tsa k+Sha s+yA b+hUH
260b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog/ dam tshig sgrol ma zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang las kyi rigs tha
260b3(rgyud 'grel): gu h+yA ti gu d+h+ya ta re mA hwA gu N+ye shwa re ma hA gud+d+haMsh+tsa re/ ad+b+ha nAM badz+ra nA me mi swa kA ya bAny+tsi ta d+hA badz+dzab+h+yo ni ts+tsho rA yan thAg wa tI tA rA bidz+r-i Na samA ya tA rI badz+ra ma hA yo ga
260b4(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi bdag po/ rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i byed po brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i rang bzhin gsang ba las ches shin tu gsang ba/ gsang bya chen po'i dbang phyug mas bdag nyid kyi rdo rje'i ming 'di rnams nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las
260b5(rgyud 'grel): nIpany+tsA d+hA na dzUShi tA badz+ra pany+dza mu ku TuMHsarba bud+d+ha b+hI ShaM ka/ dz+nyA nA maN+Da lasuM tsan+na/ a ho k+She ma kA ya we krIt+ta rany+dza nI ya sken+d+ha pa ti A ya ta na
260b6(rgyud 'grel): drung // bcom ldan 'das ma/ sgrol ma/ rdo rje ma/ dam tshig sgrol ma/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo/ ye shes lngas brgyan pa ma/ rdo rje cod paN lnga dang ldan ma// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur ma/ ye shes dal/ zla ba'i bden
261a1(rgyud 'grel): tabi de sha swa b+hU wA tan+te shwa rI pany+tsa dz+nyA na bo d+ha[:]bi ra dzo bi ma lo ma hAm+bAn+ta[:]a ti suk+tA bi tsi tri two la k+Sha NA nu byAny+dzanaM[:]shu d+hI tam hA shud+d+hi ta
261a2(rgyud 'grel): ngo mtshar bde ma/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'dod ma phung po'i bdeg mo// skye mche da kyi bdag por gyur pa/ 'byung ba rnams rab tu thob pa/ yul dang bral ba'i rang bzhin/ rgyu de kun gyi dbang phyug ma/ ye shes rnam pa lngas byang chub
261a3(rgyud 'grel): sarba karma sid+hA kA sarba kA ma pra daM da shAk+ShA rag+h+ra rdza na ru la r-I tI tud+d+ha rA tu re bI dz+nyA na pa ri shud+d+ha d+hI d+hA sud+b+ha gAr+N+Na ma hU su kheHte tre daM yo gI nI sa na ya s+thA ta d+ya hA tsa Ar+ya tA rA nI nA ma dA sha satwa so+o/ nau sh+tsa Ire b+ha/

269a6(rgyud 'grel): skyeng du bruM las 'khor lor gyur// de las snang mdzad tshe dpag med// dkar zhing dkyil krung bzhugs pa'o// g.yon du pad zla nyi ma las// dbyings phyug ma ni dung gi mdog/ 'gying bcas rin chen brgyan gyis sbas// zha
269b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis rdo rje dkyil krungaso// byang du pang zla nyi ma yi// steng du a las rgya gram pa// de las dron grub tshe dpag med// mdog ljang bum pa dkyil krung mdzes// g.yon du pad zla ba'i steng // ta las dam tshig sgrol ma ni// sngo
269b2(rgyud 'grel): ljang sna tshogs rgyun gyis mdzes// thugs kha dum pa 'dzin pa'o// sher khyams zla ba'i gdan steng su// hUM baM ni rdo rje bzhir gyur pas// rdo rje rigs kyi sems dpa' bano// g.yas pa rang rtags rdo rje 'dzin// g.yon
269b3(rgyud 'grel): po chu'i bum pa 'dzin// rgyan+da mdzes rdo rje'i dkyil krung mdzes// lho phyogs bod ma zla ba'i steng // swa las rin chen 'bar ba bzhin// rin chen rigs kyi sems par gyur// g.yas pa rin chen g.yon pa na/
269b4(rgyud 'grel): tshe'i bum pa thugs khar 'dzin// btso mo gser 'dra dkyil krung bcu gos// nub du pad zla hU~M bzhi las// pad ma 'deb lngar gyur pa las// pad ma'i sems dpa' bzhi ru gyur// phyag g.yas rang rtags pad ma
269b5(rgyud 'grel): bsnams// g.yon pa bum 'dzin rgyan spras shing // dkyil krung dag gis bzhugs pa'o// byang du gdan stengs a bzhi las// rdo rje rgya gram las gyur pa'i// las kyi sems dpa' bzhi ru gyur// sngo ljang rgya
269b6(rgyud 'grel): gram pa 'dzin// gzhon sgeg mdzes shing dkyil krung bzhugs// 'od zer tshogs kyis bskor ba'o// shar sgor dza dang lcags kyu las// lcags kyu ma ni mu tig mdog/ lho sgor hUM las zhags pa ser// nube duH
270a1(rgyud 'grel): las lcags sgrog dmar// byang du ho las dril bu ljang // lha mo de dag thams cad kyang // 'khril ldem gzhon skrag rgyan spras mdzes// zhal ni phyir gzigs bzhengs pa'o// gru chad bzhi la
270a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i// lha mo spyi dang 'thun par bsam// de las thugs kha'i 'od zer gyis// rang bzhin gnas nas ye shes pa// 'di brjod spyan ni drang bar bsam// hUM gdod nas rang bzhin mkha' ltar dag/ thugs rjes gzha
270a3(rgyud 'grel): tshon skur ston pa// bcom ldan gsung mchog 'od dpag med// rang bzhin lhun grub gzhal yas nas// ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dam pa 'dir// 'gro ba'i don du spyan 'dren na// tshe zad tshe nyams bsal mdzad phyir//
270a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'di nyid du gshegasu gsol// rdo rje rin chen pad ma dang // las kyi rigs mchog tshe dpag med// mchod pa'i lha mo rnam bzhi dang // sems pa bcu drug sgo mar bcas// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po nas//
270a5(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dam pa 'dir// tshe dang longs spyod rgyas pa dang // thugs mchog ye shes thob bya'i phyir// gnas 'di nyid du spyan 'dren gyis// byin gyis brlab phyir gshegasu gsol// dza hUM baM hos dgug
270a6(rgyud 'grel): cing gzhug/ mnyes par gyur pa la mchod pa dang // bstod pa rgyas dang bsdus pa bya// sku gsung thugs ni byin gyis brlab// de nas byang rgod rab spangs lo// ma yengs lho rnams rab tu bsgom// de rjes bzlas pa bya ba
270b1(rgyud 'grel): nIni// lha rnams thugs kha'i bum pa'i nang // hrI hUM s+ya bruM a las ni// rang rang sngags kyis bskor bar bsgom// oM hI bruM badz+ra dz+nyA na a yu she swA hA// oM hUM bruM badz+ra dz+nyA na a yu she swA hA// oM swa bruM badz+ra dz+nyA na a yu shaM swA hA/
270b2(rgyud 'grel): AM b+h+rUM bruM badz+ra dz+nyA na a yu she swA hA// oM a b+h+rUM badz+rI dz+nyA nA a yu she swA hA// de rnams yab kyi bsnyen pa'o// yum gyi bum par a pA ra// mi ta bsams la sngags 'dis bskor// oM bruM A ba ra mi ta a yu dz+nyA nA su bi
270b3(rgyud 'grel): ninINi rti ti tsa ra tsi ya swA hA// yum mchog lnga'i snying po brjod// phyogs bcu'i sems dpa' bcu drug po// gtso bo'i sngags rnams bskor ba bsgom// dza hUM baM ho e pa ra mi ta a yu dz+nyA nA su b+hi ni swA hA// sgo ma bzhi'i snying po'o//
270b4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bum pa'i sngags rnams la// dmigs nas bzlas po byas pa yis// yig 'bru rnams las bdud rtsi'i rgyun// byung bas bum pa gang bar bsam// bum nang ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun// rang gi gnas gsum thim pa
270b5(rgyud 'grel): yis// lus ngag yid gsum nad gdon dang // sdig sgrib dag nas dbang bzhi thob// 'chi meng dngos grub thob par bsam// de nas rang gis sngags bzlas pas// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad kyang // rang rang gas pa/
270b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags zlos par bsam// rang snying sa bon shar phyogs nas// lha mo dkar mo lcags kyu thogs// dpag med sharu 'phros pa yis// nad gdon zhi ba'i las byas nas// dri za'i lag nas tshe bkug nas// rang dang bum
271a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bstim par bya// de bzhin lce'i zhags pa las// tshwa dang longs spyod rgyas byas nas// gshin rje'i lag nas che bkug nas// gong bzhin du ni bstim par bya// nub kyi lcags sgrog dam po yis//
271a2(rgyud 'grel): srid po gsum ma lus dbang bsdus te// chu lha'i lag nas tshe bkug nas// bstim zhing klu gdon dag par bsam// byang gi dril bu dgas mdzad mas// nad gdon log 'don tshar bcad nas// gnod sbyin lag nas tshe bkug
271a3(rgyud 'grel): nas// gong bzhin dmigs pa gsal bas bstim// shar phyogs rnam rgyal bum par ni// rdzas drang 'gul chings kha rgyan bcas// phyag mtshan bris la bzhug par bya// phyi ni bum pa'i rnam pa la// nang ni gzhal yas khang du
271a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam// gong bzhi/ na bdud rtsis bum pa gang // de yis rang gzhan thams cad kyi// nang gden sdig sgrib sangs dag nos// 'chi med dngos grub theb par bsam// las bum rta mgrin bskyed pa yang // bgegs kyi steng du
271a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag par bya// de yis rang gzhan bar chad srung // bdud rtsi dmar pos khrus bya'o// de ltar rang don gzhan don la// ma yengs bskyed rim gsal po yis// zla ba gcig tu sngags bzlas ni// rtags rdzogs zla drug zhal mthob
271a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de yong rgyun du nyams len na// kha to'i skad kyis ma nor bar// mdun du gca ba yab yum bsam// gsol ba btab la mchod bstod bya// bum pa dag la dmigs nas ni// gsang sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// nga'i
271b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i rgyun byung nas// rang gi spyi gtsug thim pa yis// 'chi med tshe'i dngos grub thob// tshe dpag med par gyur par bsam// brtan pa'i yan lag sngags bzlas so// de yis tshe nyid nyi zlar 'gyur// tshe nyams la sogs
271b2(rgyud 'grel): smos ci dgos// gsangs nas bsgrub pa rab tu bsngags// / de nas gsang sgrub bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor gong dang 'dra ba la// yab lnga'i sku mdog dmar zhing 'tsher// sna tshogs rin
271b3(rgyud 'grel): chen rgyan gyis spras// bum pa thod par bcas 'dzin pa// rdo rje dkyil krungs bzhug so// yum lnga sku mdog yab dang 'dra// gzhon sgog rgyan mdzes sku sha rgyas// 'dzum zhing nu ma 'dur ba yi// g.yas pa pad+ma rdo rje dang // rin
271b4(rgyud 'grel): chen 'khor lo rgya gram ste// g.yas pa rang rtags phyag mtshan 'dzin// g.yon pa thad pa bdud rtsis bkang // yab la stob cing dkyil krungs 'khril// yab kyi 'od zer dkar ba'i mdog/ yum la phrog cing yum gyi ni// 'ong
271b5(rgyud 'grel): zla ra yab la phog pA yi// yab yum 'od zer tshogs 'khrug cing // snyoms 'jug zag med bde ba rgyus// gnyi su med pa'i sbyor mtshams nas// byang sems dkar dmar bdud rtsi'i rgyun// rang gri gnas gsum phog pa
271b6(rgyud 'grel): yis// lus ngag yid gsum sdig sgrib dag/ thun mong mi yin dbang bzhi thob// rang lus zag maud bde bas rgyas// ye shes lus la mgon por bskyed// shar phyogs khyams la rdo rje'i rigs// khro ba zhal cig
272a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis pa// mdog dmar phyag g.yas rdo rje bsnams// g.yon pa ra ga'i bum pa bsnams// sbrul dang rin tshun sna tshogs brgyan// me ri 'bar ba'i rlong dkyil gnas// grayas bskum g.yon brkyang
272a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs pa'o// yum kyang mdog dmar rdo rje dang // bum po 'dzin cing yab la 'khyud// khro zhing cung zad dgyes par bsam// lho phyogasu ni rin chen rigs// yob yum g.yas pa rin po che// g.yon na tshe'i bum pa bsnams// nubo
272a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bud d+hA'i khro bo ni// yab yum g.yas pa 'khor lo ste// g.yon pa tshe'i bum pa bsnams// byang shar 'phrin las khro bo ni// yub yum g.yas pa rgya gram bsnams// g.yon pa tshe'i bum pa bsnams// dbus kyi steng dang 'ag
272a4(rgyud 'grel): tu ni// khro ba~M ya bre yum g.yas pa ni// pad+ma 'dab lnga bsnams pa ste// g.yon pa tshe'i bum pa'o// phyogs bzhi khro bo gnyis gnyis bsgom// rgyun dang cha lugs sku mdog rnams// shar phyogs bzhin du bsam pAr
272a5(rgyud 'grel): bya// sgo ma bzhi ni mdog dmar zhing // zhal ni phyir gzigs khro mo'o// gtso bo lnga dang khro bcu'o// bum pa dag la dmigs nas ni// gsang ba'i sngags ni bzlas par bya// oM hri hUM swa bruM a/ dza hUM baM ho/ a pa ra mu
272a6(rgyud 'grel): te yu dz+nyA na ma ha si ti/ ha sa ni r-i swA hA// de skad ma yongs bzlas pa yis// bum pa'i chu rgyun spyi bor phog/ sdig sgrib dag nas dbang bzhi thob// de nas rang nyid yab yum du// gsal la gsang ba'i sngags bzlaso//
272b1(rgyud 'grel): shar dang byang shuR+Sha mtshams su ni// bum pa ltar gnas gong bzhin bsam// rang dang lha rnams sngags zlos bsam// 'chi meng bdud rtsis bum pa khengs// rje su lha rnams zhu ba'i chus// rang gzhan thams cad
272b2(rgyud 'grel): khrus bya'o// de yis mchog dang thun mong gi/ dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas de kho na nyid 'di bsgrub// lus gnang gtum mo bzhin du bya// rang nyid mgo na bor gsal ba yis// gsang gnas
272b3(rgyud 'grel): ches 'byung gru gsum du// hrIHdang r-I las me 'bar bas// khong pa'i nang rnams thams cad khengs// spyi bo haM brgyad zhu ba las// bde chen bdud rtsi'i rgyun babi pas// rtsa rnams khengs pas bde ba rgyas// dred dang
272b4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i khyed par kun// steng 'og rlung gi gnad ces bya// rta bdun ri bong rgyas btab nas// na thar thug lhun grub rnam gsum thob// bcu gsum sa rnams rdzogs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med par
272b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub thabs// ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
273a1(rgyud 'grel): rtse dpag med kyi dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhug so//
273b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ A pa ra mi tA A yu dz+nyA na maN Da la b+hi ti na ma/ bod skad du/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu mang
273b2(rgyud 'grel): pa la phyag 'tshalo// rang bzhin tshe dpag med pa'i sku// ye shes lnga ldan gsung gi bdag/ thugs rje'i thugs kyis rjes 'dzin pa'o// bla ma tshe dpag meng la 'dud// rtswa rgyod bshang rgyud las byung ba'i// reg bzang
273b3(rgyud 'grel): bos yongs bzung bshad// slob dben mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing // gzhan phan bsgrub pa'i blo gros can// rang dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub phyir// yid 'ong nyams dge'i gnas nyid du// lnga'i rnal 'byor gsal ba dang
273b4(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo 'bum la 'khor rnams khri// rab 'bring mtshan ma thub pa dang // slob mas mo tog dang bcas pas// gus pas gsol ba gdab par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor b+hi ba'i phyi raM// sa gzhi bajog cing sbrang dang
273b5(rgyud 'grel): bzung // nyes pa myed pa'i sa phyogs 'dir// bskyed pa'i rim pa gsal byas nas// baM las bskyed pa'i lha mo ster// mdzes pa'i rgyun ldan lus phyed snang // bum pa 'dzin la yo chod cing bstod// sgrib pa sangs rgyas
273b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshulo dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dpong du gyur// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis// ji lta ro bdud kyi sde bcom ldar// de bzhin bdag gis bdud sde las/
274a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri// lag pa sa la bsnun pa las// dga' ba'i mdangs ldan lha mo yis// khyod ni slob dpon mchog yin gyis// dkyil 'khor las ni rab tu bsgrubs// brjod
274a2(rgyud 'grel): nas sa la thim bAr lta// phyogs skyong gtor ma dbul ba dang // 'thun pa'i grogs dang gsol ba gdab// ro bsrel nyes pa spangs po de// 'thas par bcag cing rnam lnga dang // bdud rtsi lngas ni khyab par byug/ me yis
274a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyang dang sngags kyis ni// byin brlabs lha'i khang par bsam// bskyed pa'i yan lag kun rdzogs pas// slob dpon dkyil 'khor steng 'dug la// slob ma gus pas spos thegs te// mchod cing bstod dang gsol ba gdab//
274a4(rgyud 'grel): bco ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// skyon gyis ma gos lI khri ltar// mnga' dang mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba// mnyam nyid sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// yon tan ma lus bskyed mdzad cing // yid bzhin nor bu mtshungs ldan pa'i// 'gro
274a5(rgyud 'grel): skyob la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshe dpag med pa gsung gi bdeg/ 'chi bdag mya lus 'joms mdzad pa'i// tshe'i dngos grub gsol ba'i sku// dkyil 'khor dam pa bo shad du gsol// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// dkyil 'a
274a6(rgyud 'grel): ngo sdus te rta mchog skur// khro zhing brjid pa'i nga rgyal dang // rkang pa hUM las rdo rjer byas// mig gnyis nyi zla 'bar ba ste// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yis// 'jigs med byang shar 'tshams song nas// dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la
274b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i// lha dang lha min bgegs tshogs nyon// nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// nga yi bka' las ma 'da' bar// bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'gro bar gyis// gal te mi 'gro 'dug gyur na// ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba yis//
274b2(rgyud 'grel): mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing // lus rnams stong du gyur nas ni// rnam par 'joms par gdon mi za// de bas khyed rnams gzhan du dengs// rta mchog sngags dang yi ge'i 'gres// dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor
274b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// de nas khro bo'i bur pa rnams// ki la ya zhes btab nas kyang // a ko ta yis brdung bar bya// me d+hi sngags kyis byin gyis brla ba// / se'i lha dang lha tshogs rnams// sta gron
274b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bya ba ni// lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed pa dang // mchod cing bstod de spos thogs la// bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag mang // dkyil 'khor lnga tshogs thams cad dang // rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul can// khyed
274b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams la yong mchod pa dang // slob ma rnams lo phan pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' la sogs kun// thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol// rdo rje can bdag che ge zhes// dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengasu gsol// rje su
274b6(rgyud 'grel): brje bar nyer dgongs nas// sang nub dgyes par byon par 'tshal// de nas phyi nang mchod pas mched// dkyil 'khor lhag par gnas pa'o// / rin chen rgyu las byung ba'i// lho che mgrin pa ring
275a1(rgyud 'grel): dang // mchu 'phyang nag po ra ri med// lha grangs mnyam pa las bum dang // rang rang phyug mtshan rdzogs par bya// hA sa d+he ba gser dngul dang // mu tig mu men byi ru bzhug/ nAs til gro sman mud ka dang /
275a2(rgyud 'grel): ga bur dza ti mud ka mchog/ ga pur dzI ti gur gum dang // tsan dan gnyis dang a ka ru// mar dang du ram sbring rtsi dang // lan tsha rnamos kyis lte ba dgrang // kha tshar ma nyams ras gzungs kyis// mgrin pa rab tu brgyan pa dang
275a3(rgyud 'grel): khu rgyun ku sha 'bras bu can// sna tshogs pad ma ras kyi steng // yang na ku sha gdan la bzhugs// bruM las bskyed pa'i gzhal yas khang // chu skyes nyi zla'i gdan steng su// lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed pa dang // sngags bzlas
275a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun// dum pa gang bar bsam pa dang // lha rnams rang rang bstod pa bya// las bum rta mgrin bskyed pa dang // sngags bzlas poro chad bsrung ba dang // sha lnga bdud rtsi gtor mas mchod// 'dod pa'i don la
275a5(rgyud 'grel): gsol pa gdag// slob ma lhag par gnas pa yang // snyom pas me tog bcos pa'o// skye rga 'chi ba na khA yi// chu srin la sogs 'jigs rung ba// srid pa'i mtsho las bdag sgrol mdzod// dga'
275a6(rgyud 'grel): chen khyod bdag ston pa po// slob dpon khyod ni dgongasu gsol// byang chub chen por tshul bstan po'i// mgon po chen por bdag 'tshalo// dam tshig de ni bdag la gsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol// sangs
275b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum de ni bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon pos bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// 'od kyis bur byas sdig pa sbyang // bu tshur theg pa chen po yis// khyod ni tshul chen
275b2(rgyud 'grel): snod yin te// gsang snga gso sbyong tshul cho ga ni// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sangs rgyas dus gsum 'byung ba rnamaso// rdo rje gsong sngags rab bsgoms byas// ye shes mnyam
275b3(rgyud 'grel): mid yang dag brnyes// sgrib pa shAkya seng ge yis// drag po chen po bdud kyi sde// dpung chen dag kyi de yis bcom// de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bla yis blo gros 'ad gyis shig/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis//
275b4(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa bshags pa lo sogs pa// sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga bya// tshe dang ga med pa bdag la dgongs// ma lus zhugs pa'i byung gAshegs rnams// 'di nyid nas bzung sangs rgyas bar// bla med bdag la gzigs
275b5(rgyud 'grel): per mdzod// / dmo tshig sdom pa bzung ba ni// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa ni// yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi//
275b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang // yang dag nyid du bzung bar bya// slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi// dmi tshig yod du 'ong ba la// nyin re bzhin du lan drug tu//
276a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba'i// pad ma'i rigs chen dag pa lnga// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos kyang bzung bar bya// las kyi rigs mchog chen
276a2(rgyud 'grel): po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi// tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// bad
276a3(rgyud 'grel): gis brtan par bzung bar bgyi// gnyis su med pa'i tshangs spyod dang // rang gis dam tshig bsrung bar bgyi// bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams kyis// sangs rgyas myur du bsgrub byas te// sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las// bla
276a4(rgyud 'grel): myed gnasu sgrol bar bgyi// gus pas lan gsum brjod por bya// dpral ba mgrin pa'i snying kha ru// dri'i thig le gsum byas te// rta bdun chu skyes 'khor lo'i steng // thugs gsung sku'i snying pos brgyan// rigs kyi lha las
276a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'phros pas// ye shes gnyis su med par bstim// chu gnyis mngon du 'gro bas mched// deng nas bzung nas bu khyod kyis// 'khor ba'i nyos par ma gos par// mchod pa kun dang ldan pa ni// bu yis blo gros 'di gyis
276a6(rgyud 'grel): shig/ a shwad tha dad pa la sha/ u dum 'bar ba la sogs pa// bcu gnyis sor gyi tshad dag la// rtse ma me tig gos brgyan nas// maN Da la 'dab brgyad rnam lngas brgyan// shar ltas dbus su dor ba ni// pad ma'i
276b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang bcas pas// steng du mchog gis dngos grub yin// phyogasu 'phrin las 'grub pa yin// 'thur ltas sa 'og 'grub pa yin// 'tshams su 'jig rten dngos grub po// de nas sbyor chu sbyin pa ni// oM hriHbi shut+ta
276b2(rgyud 'grel): d+hid+harmA sarba pa pa tsar+ya bI sho d+ha ya bi kal pa a na ya hUM/ zhes pa sau ngag sbyangs nas/ skud pa dmar po sum sgril la// rtswa mgo na sngags kyis bcing bar bya// ku sha gtsang ma sngas dang stan// mAM ni ro seng ge'i nyal stangs
276b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// thub pas ting 'dzin 'grub pa ltar// mtshan ma gang byung brjod par bya// bzang na dngos grub spro ba bskyed// ngan na sbyin sreg gis bzlog/ zab cing rgya che'i tshes bshad pa ni// 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen ngag/ u dum
276b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i me tog bzhin// nga rgya lam na nI res dga' zhig/ res dga' 'byung ngam mi 'byung srid// gsang sngogs spyod pa'o tshul 'byung ba// de bas kyang ni shin tu dkon// bla ma rdo rje can mchod la// nang por langs te dkyil
276b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lnga// nam mkhar btogs te thig gdab te// bu mo gtsang ma sdom ldan gyi// ras bal gang byung skal ba dang // ye shes lnga'am sku gsung thugs// aM aHn+yo na a nu ga ta sarba d+harmA/ brjod nas sgril bar bya ba ni//
276b6(rgyud 'grel): pad ma'i snod du bzhag nas kyang // mi 'chi lnga yis spangs byas la// blo ldan ye shes bstim byas nas// nam mkhar ye shes dza dzi ga dge// sgo'i bcu gnyis cha dang ljon// srid kyang khang po gnyis 'gyur lo// tshangs pa'i
277a1(rgyud 'grel): lus thig drangs byas la// oM bradz+ra su kra sa ma ya ma ti kra ma hUM/ tshangs dang zur thig la sogs pa// bstan bcos mthong zhing blo ldan des// tshwa ni gang yin rnam pa dbye// gal te nyes pa'i
277a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu ni// chad na bla ma'i srog g.yo zhing // dam+ban lhag nad kyis btab par 'gyur// phyogs 'khrul slob ma rmongs par 'gyur// d+ho lpAn+nanyes pa med par bya// b+hu bzhi sku bzhi rta babs bcas// dro ba dra ba phyed bsna brgyan
277a3(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla dril bu ar+ya khas brgyan// po brang chu skyes rim pa gnyis// mu khyud pad mi'u phreng ba dang // 'khyams dang phyi rol pad ra dang // rdo rje mi ri la sogs pa// rnam pa ma lus rdzogs par bri// rin chenin lnga dang 'bru bya yi// bod
277a4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i snyid du so sor bzhag/ sa bon bris lo ye shes bstim// sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlab// sngon po ser po dkar po ljang // dmyur po 'di ni nang du 'dod// g.yas bskor rgyun ma chad par bri// dbang ldan mtshams
277a5(rgyud 'grel): drang bar bya// pad ma'i snod kyi steng nas byuka ba// 'di ni chos dbyings drag pa ste// sems can khams ni rab sgrol byed// bcom ldan mgon po che dpag med// chen gyis las ni yang dag brtsam// me tog dor la mtshan ma
277a6(rgyud 'grel): be rtag/ shar sngo lho sar nub dkar po// byang phyogs oMn tra ni la'i mdog/ pad ma lha rnams dmar po'o// de ltar rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// khrus byas dri zhim lus byugs nas// gos bzangs brgyan la lan
277b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum bskor// tshe dpag med pa'i nga rgyal gyis// sharam+b+hi sgo nas nang du zhugs// yid kyis sgo bzhi dbye bar bya// oM badz+ra mud g+ha ta sa ma ya pra be sha yA hUM/ rnam rgyal la sogs bum pa rnams// gnas drang go rim bzhin
277b2(rgyud 'grel): du dgod// sna tshogs gos dang rgyan rnams bre// mchod pa'i rdzas kyis legs par brgyan// dkyil 'khor lho rnams rdzogs par bskyed// ye shes bstims la mchod bstod bya// tshogs kyi 'khor los tshim pa dang /
277b3(rgyud 'grel): bar chad zhi phyir shar phyogasu// zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bya ba dang // slob ma'i cho ga ji lta bar// slob dpon bdag nyid dbang dang ldan// shor gyi phyogs nas 'jug pa dang // de nas slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir// khrus byas bgegs
277b4(rgyud 'grel): dang sdig pa sbyong // gdong ba ras kyis bkob nas nI// bu khyod su yin ci la dga'// bdag ni skal bzangs rigs yino// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// slob dpon la ni sbyahA su nu chi// gtso bo lha mor btsos pa yi//
277b5(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams kun+do la phyag 'tshalo// thar pa chen po'i glong mchog tu// mgon pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol// de nas tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// tshe dpag med pa'i grong khyer
277b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya// oM a kha b+hi ra hUM/ me thob don gyis lhal tog phreng ba gtad pa dang // dkyil 'khor lha la phyag 'tshal te// oM na ma te hUM/ oM na ma mi hUM/
278a1(rgyud 'grel): nA mo na ma hUM swA hA/ shar nas zhugs dang lho nas dbang // nub nas chos bshad byang nas ni// 'phrin las bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i// don du gsol ba gdab pa ni// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza u pa thA na
278a2(rgyud 'grel): ya ad ma naM/ ni s+ya ta ya mi sarba ta thA ga tA badz+ra sa twa a stiSh+ThA s+yA maM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza a b+hi she ka ta ad ma naM nir+ya ta ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra radA na A b+hi shiny+tsa maM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza pre ba ra d+ha na ya ad mA
278a3(rgyud 'grel): na nir+yA ta ya mI sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+ha ma na~M pra byar d+ha na maM/ oM sar+b+ba tA thA ga ta pu dza kar+m+ma naM ad ma naM nid+ya tA ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra kar+m+ma ku ru maM/ dam tshig sdom pa sbyin pa dang / rnal 'byor du ni sems bskyedade// oM sarba yo ga ci
278a4(rgyud 'grel): ta u bo ta ya mi/ rdo rje snong khar bzhag te/ oM su ra te sa ma ya s+t+wa~M sid+d+ha badz+ra ya tha pu khaM/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / tshe dpag med kyi dngos grub thob// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhog smos// dkyil 'kho
278a5(rgyud 'grel): ma zhugs mi smra'o// dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re// 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste// gal te khyod kyis smras gyur na// dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje yis// rang gis mgo bo 'gras par 'gyur// tshe dpag med pa dang khyod kyi// snying lnga de
278a6(rgyud 'grel): ring yang dag zhugs// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na bsreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub rnams// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis
278b1(rgyud 'grel): 'grub// badz+ra uHka oM AHhUM/ de nas brtsams nas bu khyod kyi// tshe dpag med pa nga yin gyis// khyod kyis nga la brnyas pa na// mi bde ma spangs dus byas nas// dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re// de nas slob ma'i gtso bo yis//
278b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams srid maNaN+Dal phul nas gsol ba gang ga cad kyis// bdag la byin gyis brlobs mdzod la// tshe dpag med pa dbab par mdzod// rkang mthil rlung gi dkyil 'khor d+ho// snying kha laM las sa'i dkyil 'khor/
278b3(rgyud 'grel): mgrin par baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor// spyi bor yaM las rlung dang haM// de'i spyi bor tshe dpag tu med// yab yum 'od kyi rang bzhin du// gar byed sku las ye shes kyi// bdud rtsi bab nas lus la thim// zag med bde bas grang bar bsgra
278b4(rgyud 'grel): oM hri b+h+rUM badz+ra dz+nyA na a yu shwe aHb+he sha ya s+t+waM pa ya s+t+ri pa ya rU rA tsA la yA tsa la yA/ hUM hA AHd+h+waM zhes brjod rol mo'i sgra dang // gu gu l-i zla mtshan thod pa ru// durar+ya khrod sol ba'i ma yis bsreg/ bab gyur zla ba'i dkyil 'kho
278b5(rgyud 'grel): du// a las gsung gi rdo rje bsam// 'bru hi badz+ra/ dge dang mi dge la sogs pa// skyes shig rdo rje can gyi rigs// s+thiSh+Tha badz+ra brtan par bya'o// tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rig pa'i me tog 'di dor bAs// sngon tshwa
278b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes brnyes pa'i lha// gang yin de la 'bab par shog/ pra ti tshi badz+ra ho/ bye brag dngos grub brtag par bya// pra ti g+hi hA sa mi me swa ta ma hU~M b+ha la/ slob ma'i mgo la bcing bar bya// tshe dpag med pa dang khyod kyi// mi ge 'byed pa
279a1(rgyud 'grel): nA brtsan par mdzad// bya bas thams cad na thob par 'gyur// du mig ni bla na med// oM badz+rAn trA swA hA ra ba tan+tu hrI/ dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la sngos// ngan dang pa rab tu bskyed// byang na mang pas med du
279a2(rgyud 'grel): skye// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs// 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa kun// thams cad 'di las mngon du gyur// dngos grub thob cing dam tshig bsrungs// gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis// rims kyis rnam par dag par bstan
279a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob ma dang ldan ngas// bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// yon mchog dam pa 'bul ba dang // dbang bskur drin du gsol ba gdab// bcom ldan mgon po che dpag med// yab yum gnyis med bde chen sku// 'chi mang bdud
279a4(rgyud 'grel): churgyun gyis// dbang bskur ba ni bdag la gsol// lan+da gsum brjod nas shar phyogasu// pad ma 'dab brgyad khri la 'dug/ rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs nas// chu rnams dung chos kum par byasdu// rdo rje rI glu deng rol mo d+hA// rig
279a5(rgyud 'grel): lde reg ma'i lha mo dang // byang chub sems drabasA dkru shrIs b+h+r-id+d+hod// khye blo rnams kyis bgag swA tra srung // gas de gsum dam tshig las thung ba'i// ye shrI s+yai dadu rtsi dri ma med// lnga'i chu ni ngag pa yi// mi skyong rdo rje'i deng
279a6(rgyud 'grel): bsku re// oM badz+ra a d+hi teSh+Tha dz+nyA na a b+hi shiny+tsa hUM/ gser la sogs pa'i dbu rgyan lo// rin 'byung bskyed cing ye shes bstim// dar dbyangs bcings la tshig 'di brjod// thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis
279b1(rgyud 'grel): rab bsngags pa'i// rin chen dbu rgyan dam pa dang // dar dpyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta rad na mu gu ta a b+hi shiny+tsa maM// rin chen la sogs rdo rje la// snang ba mtha' yas bskyed cing bstim// sangs rgyas
279b2(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang // de ring khyed la bskur bar bya// sangs rgyas kun tu rab bsgrub phyir// rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis bzung // oM badz+ra a ti pra ti s+t+waM a b+hi shiny+tsA maM// dril bu don grub bskyed byas la// ye shes bstims la
279b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig 'di brjod// thabs dang shos rab ldan pa yi// 'gro don mnye med byed pa yis// mchod pa'i 'phrin las rdzogs byed pa'i// dril bu las kyi dbang bskur// au a d+hi pa tA ye a b+hi shaMny+tse maM/ slob ma au las rnam snang
279b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// ye shes spyan drangs grwany+tsi su med// rdo rje ming gi dbang de sku bas// byang chub snying po'i bar du ni// cis kyang gzhom par mI nus paste// rdo rje ming du rab tu grags// oM sarba tA thA ga ta a b+h+rUM she kra ta maM/ chu dang cod
279b5(rgyud 'grel): ngani rdo rje dang // dril bu dang ni ming gi dbang // rig pa yi ni dbang lnga'o// nyon mongs lnga ni rnam dag pas// dbang bskur lnga ni thob pa yin// ma rig pa las 'das nas kyang // ye shes lnga ni rims kyis thob// de nas spyi bi mgrin pa
279b6(rgyud 'grel): dang // snying kha lto ba gsang gnas rnams// 'khor lo lnga'i gnas nyid du// rigs lnga tshe dpag med rnams kyis// dbang bskur lha rnams yab yum de// 'chi med byang chub sems su 'gyur// rtsa gsum sa 'khor lo lnga
280a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams gang // byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ro// 'chi med rdo rje'i lus su gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku ru bsgom// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na 'dug
280a2(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // rdo rje sems dpa'i brtul shugs brtan// oM sar+b+ba tA thA ga ta sid+hi badz+rI sA ma ya tiSh+Tha e shad d+ha ra ya mi hi hi hUM/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ba che/
280a3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems tshul dag po'i bdag/ dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes re ba dbyangs kyis rjes 'gror bshad// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
280a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed// srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyi dngos bral byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni// mchog gi srid pa byed par 'gyur// mtshan ma med par 'gro ba'i don// gang dag bdag/
280a5(rgyud 'grel): gos byed nus pas// phyir mi ldog pa dbang bskur tsha// dpa' bo chen pos bdag la gsol// shar du seng ge'i khri la 'dug/ steng du gdugs dkar phub nas kyang // rnam rgyal bum pas dbang maphel ba gang bskur te//
280a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur rdo rje chen po lo// khams gsum pa yos phyag byas te// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi// gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya// oM badz+ra a b+hi shaM ka a d+hi shiny+tsA maM// dril bu glags bam lag tu gtod //
280b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phrin las thogs pa med pa rnams// bu yis gzhan don bla med byos// khyod ni rdo rje slob dpon yin// chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur// lha'i snying po lan gsum brjod// me tog phreng ba spyi bor gzhag/ bcom
280b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan padag gis bzung lags kyis// bdag la nye bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan bdag gis sbyin lags kyis// bdag la go bar mdzad du gsol// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus par// sems can ma lus drang ba'i
280b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir// chags pa med pa'i bsam pa yis// ji ltar gladul bya sna tshogs la// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis// de bzhin rigs kyis gang 'dul ba// khyod kyi 'phrin las mchog yino// deng nas bzung nas bu khyod
280b4(rgyud 'grel): kyos// zhi rgyas dbang dang bsad pa la// dgug dang bcing dang ba sreg pa dang // bskrad pa dbye ba la sogs pa// 'phrin las sna tshogs 'grub par gyis// ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang // mchil lham de bzhin ri lu ste// mi
280b5(rgyud 'grel): snang bcud lon mkha' la spyod// thun mong dngos grub ma lus pa// de dag khyed kyis 'grub par bya// ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis// 'jig rten rab rib bsil ba ltar// du khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i// rang rnying rgyal ba
280b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis bsal// oM badz+ra nai tra a pa he ra pa Da lo hriHchos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing bsal la dri ma med// gzung du med cing brjod med// chos rnams ngo ltar shes par gyis// ho yis mnga'
281a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhu phyogs bzhir 'phang // mtshan mo gnas khang dben pa ru// bzhin bzangs mig yangs lang tshor ldan// lus la dr-i yis byug byas te// brtse dang rgod pa la sogs pas// thabs dang shes
281a2(rgyud 'grel): rab gnyis paphab te// nor bu byang chub sems ltung bas// gsang ba'i dang nya phyis dung chos la sogs su// drir bcas slob ma'i kha ru ni// the bong srin lag dag gis sbyin// a ho su kas de btungo // zag med bde chen lus la rgyas
281a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ro yis nyon mongs 'joms// mtshan ldan re shes rab rang bzhin te// lha mo 'di ni phyag rgya che// mtha' yas bde ba sbyin pa mo// rnam pa kun tu phyag rgya long // bu yis bla med mchod par gyis// yol bas par bcad snyoms 'jug
281a4(rgyud 'grel): gis// bsrub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba shes phe sa shes kyi dbang yis// mi rtog ye shes skye bor 'gyur// ltos shig ltos shig sems la ltos// sems nyid cir yang grub pa med// bsal bzhag dgag bsgrub gang yang med// 'di
281a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rang rig ye shes yin// / bla ma sprul pa'i skur bstan to// chos gos bzung la lung bstan bya// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// srid pa'i mtha' ni grub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan
281a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro nyid las bton// 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan yin/ @#6/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid d+hi sa ma ya sta~M b+hur bu ba swa/ thugs dang / khams gsum pa ni rgyal srid che// rgyal ba'i bdag par bstan pa dang // ngos ni bdud las rnam
281b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal zhing // grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin// deng bdagi skye ba 'bras bur bcas// bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas// de ring sangs rgyas sra su skyes// sangs rgyas sra su nga gyur to// rta dang glang po ma he dang // bu dang chung ma

282b5(rgyud 'grel): ljaldang / byang shar du 'jol ba/ tsha sgo sa'i nyes po med po'o// lto 'phye ni g.yon gyis nyal te// lto bar chud par bya'o// sa byung ba ni/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// dang po mngon pa la bslang ba ni/ gzhi de'i sa
282b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag rgyal po la sogs pa la'o// mi mngon pa la spyir blang ba ni/ sa gzhan nas bslang ba 'am/ ras kyi steng du dri'i thig le dang / me tog gi tshom bu byas la mchod pa lnga dang / gter ma gsum gsha mo// de nas stong pa'i
283a1(rgyud 'grel): ngang las rang skad cig gis tshe dpag tu med par bsku/ thugs kha'i hrIHlas 'od 'phros/ na mkha' la lha tshogs rnams spyan drangs par bsams la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya// bar chad med par gsol/
283a2(rgyud 'grel): ba gang ba/ gtor ma yang phyogs skyong dang lha srin sde brgyad dang gzhi bdag lo sbyino// bye brag tu sa'i lha mo la sa blang ba ni/ maN+Dal dbusu dri'i thig lo'i steng du me tog gi tshom bu dgod/ de nyid paM las sa'i lha mo/ sku mdog
283a3(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi rang bzhin dbu sgo g.yas su 'khyil pa/ lte ba yan chod sa las byung zhing / phyag gnyis bum pa bsnams pa bskyed la/ ye shas kyi lha mo spyan drang ba ni/ hUM tshur byon chur byon lha mo che/ sa cho ga lha mo 'jig rten
283a4(rgyud 'grel): yum/ rin chen rgyan gyis rab gang ba'i// rgyan mchog ud pal rab tu mdzes// phyag zhabs mgul rgyan gser gyis brgyan// sangs rgyas tshogs rnams rab mchod pa'i// gser mo dog lha mo chen mo khyod// phrin lasna bsgrub
283a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir gshegasu gsolnga// ces brjod la mchod yon dbul ba ni/ lha mo khyod ni byon pa legs// bdag cag bsod nams skal bar ldan// bdag gis mchod yon bzhes nas kyang // 'di nyid du ni bzhugasu gsol// aM pra
283a6(rgyud 'grel): ti argas ma ya hUM/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni// lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar// de bzhin bdag gis lha'i chu// dag pa yis ni sku khrus gsol// pra ba sad ka ra tI dza hUM/ ces pas khrus gsol/ bdag dang
283b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro la thugs brtse'i phyir// nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul mthu yis ni// ji srid mchod pa bdag bgyid na// de srid lha mo bzhugasu gsol// pad ma ka ma la hUM zhes pas gdan dbul lo// de nas dzaHhUM baM hoHdam tshig pa la ye
283b2(rgyud 'grel): shes lha mo dgug gzhug cing mnyes par bya/ de lnga mchod pa dngul/ sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs la/ lha mo'i ljags zug par bsams la// oM bI tA b+ha na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ bi sha mu khe b+h+ye/ sarba
283b3(rgyud 'grel): twAtad khaM ud gA tai s+pha ra na hi maM gA g+ha na khaM g+h+ri na taM ba li ta kha khA khA hi khA hi swA hA/ lnga 'am bdun gyis phul la/ mnyes pa la bstod pa bya ba ni/ khyod ni sa 'dzin lha mo ste// sku phyed 'thon po gser gyi mdog/ rin tshon sna
283b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// sa 'og lha mo khyod la 'dud// gsol po gdab pa nI// sa la rgyu ba'i lha klu dang // gang yang sa la gnas pa rnams// sems can rnams la phan+da pa'i phyir// byams pa'i sems kyis gnang bar mdzod
283b5(rgyud 'grel): ces brjod pas gnang ba byin par bsam// ye shes pa gshegs la dam tshig pa bstim mo// de nas sa sbyang ba bshad par bya ste/ nad rnams mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir// sa khru gang la sogs pa rkos la// rus pa
283b6(rgyud 'grel): dang gyo mo la sogs pa bsal bar bya'o// de nas yang bdag nyid 'od dpag med kyi nga rgyal gyis/ sangs rgyas rnams na mkha' las bltas te/ de dag gi bdud rtsi bkug la/ sa phyogs gser gyi sa gzhi g.ya' bar dag
284a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bsams la/ oM buSh+paM puSh+pe ma hA puSh+paM/ a pa ra mi tA a su dz+nyA su bi ni tsi ta te dzA ra dza ya swA hA/ zhes lnga 'am gsum brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi rgya ni khru bzhi pa byas nas/ sbyangs nA
284a2(rgyud 'grel): ci 'byor ba'o// de nas sa gzhi dri bzangs kyi chus mi long gis ngos ltar byas la/ bla bres dang yal ba dang / 'od dpag med kyi gzungs rnams bzhug so// de nas rong dang slob mas rgyud dang gzungs rnams klog par bya'o// smon
284a3(rgyud 'grel): zhi po'i ston bsreg kyang lan gsum bya'o// de'ang slob ma la ral 'byor rnyod par dka' ba dang / 'chi ba mi rtag pa dang / 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs rnams brjod la/ thun mong gi skyabs 'gro so sor thar pa'i sdom pa rnam
284a4(rgyud 'grel): dpog/ khyad par gyi skyabs 'gro dang / byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed par bya'o// de ni sa'i cho ga rnams bstan to// de nas sta gon+da bshad par bya ste/ de yang slob dpon bdag nyid dgongs ka'i dus su khrus byas//
284a5(rgyud 'grel): ras dmar pos lus kyi stod g.yogs/ slad g.yogs byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas/ rta mchog gi bdag bskyed nas bzung ste/ gsang bsgrub yan chad bzlas pa dang bcas po

284b1(rgyud 'grel): byi bar gyur pa yi// 'gro kun ma lus don phyir dang // tshe zad ma nyams nad kyis gzir// skyabs med nyams thag gyur pa yi// sems can rnams la phan don du// bcom ldan mgon po chen po yis// 'aN+DI mong rta sgra chen tho/

286a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rgyas par bsams la rtsa sngags la zho rgyas kyi sham bu gdags par bya'o// de nas ye shes pa gshegs dam tshig pa mi dmigasmra bar bya'o// sbyin bsreg lcags gnaso// de nas sa'i lha mo ni mchod bstod gtor ma
286a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams gong bzhin byas la mchod pa lngas mchod de/ lag pas spos thogs dbus mo sa la rmugs la/ skyobs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par lam// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du
286b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis// ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa// de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde// pham par byas te dkyil 'khor bri// ces lan gsum brjod pas lha mos dbang por zhal gyis bzhes par bas mo// de'i rje su dam
286b2(rgyud 'grel): tshig pa bsdu// ye shes pa gshegs par byas pa la yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya'o// de ni sa yi lcags gnas bstan to// de nas slob ma lhags gnas bshad par bya ste/ de yang slob ma rnams khrus byas/ gos gtsang ma gyon

286b6(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas blo dgug pa ni// bu tshur theg pa chen po yi// khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te// gsang sngags spyod yul cho ga 'di// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das/
287a1(rgyud 'grel): dang // de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang // da ltar bzhugs pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa rnams// de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi// cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen pas// dpa' bos
287a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub shing drung du// thams cad mkhyen pa tshad med brnyes// gsang sngags spyod pa mnyam med pas// skyob pa shAkya sing ge yis// bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa// dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom// de bas kun mkhyen thob

289b3(rgyud 'grel): la phyogs dra mig tu yod par bya'o// de nas rang bskyed rdzogs rang ji lta ba bzhin du sgom/ dkyil 'khor dang bum pa'i nang du lha tshogs bskyed lo// sgrub thabs bzhi ni 'chi med ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang ba la
289b4(rgyud 'grel): rang gis dang nga slob ma la ji tsom bskur ba de blang bar bya'o// de nas slob ma rnams khrus byas la gos so ma gyon nas yol bi'i phyi rol du 'khod pa la bgegs bskrang / kri ya dpung pa bzang po ltar gtor ma btang /
