353b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyings su sgrolta ba'i rtags// bcu gsum rtags ldan bcu gsum sa brnyes rtags// sku gsung thugs ldan rdo rje nag po bstod// bram ze blo ldan rdo rje nag po bskyod// bram ze blo ldan mchog sred kyi
353b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal nag po chen po la rtags kyi sgo nas bstod pa rdzogs so// bId+d+hi d+hA shwe d+h+r-i kA rA wArma dang / gu ru yon tA nAM shaM las gu ga zo lhung du bsgyur bA
353b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gArar+ya s+yAd du/ ma hU~M kA la spyod d+ha/ bod sbyad du// stug po chen po'i bskyod phyi'i phreng po zhes bya g+h+ra bla ma dam pa dang dpal he rul phyag 'tshal lo// 'i skyil 'khor dbus gam
353b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// hUM las byung ba'o nag po che// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs gang mi sgrogs// 'jigs byed khyod la mngon par bstod// sangs rgyas kun+d+ra la bsnyen sbyor rtags// mgul pa thod pa'i phreng bas brgyun//
353b5(rgyud 'grel): gags rnams ma lus tshar gcod pa'i// mgon po khyod la mngon par bstod// sku mdog khro tshul ston pa ni// mkhyen gsal dbyings su gcig pa'i rtags// thung zhing sdom la brjid pa'i sku// khyu lde rdza mig gi
353b6(rgyud 'grel): nga ga.us ni khro phyogs yur 'gro/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas na gri// 'gro drug thugs rjes sgrol la bstod// g.yon po ban d+ha khrag dong zhag/ sha chen lnga dang sman lngas bkang // dug gsum me lus zhal du
354a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol// sku gsum srin po'i gzugs 'dra stod// 'od dpung dug lnga srog pa'i me// khro gnyer smin ma rabs bskyod cing // ljags 'gril khros pa phrin las mdzad// hUM sgrogs pad sgro
354a2(rgyud 'grel): khyod la bstod// mche gtsigs lce la me stag 'phro// brkyang bskum bur med thug chem ni// thugs rjes zhing khams ma lus g.yo// thugs rjes sna tshogs sbrul la bstod// gtumatshan khro bo mr-ing 'phro ba// 'gran
354a3(rgyud 'grel): zlo med pas che ba la// phrin lhas rgya mtsho lhun gyis grub// khams gsum kun 'dul khyed la bstod// phra men tshogs rnams skrag par byed// ha hi rnga ma chen gtum la bzhad// zhal nas khrag ni 'jig pa ste/
354a4(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum skyong khyod la bstod// tha ma dang ni theg chen dang // sems can kun la 'tshe byed pa// skad cig yud la brlag par 'gyur ba// nag po chen po khyod la bstod// bskyod pa'i phreng ba bram
354a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog srid kyis mdzad pa rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta lA li tA badz+ra dang // bod kyi lo tsAb kyi ljang dbu dka/ ri gyis bsgyur ba'o// bram ze mchog srid kyis zhal mthang dus dga' nas bstod
354a6(rgyud 'grel): bas/ mgon po mnyes nas zhal 'dzum mdzad do// de nas phrin las bcol pa'i bstod pa mdzad do// zhal gzigs kyi bstod pa'o//
355a1(rgyud 'grel): nag po chen po'i bstod pa bzhug/
355b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA k+ShA la stod tu/ bod skad du/ nag po chen po la bskyod pa/ d+hU las rnams kun byung mgon pa'i nag pa'i sgra// dmar nag ma'i 'od kyis kun nas bskor/
355b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas gri gug 'brar ba bsnams pa ni// dam nyams dragra bo'i srog rtsa dmar po gcod// g.yon pa thod pa dgra bo'i khrag bkang gsol// shangs nas rlung byung 'jig rten rlung nag 'tshub// zhal nas khrag
355b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzag 'jig rten na da kyis 'gengs// spyan rtsa du mar pos 'jig rten sdigs par byed// sku gsung thugs kyis stong gsum zil gyis gnon// mon pa pho mo thams cad dbang du bsdud// 'jig rten lha srin
355b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dbang byas nas// bstan pa nyams pa'i dus kyi bya ra mdzad// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba 'di pa zhes la// thugs dam rgyud bskul bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// nag po chen pa gtor ma'i dus bskul
355b5(rgyud 'grel): ga slob dpon+da b+h+yok+Sh+mI lhas mdzad paM/ gyi ljang dbu dkara~M gyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA la stod tra/ bod skad du/ nag po rgyan po la bstod pa// tshwas de kyi
355b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag zhi ba'i rang bzhin las// thugs rje'i dbang gis 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing // sgyu ma'i chos la shes rab dbang bsgyur bas// 'khor ba mi spo ngo zhing khams sbyong ba'i bdag/ rab 'jigs ngur
356a1(rgyud 'grel): khrod ma mo'i dkyil 'khor nas// khro gtum mi zad nag po chen po ni// hUM skyes dus mtha'i sprin phung 'jigs pa'i gzugs// stag lpags sham thabs thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// spyan
356a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum dmar zhing ljags 'grel mche ba gtsigs// rab 'bar da du skya ser po gyen du brdzes// gdug pa'i phyag g.yas gri gug 'bar ba bsnams// phyag g.yon dpa' bo'i thod par bdud snying gcod// rang gi gsang
356a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags drag po'i nga bo'i sgras// ri dang sa gzhir bcas pa'i rgya mtsho g.yo// gdug pa'i klu dbang phung sgra 'byin byed cing // lce gnyis mche gtsigs brjid po'i brgyan du byas// khrag dang bcas pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu dang /
356a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu ma'i theg pas brang brgyus mgul na 'chang // g.yer khas brgyan pa'i zhabs gnyis sems bral man no// dbu skra gyen rdzas sbrul gyis bcings pa ste// mi skyod rdo rje'i cod pan mdzes par mdzad// rdo rje mkha' 'gro byin
356a5(rgyud 'grel): rlabs mchog gi gats+tsha// khrag gi mnga' bdag ma tshogs dbang du bsdud// 'brar byed dus mtha'i me yis kun nas bskor// dbang dang dam tshig la gus sgrub pa pos// nag po chen po'i gsang sngags rjes dran na// sngon
356a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi thugs dam dbang gis phrin las mdzad// mgon po mchog khyed thugs rje'i bdog nyid can// byams pa'i zhal sten bdag la brtse dgongs nas// dngos grub rgya mtsho'i rlabs can bdag la stsol// bla me mai tri pas
356b1(rgyud 'grel): mgon po zhal gzigs dus ston pa mdzad pa rdzogs so// / la li tA badz+ra dang / lo tsA ba gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar
356b2(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ ma hA kA la stod tra/ bod skad du/ nag po chen po la bstod pa/ dpal kye rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM/ phyogs bcu kun+da nas dus gsum bde ga shugs kyi// phrin las las grub dri med bstan pa dang /
356b3(rgyud 'grel): chos ldan skyes bu skyong bar bka' bsgos pa'i// dam bcas ji bzhin bsgrub mdzad mgon po bstod// rab 'jigs sku ni dus mtha' spring srung ltar// ngam nag 'jigs rung pho nya glog stong 'phro// se gsum g.yo
356b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad sA ga'i stabs kyis bzhugs// dpal ldan nag po chen po khyod la bstod// spyan gsum rab 'bar srid gsum zil gyis gnon// mche ba bzhi gtsigs bdud bzhi rtsad nas gcod// dbu sgra sma ra dmar
356b5(rgyud 'grel): ser gzi brjid 'bar// ye shes me dpung rab 'bar mgon po bstod// phyag gnyis zings gr-i thod khrag gan d+he bsnams// gdug pa char gcod tshwas sgra rgya chen sgrogs// dur khrod dbang phyug dur khrod rgyan kun
356b6(rgyud 'grel): 'chang // dpal ldan stobs 'chang sku yi dbang phyug bstod// gsung dbyangs zab cing chos kyi sgra snyan gyis// zhi bas sgrol ba'i sems can smin grol mdzad// hUM phaT ma ra ya sogs 'jigs rung sgras//
357a1(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa 'dul mdzad gsung gri dbang phyug bstod// mkhyen pa chos su'i dpal rab mngon bgyis dang // brtse bas gdul bya srid mtsho las sgra la phyir// bstan pa'i gru tshun sbrel
357a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing bsrung ma mdzad// don gnyis mthar phyin thugs kyi dpal phyug bstod// srong zhi'i yon tan tshogs kyis 'byor ldan zhing // bstan pa yon tan 'byung gnas rgyas par mdzad// sgrub po yon tan tshogs
357a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'byor mdzad pa// rin chen yon tan rgyo mtsho khyod la bstod// rab zhi ches don bsgrub mdzad 'phro bu rnams// nyer zhi'i dpal la 'god mdzad phran las can// bstan pa rgyas mdzad tshe dang dpal 'byor tshogs//
357a4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu rgyos mdzad ma hA kA la bstod// 'gro rnams dbang gyur dbang bzhi'i 'byung gnas khyod// bla me'i dbang mdzad dbang gi phrin las can// drag shul mngon spyod las kyis dog bgegs tshogs// drag pos sbrul
357a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad moM hA kA la bstod // ston mchog bla me sku khams bzang ba dang // bstan mchog da mi ches der zhing rgyas pa dang // sgru pe mchog bsgrub gnyis phun sum tshogs pa dang // don mchog sku bzhi grub pa'i phrin las
357a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzod// ces bstod de// slob dpon a b+ha yis zhal gzigs dus bstod pa/ paN+Di ta shra ta ka ra warma dang / gu ru yon tan shi las gu ge tho ling du bsgyur ba'o// / hU~M sngon
357b1(rgyud 'grel): tsheche byud gshegs po blang spyan s+t+wa ru// bstan pa bsgyang phyir nag po chen po la// rjes 'thun phrin las khyad par gang bsgo ba// dam byacas phyin las mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po'i bka' ny+dzan
357b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi tshul mdzes shing // gdug pa 'dul phyir mi gzod gzugs 'chang ba// byams dang snying rjes 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i// nag po chen po khyud la phyag 'tshal lo// bstan la rabu dga' mthu stobs
357b3(rgyud 'grel): bsnam gyisna mi khyab// dkon mchog gsum laM gnod byed tshar gcad cing // rnam 'phrul gaN+DI phyug gi dbus na bsnams// nag po chen po khyod la phyog 'tshal lo// rgyu ma mi mgo phreng ba'i do shal 'dzin// g.yas
357b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag gis zongs gri rnon po bsnams// g.yon pa ni byug na thod pa khrug bkang 'dzin// nag po chen po la khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon tshe bdog shugs spyan sngar khas blangs te// bstan pa bsrung
357b5(rgyud 'grel): dngo 'gro la phan gdugs phyir// dam bcas mi 'da' dam tshig rjes dgongs la// gsol gdab las mdzad bdag don yongs rdzogs mdzod// dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa 'di ni//
357b6(rgyud 'grel): bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa'o// /
358a1(rgyud 'grel): nad pa chen po la bstod pa bzhug/
358b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA la stong tra/ bod skad du// nug po chen po la bstod pa// hUM/ bde dga' rgya mtsho kun sbyar zhing // sangs rgyus bstan pa'i gzhal med khang // legs skyong nag po
358b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po ni// 'jigs pa'i gzugs 'chang khyod lnga bstod// zla ba stong gis smras pa yi// mtshan mo 'jim gling na mkha' ltar// khyod sku mthing nag brjid pa la// keng rus phreng bas brgyan mtho don sa// 'jig
358b3(rgyud 'grel): rten 'jigs par byed pa yi// srin po rnams kyi snying rabI 'gas// bdud dang log 'dren dpa' bo rnams// mtshon cha bor nas phyogaso bcur bris// sbrul gyi chun pos bkris pa'i zhabaso// drag po'i gom
358b4(rgyud 'grel): stabs bskyod pa ni// stong gsum rlung gis 'chub pa yi// ma rlabs bzhin du rab tu g.yo// lhun po 'jigs pas bros pa dog/ bskyed par ma nus bzhin du 'dar// rgya mtsho ga nam du 'bros pa ltar// dog
358b5(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid la so ring du 'phags// nags tshal me tog bcas pa'i shing // yib par 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyel// 'brug snying sgra yang sgra min+ma ltar// byung po'i gtum sgra gang mo dag/ stong gsum 'byung po'i tshogs
358b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis// rna bar nyan cing stongs par byed// kun nas zhi thugs spros bral yang // bstan pa bsrung dang bdag gi don// bsgrub phyir dam bca' ma bsnyil bar// rnga ma 'khrug btum pas thugs bskyed
359a1(rgyud 'grel): la// bdud dang bgegs kyi snying khrag sha/ cha ma che ma gcod byed srin po yi// gzugs 'chang bka' stong pho nya gying // 'dir gshegs drag po'i phrin las bsgrubs// zhes pas
359a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa bya// paN+Di ta spyan chen pos dur khyod bsil ba'i tshal du bstod pa mdzad pa rdzogs// / gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o// / hUMb+h+yAMdapal ldan lha mo
359a3(rgyud 'grel): mi pham srid gsum bdag/ rang don bsgrub phyir rnam thar gsum gzhol yang // snying rje'i dbang gis gzhan don rjes thob cing // shi sa rab sna tshogs drag gis 'gro don mdzad// dpal ldan lha mo sku mdog
359a4(rgyud 'grel): char sprin mdog/ mtshan mo nag mo shin tu gtum pa'i gzugs// shin tu rid cing keng rus gzugs can me// zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis brjid pa'i sku// ral pa gyen 'gring lan bu gcig
359a5(rgyud 'grel): tu 'byul// skra gseb sbrul dang thod pa'i phreng thogs can// rna lhag me tog dang nag cad pan can// khrag gi chang gis ra ro spyan rtsa dmar// myi ro rengs pa khar bcug mche ba bzhi// rnam par gcing
359a6(rgyud 'grel): shing khrag la shin tu dgyes// snyan g.yas sbrul gyi mgul las dril bu yis// bdug pa btul nas tshangs pa'i sgra sgrogs mo// snyan cha g.yon na seng ge ral pa dmar// dpa' bo khams gsum
359b1(rgyud 'grel): slong ga'i sgra sgrogs ma// phyag bzhi g.yas kyi dang po ral gri 'dzin// 'og ma dung tshan rak+ta dmar 'khyil// g.yon gyi dang po shag ti mtshon cha 'dzin// 'og ma tri shul mgul na ba dan 'phyar// shag
359b2(rgyud 'grel): ti ral gra mtshan gyis btsud pa yis// lha ma yin gyi mgo srogs do shal byas// glang po che yi kau rlon stong g.yogs byas// smad ni pa glang ko rlon dras pa la// phyed ni re lde sar pa sha mo bu dkris// klu
359b3(rgyud 'grel): yi dbang po gzhibs pa'i rkyed bcings can// zhabs gnyis lcags sgrog mdzes pa dag gi rgyan// khrag dang zhag gi thigaM las tshim bur bris// bong bu gzhon nas mtshan mo dur khrod nyul// bong bu'i
359b4(rgyud 'grel): rmig pa klog gi shugs tson ma// khams gsum skad cig tsA ma la bskor bar byed// skad cig dung dang 'brug gi sgra lta bu// ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za dbang du sdung // lho phyogs ga shin rjeri pho brang dag na
359b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas// dam pa'i sa na gzugs sa gnyis 'dzin zhing // ting 'dzin dbang thob gzugs khams gnasu byon// tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs phyag byas ma// gzhan la dbang bskur 'dod khams pas mthar
359b6(rgyud 'grel): byan// dbang phyug chen po'i sku la dgyes 'khril ma// sum cu rtsa gsum gnasu byon pa'i tshe// lha rnams dbugs 'byin brgya byin phyag byas ma// sku mchog ri rab rtsal 'gran po'i tshe// lte ba'i thang ka'i
360a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su nyi zla 'phyar// rgyal chen bzhi sogs lha rnams phyag byas ma// rgya mtsho'i gting nas mye 'bar mtsho skems nus// sa 'og dbang po rnams kyi phyag byasnga ma// lha mo khyod kyi cho
360a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul 'di bstan pas// bdud dang ga sho ni rje'i tshe gos rnams 'dar zhing 'dud// mo mo srin po'i tshogs rnams rngam zhing rgod// dam sri'i tshogs rnams 'dar zhing dam la 'dud// tsau to rin chen gur phu bo gzhal
360a3(rgyud 'grel): yas khang // nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor rtsegs pa'i ga'u 'bar// phyogs bcu'i 'dzag rten dug gi bcud sdus nas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim mdzad ma// dug gi rlangs pas nag po'i phyogs rnams kyis//
360a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi brgya rgyu bzhi'i nad rnams slong mdzad ma// mA T+wAMg nad kyi bdog mo'i dam la 'dud// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten spyan gyis bcud 'dus nas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim par mdzad// skyon gyis sbrengs pas
360a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po'i phyogs rnams kyis// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams sel mdzad ma// bdud rtsi'i sman gyis rgyal po'i ngami la 'dud// gang zhig khyed la dang na ma bas byams// de phyir ma cig na dag smin gyi gtso// rgyu lta ba
360a6(rgyud 'grel): shAkya thubo pa'i spyan snga ru// bdag gis deng nas 'khor ba ji srid par// dkar po'i phyogs rnams nang dang sdug bsngal sogs// zhi bar bya dang tshe dang bsod namos spel// nog po'i phyogs rnams 'gugs shong dab
360b1(rgyud 'grel): sdud// sgo 'bog bsad la sogs pa'i lasA rnams kyis// bstan pa bsrungs pa'i las 'di myur du bgyid// 'di las 'das na rgyal ba'i bka' bslus pas// dus gsum rgyal ba'i rdo rjes mgo 'gem so// de ltar rgyal ba'i spyan
360b2(rgyud 'grel): sder khas blangs nas// khas blangs bzhin du dam tshig rjes dgongs la// dam tshig bzhin du phyin las myur bsgrubs mdzad// rnal 'byor bdag dang bdag gi 'khor bcas la// khyod kyi zhal nas bdud rtsi'i churar+ya pho bo la//
360b3(rgyud 'grel): nend dang sdug bsngal tshogs rnams zhi bar mdzod// tshe dang dbang zang longs spyod rgyus par mdzod// zang zing longs spyod 'bru'i phung po dang // rin chen rkang 'gro phyugs rnams 'phel bar mdzod// bla ma snod cing
360b4(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog dbu 'phang spyod// bdag gi dge la bar gcod byed pa yi// sdang ba'i dgra dang gnod pa'i bgegs la sogs// khyod kyi khong nas dug gi brlangs phyung la// 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad kyis khong nas slongs//
360b5(rgyud 'grel): don snying lha yi khang khyag+sas smrig du chug/ bag gzhi sa la lhung nos sdebasu chu ge/ las ngan 'khor bcas brang chen brdung du chug/ smre stegs chos nges gnam du 'bod du bcug/ gcan zan la sogs mkha' lding
360b6(rgyud 'grel): skyes ngan thong // khyod kyi sprin gyi dam bcas rjes dgongs nas// bstan pa bsrung ba'i las rnams grub par mdzad// dri mo ze mchog srid kyis mdzad pa'i//
361a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal lha mo nag mo la bstod pa bzhug/
361b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI dwe wi ka li stod tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nagra mo la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ b+h+yoHbskul pa mye ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// rlung nag tshub mar
361b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khyil pa'i pho brang na// mA cig 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma// bdud kyi yum mchog gshin rje'i lham gcig ma// dpol ldan lha mo nag mo mthu mo che// nag mo za byed rngam po'i mche ba can//
361b3(rgyud 'grel): mthong nag gtsar bu khrag gi ral pa can// khyod kyi sku mdog nag mor bstan pa ni// don dram dbyings las g.yo ba med pa'i rtags// ral pa g.yas nas g.yon du 'khyil po ni// mkha' las sprul pa sna
361b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'gyed pa'i rtogs// dbu sku lan+da bu gcig tu 'khyil pa ni// skye med don dam gcig tu rtogs pa'i rtags// ral pa'i seb nas me stag 'phro ba ni// thugs kyi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'o gyed pa'i
361b5(rgyud 'grel): rtags// thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la bcings pa ni// thugs kyi sbrul pos 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags// g.yon gyi snyan nas seng ge 'phyo ba ni// dman btsun thams cad du zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// /
361b6(rgyud 'grel): gsas nas sbrul gyi gdeng ka 'phye ba ni// zhe sdang ma spangs gnas su dag pa'i rtags// snyan tsha dril bu g.yer kha 'khrol ba ni// sangs rgyas kun la snyen skur mdzad pa'i rtags// spyan rtsa dmar zhing
362a1(rgyud 'grel): sdud myig bgrang ba ni// snyid gsum rnal 'byor byur mdzad pa'i rtags// zhal ni drug blo'i hom khung gAdang smra pa ni// bsnun pa bshig pa'i ru t+yA sgrol bya'i rtags// rno gdugu mche ba zur gsum
362a2(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs pa ni// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu'o sha la rol pa'i rtags// zhing lhogs g.yang gzhi sku la gsol ba ni// yang dag chos nyid don dang ldan pa'i rtags// glang chen ko rlon rnam par dkris pa ni// 'jig rten
362a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di na che btsan che ba'i rtags// lte ba'i dkyil nas nyi ma shar ba ni// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho gi ting nas skem pa'i rtags// spyi bo'i gtsug na zla ba rgyas pa ni// khams gsum ma rig mun bai spel ba'i rtags// zhabs/
362a4(rgyud 'grel): lhas dbang gis lcags sgrog 'khrol bA ni// thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i rtags// phyag g.yas ral gri 'bar ba bsnams pa ni// dam nyams dgra bgegs srog rtsa gcod pa'i rtags// gnyis pa
362a5(rgyud 'grel): thong rlon dmar tshan bsnams pa ni// srid gsum sha khrag zhal du rngubs pa'i rtags// g.yon pos mdung rnon pa dan 'phyar ba ni// dam nyams ma lus rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags// gnyis pas tri shu rtse
362a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum parnams pa ni// khams gsum nyon mongs rdul du rlog po'i rtags// bong bu gra dmar phyir phyogs zhon pa ni// log par lta ba'i sems can sbrel ba'i rtags// srin po'i ya 'gal snga ru byas pa ni//
362b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin yul lang ga' spu ri 'joms pa'i rtags// srin po'i ma 'gal phyi ru byas pa ni// bdud dang srin po zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// sbrul nag chun pos gong sbed byas pa ni// zhe sdang gdug pa'i bgag mo/
362b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs 'joms pa'i rtogs// rus sbrul nag po'i gedu bus brgyanA pa ni// bdud nag po dmau lnga btags pa'i rtags// bdud kyi khyam bam stu shar btags pa ni// dam tshig nyams pa khrum la 'debs
362b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'i rtags// nAd kyi rgyul ba byi sIr byetags pa ni// basbyin pa shig rnams li nad khe 'bebs pa'i rtags// bong du'i chang ra mig gos brgyan pa ni// khams gsum dgra bgegs rnams las rgyal ba'i rtags//
362b4(rgyud 'grel): don dam bcud kyis rtag su zhag gi zo ras dang // thugs rje chags pa'i rtagasu khrag gi thig les brgyan// 'dul byed phrin las rtag su thal chen tshom bus brgyan// phrin las kun khyab rtagasu ma mo 'bum gyis
362b5(rgyud 'grel): bskor// mi bdud 'bum drag po nyur khye mdzod la// sgrub mchog bdug gi dgra baglegs khrid la shog/ ma tso ga kha nas me 'byur mtsho skems ma// lag na ri rab rdo cher 'bebs mdzod ma// mthu stobs bdag
362b6(rgyud 'grel): me ma cig re mo to// bdag gis bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// bdag gis btsun par lha mo khyod la bstod// khyod kyis bdag la dngos grub bsngal du gsol// dpal lha mo la bram ze mtshag
363a1(rgyud 'grel): sred kyis rtags kyi sgo nas bstod pa'o// / la li ta badz+ra dang gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shr-i kA li de wi spyod
363a2(rgyud 'grel): tra nA mA/ ram mkha'i lha phran rnams kyis bstod zer ba'adra snang / bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ me bcos chos sku bde ba chen po ni// srid dang zhi bar mi gnas mnyam nyid dang // sku gsung thugs dang yon
363a3(rgyud 'grel): tan 'phrin las mchog/ dpal dang ldan pa'i lha mo khyod la bstod// sku'i dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam// mya ngan mi 'da' 'thun par snang ba nyid// mdzes pa'i rgyan cha ma cig re ma ti// 'gro ba'i gnyen cig
363a4(rgyud 'grel): ma la bdag bstod do// chos sku mkha' ltar dag pa'i shes rab me// longs sku bde tshun rmang byung thabs tshul gyis// ma rungs gdug pa can rnams char gcod pa'i// myi bskal thugs rje can+da la bdag bstod do// dam
363a5(rgyud 'grel): bapa mi 'dor rtagasu bong bu phyibs// lha'i lhar gyur lha min skyug mdzad ma// sbrul sku'i rdzu 'phrul stong gsumi khyab par nyul// bstan pa'i gnyer mdzad ma la bdag bsto // dpal ldan lha mi mi 'gyur thugs rje can//
363a6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod gtor 'di bzhis la// rnal 'byor bdag gi 'dod pa'i don rnams bsgrubs// bstan pa'i dgra bgegs ma lus med par mdzod// ces lha ma srin gyis bstod po/ la li ta badz+ra dang /
363b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI daM wI kA li stod d+hA nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo la bstod pa zhes bya bA/ sgyid gsum zil non
363b2(rgyud 'grel): 'drod khams dbang phyug mo// 'jig rten gtso la rtag tu gus phyag 'tshal// mya rnams nang na khyed nyid mchog yin te// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la bstod// bzhin mdzes yid 'ang lta bas mi ngoms
363b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ yon tan sna tshogs kun gyis lus rab brgyan// sbyin modzes ut+pal sngon po'i mdab mya mdzes// bsod nams ye shes snang ba'i dra bas brgyan// nor bu rin chen+da rin thang med pa bzhin// ding bdag par
363b4(rgyud 'grel): mo khyed la bsngags pas kyang // sems la gsal bya thams cad grub par 'gyur// lha mo dgos 'dod 'grub la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag ye shes gya nom bkra shis 'dud// pad ma lte bu shin tu rnam
363b5(rgyud 'grel): par dag/ lus mdog rab mdzes kun gyis lta byas mos// yon tan rgya mtsho gter la phyag 'tsha lo// dri med ye shes 'od zer rab mdzes pa// dran pa rnams kyi nang du mchog tu 'gyur// mthu stobs rdzu 'phrul
363b6(rgyud 'grel): yon tan rtsal mnga' bas// bdud rigs glang po'i klad chen 'gems la 'dud// 'di lhor gcan gza ni mchog gyur seng ge ltar// bstan pa dri med yul 'khor skyong la 'dud// de ltar sngags shing pi stong pa'i
364a1(rgyud 'grel): dgra pa 'dis// kun mkhyen mchog la kun nas gnas par shog/ ces drung stong ka'u d+hi las bstod pa// la li tA byAd+d+ha d+hA/ g+hi snang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o//
364a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ shrI de wi kA li stod drA nA m+b+ha khyod skyong du// dpal lce mo la bskyod pa zhes bya ba/ na mo byAd+d+hi DA ki nI b+h+yaHSh+T+r-iHbskal pa me ltar 'bar b+ha'i klong dkyil ni// rlung nag chub mtho 'khyil ba'i pho brang nas// maN+Dig
364a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa khrims kyi dbang phyug ma// sku mdog sngo nag che re sprin lta bu la// thod skam dbu skyon snyan g.yon seng ge'iphyo// snyan cha g.yas pa sbrul gyi gdengs ka can// spyan gsum dmar zlum zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs//
364a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig pa'i lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag g.yas ral gri thod khrag bsnams pa yis// dam nyams ma lus sgrol zhing rol pa ste// g.yon pa mdung dang ru mtshon dgra bgegs sgrol// lha mo rab 'jig khyod la phyag
364a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// su stong zhing lpags sbrul nag ska rags can// sku smad ba glang ko rlo na re lngas dkris// stong gsum nyul byed bong bu ga dmar phyibs// srin po'i ya 'gal rnga ru khrem pa btags// gong skyed sbrul nog nang rgyal
364a6(rgyud 'grel): dgra la gte// mchod gtor 'di bzhes dgra bgegs sgrol la shog/ ces bla ma mai tri pas lha mo zhal gzigs dus su bstod pa// la li ta badz+ra dang / lo tsA ba gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o//
364b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skud du/ shrI da l+li kA li stod tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal l+h+wa mo la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal ldan bla ma dam pa dang // he ru ka la byug 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bstun pa
364b2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu rgyas mdzad phyir// ye shes dbyings las rang byung dpal ldan ma// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum gyur dpal ldan ma// srid gsum bdag pos phyag byas lha mo bstod// gdug pa skrag mdzad shin tu ring
364b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku// nam mkha'i mdog can sbrul po'i gza' skar 'phro// khro gnyer smin ma rab bsdus mche ba gtsigs// bdud bzhi tshar gcod dpal ldan lha mo bstod// dug lnga byang chub lam mdzad bang bu phyibs// thabs
364b4(rgyud 'grel): shes zung 'brel zhabs gnyis lcags sgrog mdzes// nyi zla rab rgyas khrig zhag thig les brgyan// bde mchog 'byung gnas dpal ldan lce mo bskyod// sku gsum sgri bo meng spyan gsum glog ltor myur// kham
364b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum skyibs mdzad dang nag klo rnon can// re lnga'i nA bzur rjen bA ro wA mi bstod// tshad med drug pa ni thod khrag mtshan cha'i tshigs// rna me zlar bzhi'i rang bzhin bsnams par mdzad// ba dngos rnam zi nas skyid
364b6(rgyud 'grel): na rgyun mi 'chang // pha rol phyin drug rgyan ldan lce mo bstod// srid pa'i mtsho skems ye shes mo dpung 'bar// ma rung 'dul phyir dug sbrul seng ges brgyan// gdug pa bsgral phyir khrag gi rgya mtshor bzhugs/
365a1(rgyud 'grel): mgo rlon do shal 'chang ba'i lha mo bstod// gsung dbyangs zhi drag chos sgra 'gro ba 'dub// thugs zab mkhyen brtses srid zhi'i dam la sgrol// yon tan gzi brjid nyi ma 'bum
365a2(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'bar// phrin las kun 'grub dpal ldan lha mo bstod// sangs rgyas kun dngos dpal ldan bla ma yo// bstan pa dpal 'byor kun nas rgyas pa yi// 'gro kun theg mchog lam la 'god pa dang // bsgrub
365a3(rgyud 'grel): po don gnyis bsgrub pa'i phrin las mdzod// dpal ldan lha mo la a b+ha yas zhal gzigs dus bstod pa// paN+Di ta shra ta ka ra warma dang / gu rub yon tan shi las gu ga~M tho ling du bsgyur ba'o//
365a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI da wa~M kA li stod tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal ldan lha mo nag mo le bstod pa zhes bya ba/ Sh+T+r-iHdpal ldan lha mo dpag par dka' ba khyod// thabs kyi cho 'phrul na mkha' mtha' la sbyod /
365a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa khyod nyid la// sgo gsum dang ba'i sems kyis phyag 'tshalo// khyod ni bdog gis mchod par mi 'tshal yang // kun gyi dngos grub dam pa thob bya'i phyir// mkha' la 'dod pa'i yon
365a6(rgyud 'grel): tshor 'beb pa'i// mchod pa'i cho gos 'dis dbang po rgyas gyur cig/ lha mo khyod ni dge sdig sprang po ste// bdag gi lus ngag sems kyi sdig pa'i tshogs// ma lus khyed kyi mngon du bshags par bgyi// thugs
365b1(rgyud 'grel): rje'i thugs kyis sgrib pa sbyang bar mdzod// khyod kyi khyad par yongs su 'phags pa ni// 'gro ba'i don mdzad bdag don phun sum tshogs// dka' thu ba phrag dog med pa'i spros pa 'di// rjes su yi rang khyod
365b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyud la 'bul// 'di ltar yon tan+da ldan pa'i sku mdog ni// nag mo bzang mo 'jigs pa'i mthu stobs kyis// phyogs bcur dus kun 'gro ba'i don mdzad par// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul du bsku bar mdzod//
365b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag yon tan khyod kyi sku mchog gis// gdug pa 'dul phyir bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs bar du ni// mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol ba 'debs// 'di ltar phyag
365b4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal mchod cing po shags pa dang // rjes su yI rang bskul zhong gsol ba yis// dge ba 'di yis ngan song stongs gyur te// 'gro kun tshogs rdzogs byang chub chen por bsngo// dpal ldan lha mr-i la
365b5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig can gyis yan lag bdun du bstod pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta snying phreng can dang / lo tsA ba gyi
365b6(rgyud 'grel): ltung dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o//
366a1(rgyud 'grel): las mkhan gyi bskyod pa bzhug so//
366b1(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ dpal ldan bka' nyan nag po gnod sbyin sku// zhal gudangs mche gtsigs sha dang khrug la dga'// spyan bgrang sgra brjes rdo rje'i thod gdengs can// sdigs pa'i gri gug
366b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// ho ha'i gang rgyangs dgra snying sbar gyis 'debs// thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan cing zhing lpags gyon// l-ig 'dren 'dul zhing dgra ba'i ga shed ma byung // sha dang khrag gis mchod kyis
366b3(rgyud 'grel): dgyes par mdzod// dpal ldan 'jigs su rung ba'i phrin las kyis// gdug pa tshar gcod bdud dong mu stegs 'joms// bstan la rab dga' mthu stobs bsam mi khyabo// gsang sngags skyong ba khyod la
366b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// bsngags shing las la bskul gyis dpung bskyed la// nyes legs stangs zung ngami tshig rjes kyang chod// bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i chos 'khor lo// dgra bge gros rdul phran tsam
366b5(rgyud 'grel): yod med par mdzad// / hU~M mgon po'i bka' nyan nag mo gnod sbyin mi// dpal 'bar brjid pa'i gzugs 'dzin drag gtum ma// khra la rngam pa'i zhad bskrad mche ba
366b6(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs// rkang tshil za byed nag mo khyod la bstod// thod pas brgyan zhing byi ru'i lan char can// gdug pa tshar gcod g.yas pa spu gri 'dzin// dar nag na bza' gsol ba'i dbang mo che// sdigs pa'i phyag
367a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya can khyod mchod cing bstod// rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba'i sgras// ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za dbang du bsdud// dur khrod nyul zhing snying khrag dron mo 'thung // dgra bgegs rdul du rlog
367a2(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo// pho nya mang po sprul pa'i 'phro 'du yis// gtsug lag khang dang dkyil 'khor skyong mdzad ma// bdag dang ngag de'i phyogs la gnas pa rnams// bu sdug bzhin du rtag tu bsrung du gsol//
367a3(rgyud 'grel): hU~M/ dpal ldan phrin las kun rdzogs pu t+yA khyod// sku mngag mthing nag mAM yi 'phro 'du cani// rngam pa'i stabs kyis 'agling zhi shang lang bsnams// gling chen gdug pa 'dul lo phyugi 'tshal lo//
367a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs dpa' la rngam po'i zhal gdangs shing // glog ltar 'khyug pa'i lcags 'dril mche be gi tsigs// klang khrag bsres pa gsol zhing spyan rtsa dmar// skra brdzes thod phrang can la phyag 'tshalo// mgo bo'i ngo
367a5(rgyud 'grel): shal dar nag na bza' gsol// yon tan lhun rdzogs kham sna gsum dgra las rgyal// 'dzugs byed chen po dpa' bo'i gar stabs kyis// sprul pas 'gro don mdzad la phyag 'tshol lo// lam la gnas pa'i
367a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams// bden pa'i stobs dang ring ba'o nus mthu yis// gsang sngags phyogs 'dzin dbro lha khyad bstod kyis// rje btsun bdud las rgyal ba dgyes par mdzad/ nga jig pa sdu ni rdzi dang // sgra bri ga
367b1(rgyud 'grel): na na pa spyod// gan sru sar+b+ba du smras// hUM/ 'jigs byed dbyings las bzhengs pa'i sku mchog ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rngam pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs// dgra bgegs char gcod rno dkar mchad
367b2(rgyud 'grel): gcigs// ro drug ma chags gsal li phyag 'tshal// spyan cu bsgyur zhing gzigs mdzad thod phreng can// yon tan stobs rdzogs ral pa gyen du brdzes// phri ni las rnam bzhis gdug pa tshar gtsang phyir// bya
367b3(rgyud 'grel): na ngam shing 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// modag nag dus mtha'i me lhor gaN+DI brjid 'bad// du ba drod brgyan dang cha lugs ldan pas skrag/ der dang stag gis gos gyon mchog tu dper// gtu ma tshan+dod+ha
367b4(rgyud 'grel): khyod la phyag 'tshal lho// mu stegs 'du ba mdzad dmi nyams gshid ma khyod// dgra snying sbyar bas 'debs shing las la badzin// nyams pa gang yin+d+ra sgrol la sha khrag zo// bstan pa bsrung ba'i phrin
367b5(rgyud 'grel): los bortson par mdzod// / b+h+yoHsngon che gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa yi// bstan pa bsrung bar dam bcas ral gcig ma// nag mi bzang mo dam tshig ldan ma khyod// dam
367b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig rdzas kyis mchod cing phyag 'tshal lo// srin po'i cha lugs 'jigs pa'i sku mchog las// nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i gzi brjid 'bar// bdud kyi lcam mo dung gi mche ba can// dgra bgegs rtsad nas
368a1(rgyud 'grel): gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag g.yas gser gyi sgra gri 'dzin zhing sdigs// g.yon pa rgyu ma zhal du gsol zhing gzhad// khams gsum dbang bsdud spyan gsum so sor gzigs
368a2(rgyud 'grel): nag mo thod phreng can la phyag 'tshal lo// za 'og gos gyon mtshan mor dur khrod nyul// nag mo ral pa g.yangs pa'i sprul pa yis// ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za dbang du bsdud// dur khrod gtsa mo khyod la phyag 'tshal
368a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ gsang sngags rdo rje 'dzin pas khyod bstod kyis// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrungs cig ral gcig ma// dgra bgegs rdul du rlog cig kha 'bar me// dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i phrin las grub par mdzod//
368a4(rgyud 'grel): b+h+yornam drag tshad med bzhi'i rang bzhin las// thubs la mkhas pa sgo skyong khro mi'i sku// bran g.yog mdug pa pho nya 'phro 'du yis// 'gugs 'dren 'ching sdom mdzad pa'i 'phrul mo che// seng ge'i gdong can so
368a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig srid gsum za// lcags kyu 'dren cing thod rlon phreng pa bgrang // seng ge stag drang bye nag mang po'i tshogs// byams pas log 'dren 'gugs pa khyod la bstod// ga zag gis gdong can khrod khrag ldag
368a6(rgyud 'grel): ma/ zhags pa thod pa 'dzin cing las la brtson// gzig dang spyang mo mkha' lding bya ba yi tshogs// thugs rje legs por 'dren mdzad khyod la bstod// dom gyi gdong can khams gsum sa le gzigs// lcags
368b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrog sgron me bsnams pa'i mthu mo che// glang chen dom dang mkha' lding sprul pa'i tshogs// dga' bas log 'dren 'ching mdzad khyod la bstod// drod kyi gdong can sde brgyad kha lo bsgyur// tho ba dang ni lcags kyi 'khor
368b2(rgyud 'grel): lo bskor// dred mo g.yag dang mkha' lding pho nya'i tshogs// btang snyem sa chen po don mdzad khyod la bstod// kun kyang ma mo mkha' 'gro nyi zla'i sbyin// 'jigs tshul che la thabs mkhas thugs rje che// khaM khaM
368b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig tshig sha dang khrag la dga'// 'jigs pa'i nga ro can khyod mchod cing bstod// ces pa 'khor gyi bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po bram ze mchog srid kyis bstod pa mdzad pa paN+Di ta shwA ta ta ka
368b4(rgyud 'grel): ra warma dang l-i tsA pA rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// / hUM/ gnod sbyin nag po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dAr min ga sha sku lo gsol//
368b5(rgyud 'grel): phyug g.yas gser gyi gri gug bsnams// chos 'khyor bsrung ma khyod la bstod// gnod sbyin nag mo chen mo khyod // phyag gnyis spu gri thod khrag bsnams// gser gyi rgyan chas rab sgeg pa'i// mkha
368b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro chen mo khyod la bstod// sngon tshe rdo rje 'chang dang ni// slob dpon 'phags pa gru sgrub dang // pad ma'i rgyal po thod phreng dang // rnal 'byor dbang phyug sas skya ba// kun dga' snying po la sogs pa'i// bla ma
369a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi bka' bzhin du// dam tshig bzang po rjes dgongs la// bka' dang dam bcas las mya 'da' bar// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyed kyis bsrungs// gnod pa'i dgra bgegs
369a2(rgyud 'grel): rdul du rlog/ rnal 'byor bdag cag 'khor bcas kyi// ji ltar bsams pa'i don rnams ni// chos bzhin bsgrub pa'i las mdzod cig// hUM rI mon bu pu tra gnas na skye bzhengs/
369a3(rgyud 'grel): men gyi ga sha sku la gsol// sher shing seg shang phyag na bsnams// mon bu pu tra khyod la bstod// man buM b+ha tra stag klag bkru// dar gyi ral kha sku la gsol// spu gri rnon po phyag na bsnams// mon bu b+ha
369a4(rgyud 'grel): tAtu phyag na bsnams// spu gri mo ni chen mo ma// nAg mo tshan mo kha 'bar ma// gser gyi spyi gri phyag na bsnams// nag mo khyed la bstod pa 'bul// bud med nag mo brgya/ gshegs kyi shul yang 'dran// g.yas
369a5(rgyud 'grel): k+Shi ru 'dren pa/ stag chas brgyan pa brgya/ g.yon gyi ru 'dren pa/ nyan thos dgra bcom ba rgya/ slad kyi rjes 'brang ba/ bano d+he nag po brgya/ 'khor bcas kun la bstod pa 'bul// slob dpon mchog sred
369a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis mdzad pa'o// /
370a1(rgyud 'grel): la ldan gyi mo drong pom ma'i dzes gnang bzhugs
370b1(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan lha mo'i sgo nas glator ma'i rjes gnang bya bar 'dod pas/ gnas khang yid dang mthun par/ maN+Dal dang mchod gtor tshogs kyi yo byung
370b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshogs par bshams la/ rang nyid bstan bde ba la 'dug nas dgyes pa rdo rje 'am// gdun bzhi'i mngon rtogs bsgom// yi dam gyi gtor ma btang ba'i rjes la// lha mo'i mchod gtor brgyas par btang // tsho gas
370b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis mchod nas/ slob ma s+sa maN+Dal phul/ lag pa me tog dang bcas pa la/ slob dpon gyi slob ma la/ mdun 'di ni dgyes pa rdo rje 'am/ rdo rje gdan bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rten gzhal yas khang / brten pa lnga
370b4(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa bzhugs pa yin pas/ gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol/ rdo rje rA ba'i nang rol/ dur khrod chen po brgyad kyi shar phyogs nag po drag po'i khul na khyed rang 'dug par bsgoms/ mdun gyi nam mkha' 'di ni phyogs
370b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rtsa ba dang brgyud par bcas pa'i bla ma dang yi dam kyi lha tshogs chos skyong ba'i bsrungs ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams sbyin phung stobs pa bzhin du thibs so bo zhugs/
370b6(rgyud 'grel): par bsams la/ mos pa dang gus po bgyis shig byas la/ lha mo'i gtor ma de slob ma'i mgo thog tu bzhag la/ lha mo dud pa'i sol ba ma 'khor nag mo 'dzum sde'i tshogs dang bcas pa khyed rnams kyis/ slob mi dzi
371a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i lus ngag yid gsum la sku gsung thugs gsum gyis byin gyis rlobs snyam du bsams la/ mos pa dang gus pa'i sgo nas bla ma yi dam chos skyong bsrungs ma dpal lha mo dud
371a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sel ba ma 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyi mgrin gcig tu/ ba shis pa 'di khyed rang rnams la brjod par bsoms shig byas la/ slob ma shes pa de dam smra ba'i seng ge yis// nyon mongs srid pa'i nyes pa skye
371a3(rgyud 'grel): nonos gyi/ rgyong mo gnyings g.yo ba gco phyi/ sbyor don dam rgyal ba nyid du 'grub gyur cig/ ces brjod pa'i brjod la// dpal ldan lha mo mi pham srid gsum dbang gis bstod pa tshar gcig brjod/ gtor ma slob ma'i lag tu gtad
371a4(rgyud 'grel): naso/ dur khrod bdag po tshar gcig brjod la/ dpal ldan dud po'i sol ba ma 'khor nag mo 'bum sde'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams la mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang / gtor ma la sogs pa phul nas// bdag gi slob ma mang
371a5(rgyud 'grel): rus 'di zhes pa gtad kyi/ ji srid gnas kyi bar du// 'di'i lus ngag yid gsum la khyed kyi sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis rlobs la/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gnyen po bsrungs// dkon mchog gi cha 'phyung gcig/ bla ma
371a6(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i 'phrin las sbubs shog/ sems can gyi bde skyid sbal gcig/ khyad par du'ang slob ma 'di zhes bya ba la sdong grags dang / bsrung ba dang / skyabs pa dang / swa ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pa chen po mdzad du gsol
371b1(rgyud 'grel): nad dang / gdon dang / rkyen dang / bar du gcod pa thams cad zhi ba dang // bsam pa'i don thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub cing / tshe dang / dpal dang / 'byor pa la sogs pa zla ba yar gyi ngo bzhin du rgyas pa'i 'phrin las mdzad du
371b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol// khyed rnams kyis kyang dus 'di nas bzung nas/ sangs rgyas ma thob kyi bar du// chos skyong ba'i bsrungs mi yin pas/ mchod bstod bsgom bzlas rgyun ma chad par mdzod cig/ ces brjod// lha mo dang de tshig bsre ba'i phyir
371b3(rgyud 'grel): 'thob kyu gcig dang / ma da na du ba gcig byin/ bka' bsgos pa bzhin 'grogs nas stong phyogs byed par bsam mo// gtor ma sa gtsang sar btang // smon lam dang bsngo bas rgyas gdab/ dkon mchog gsum dang yi dom
371b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi bkris brjod// dpal ldan lha mo'i rjes gon dwe/ slob dpon chen po zhe sdang rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzog so// // dpal mgon zhal bzhi pa'i bstod chen bzhugaso// // hUM dpal ldan mgron po nag po che// dbang
371b5(rgyud 'grel): phyug chen po srod gsum bdeg/ mche ba rtsegs shIng mchu 'byung ba// shugs chen byis pa'i lus can la// dril bu'i sgra sgrog 'jigs par byed// shin tu drug po'i 'phreng bas brgyan// dge bgegs gcod pa'i dpa' bo ste/
371b6(rgyud 'grel): ming gi rnam grangs mang po can// nyi zla 'bar ba'i sdang migo gis// khams gsum skrag mdzad khyod la bstod// khro rgyal dar stabs tshul du bzhugs// klog steng 'khyug 'dra'i ljags 'dril zhing // g.yon pa gter gyi bum
372a1(rgyud 'grel): pa thogs// g.yas na mdung dang gri khug 'dzin// 'jig su rung ba'i 'gyogs pa can// lag pa g.yon pa thod khrug gsol// tshangs skud mi mgo'i 'phreng bas brgyan// sa bla sa 'og sa stengs nas// k+ShaM k+ShiM 'jigs/
372a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgra sgrog pa// srin po'i gzugs brnyan tsam pa'i sku// bskal pa'i me ltar 'od zer 'bar// haSha 'gri ba'i sku la bstod// s+pho Ta la ni chen po na// dpal ldan nag po chen po bzhugs// te si gangs kyi zhing skyong mdzod// zhal bzhi sngon po
372a3(rgyud 'grel): nyis rtsegs g.yas// g.yon gnyis dmar ljang khros pa'i zhal// ha ha'i gad rgyangs 'brug sgra sgrog/ hUM hUM sgrog pa'i dpal khyod kyis// srid gsum lha srin ma lus pa// thams cad 'dar zhing skrag par byed// dmag dpon chen po zhal bzhi
372a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ lasu sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung // zasu dgra bgegs sha khrag rus// za byed khro bo khyod la bstod// dngos grub thams cad rtsol ba'i lha// rang bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khos blangs pa'i// sngar gyi ska du go bar/
372a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis// gang gis go bar byed ces na/ sha chen zan dang me tog spos// chang phud sha khrag gtor ma 'di// khyer cig zo cig dam tshig can// byang phyogs wa traM can na bzhugs// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dbang byed cing // rang gi yum dang
372a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mang skye// mthu stobs can la bdag bstod// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar ni// dam bcas zhol gyis bzhes pa yis// dpal ldan mgon po khyod kyis ni// tshul bzhin sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor dang // bodag la thugs rjes dgongs//
372b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzod la// nyid kyis mthu rtsal chen po yis// dgra la sdang ba'i dgra bgegs rnams// de dag khyod kyis myur du song // bdag gi sems la ci 'dod pa// de dag khyod kyis myur du sgrubs// b+h+yo/ g.yung mo gtum mo srin mo dang // sing ga la
372b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas rnal 'byor ma// dmar dang ljang ser khros pa'i zhal// gri gug thod 'dzin yab la 'khyud // 'phrin las rnam bzhi sgrub byed pa'i// yum tshan bzhi po khyed rnams kyang // ngam rdzas gtor ma 'di zhes la// rgyo ba rgyob sdang ba'i dgra la rgyob
372b3(rgyud 'grel): sod sod gnod pa'i dgra bgegs song // sreg sreg bar chad thams cad sregs// tshad tshang rnal 'byor dgra bgegs rnams// rigs rgyud rtsang nas tshad la sheg/ hUM hUM k+ShaM k+Shi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin can// dpal ldan yab
372b4(rgyud 'grel): yum 'khor bcas ma lus rnams// 'dir gshegs brgyan pa'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la// bcol ba'i las rnams myur du grub par mdzod// rnal 'byor bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// byang chub ma thob par du
372b5(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba dang // rtag tu longs spyod rgya chen ldan pa dang // 'jig rten 'dir yang tshe rings nad med cing // 'khor g.yog rigs rgyud dpal la sogs pa yis// dngos grub thams cad bdag la rtsal du gsol// rnal 'byor bdag
372b6(rgyud 'grel): cag dam pa'i chos sgrub pa'i// rtag tu stong grogs gnyen po mdzad du gsol// dmag dpon tshan po zhal bzhi pa'i bstod po shaM lo kha nyi shu pa zhes bya ba bram ze rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs//
373a1(rgyud 'grel): rganan nanam ga sha lan
373b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ A d+hiSh+ThA na mya hA ka la sa d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ byin gyis brlabs pa nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba// dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor la la dag 'tshal lo// ji ltar
373b2(rgyud 'grel): bde ba rgyas byed pa'i// dpal ldan thugs rje'i bdag po mchog/ spyan ras gzigs la phag 'tshal lo// nenag po chen po'i sgrub thabs bri// dang po dad pa rab brtan nas// byang chub mchog tu sems skyed de// rang nyid
373b3(rgyud 'grel): he ru kar skyed la// de rjes stong pa nyid du bsgom// bla mya sangs rgyas can kun+da mtshad// bstod dang gshegs pa la sogs bya// bsngo zhing tshad med bzhi po bsgom// de rjes stong pa nyid du bsam// stong po'i dang las a
373b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam te// de rjes hUM las rdo rje'i brag/ sna tshogs mdog can ro las ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de stengs su// b+ha ni shel gyi mdog 'dra las// byi na yaka brdal ba'i sdeng // hUM las nag po 'jig par byed// zhal
373b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum phyag drug rngam pa'i sku// g.yas dkar g.yon pa dmar bas te// dbus mthing stag gi pagus pas bsgril// rin chen zhabs bdub sbrul gyis brgyan// phyag g.yas gri gug 'phreng ba dang // Da mo ru ni drug
373b6(rgyud 'grel): tu 'khrol// g.yon pa thod pa mdung rtse gsum// de bzhin zhags pas dgra bo 'dzin// drag po'i zhal las mche ba gcig/ spyan gsum dbu skra gyen du 'bar// dpral ba sin+d+hu ra yi ge yu rung 'khyil// mo skyong
374a1(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor bzhugs pas byin gyis brlobs// gnas gsum lha bsam ye shes sems dpa' bstim// dbang bskur nas ni ri bdag so sor bsam// brtan par gyur nas rang gi mdun// dpal
374a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan khra mo dza li ni// g.yas pa g+h+ri gug thod khrag g.yon// sku mdag nag mo 'jigs byed ma// g.yas su k+ShA twAM pa liM me// Da ma ru g.yas sdig 'jub g.yon// sku mdog du ba'i mdog can no// g.yon du Ta ki rA
374a3(rgyud 'grel): ser// g.yas pa rtse ga sum sdig 'dzum g.yon// rgyub tu ma hA ka li ni// dmar nog g.yas pa gri gug 'dzin// g.yon pa thod khrag zhal du rngubs// rus pa'i rgyan ldan gcer bu mo// gar thabs keng rus gdan
374a4(rgyud 'grel): la bzhugs// mcho gtsigs spyan gsum khros pa'i zhol// gtso bo dang ni dus mnyam skyed// las kyi lha mo bzhi po ni// gdug pa can kun 'gugs byed cing // bzung nas gtso bo la stob byud// sngags kyi bzlas
374a5(rgyud 'grel): pa des rjes tsam// oM shrI ma hU~M ka sa la sI thA tha na ma ma hUM hUM phaT// rtsa b+ha'i sdig su bstan pa ni// oM badz+ra ma hA ka lA k+ShiM k+She Tu big nan// bi na ya kaM hUM hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT// gtso 'khor te basbyin stug su byAs+thAn+ta//
374a6(rgyud 'grel): ya hA ka li dza li ni ha ha phaT/ oM ma hA ka li ni k+Sha tra pa la hUM hUM phaT/ oM rad Ni Ta ki rA tsa hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ka li ni she tru mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT/ 'khor gyi sngags su bstan pa yin// lha la mnyes pa'i gtor ma naM/
374b1(rgyud 'grel): sha lnga bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// ka pa lar thug byin brlabs te// tsan dan shing las gtso 'khor rnams// byon pa rnal 'byor mdun du ni// sgra dang bcas pas byon pa la// gsang ba'i sngags 'dis 'bul bar bya//
374b2(rgyud 'grel): oM shrI badz+ra ma hA ka la yi sha sa naM/ a pa ko ri na/ ya ti pra ti dz+nyA sma ra si ta d+ha i dan duSh+Ta/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ mA ra mA ra/ grih+na gr-ih+Na/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na da ha/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa pa/ dwi ni me kai na
374b3(rgyud 'grel): mA ra ya hU~M hUM phaT phaT/ gtso 'khor rnams kyis gsol bar bar bsam// de ltar rtags dang rab ldan pas// sgrub pa'i las lA sbyar ba ni// sngags lnga shAm+b+ha bru gdags par bya// de nas bsdad pa'i las bya ba/
374b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags l-I yaM dang ya gdags bya// sbyin sreg byas la mnan par bya// gtor ma steng nas mnan la bzhag/ rtag sa byung skyes pa'i ts+tsha ta ru// sgeg po chen po'i snying po dang // 'khor dang bdud rtsir bcas la bzhug/
374b5(rgyud 'grel): dar nag gis gtums mtshan khung gdags// skabasu lag pas bzung byas la// bsad pa'i sngags kun bzlas par bya// bdag gis nag po chen po yi// sgrub thabs byin gyis rlob pa 'di// brtsams la dge
374b6(rgyud 'grel): pa gang yod pas// dpal ldan nag po'i zhal mthong shog/ byin gyis brlabs pa nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal ldan dzA ba ra bas mdzad pa rdzogaso// /

375a4(rgyud 'grel): lo tsA ba 'gar chos kyi bzang pos kyang bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ces byams pa gsung ngo // 'di'i bka' yig mchug sgrub kyi bka' chung pa dang 'thun par mdzad// d+hA
375a5(rgyud 'grel): sa / nag yin sa smras d+d+he d+ha gas pa / rgyu ga skud du/ a d+hin+tA nA m+b+ha ma d+hu kA la gr-i ya sa d+ha naM na ma/ bod skad du/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i nag po chen
375a6(rgyud 'grel): gsong ba'i sgrubs zhes bya ba phags pa sbyin ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal mo// de nas gas na/ dan bdug rjong du hU~M gi su mo dam ngan gams// pad ma 'dam
375b1(rgyud 'grel): rang byung sin d+hu ra yis byug/ mtshan ldan thod pa kra pa la// me long pad ma chos 'byung dang // li khri gur gum b+hi wang dang // rang byung sin d+hu r+g+ha skyegs kyis// chos 'byung kha sbyar 'khor lo bI// lam du

375b5(rgyud 'grel): dog nag mo la// lag na gr-i gug thod khrag bsnams// ro yi gdan la 'jigs pa'i tshul// khro mo'i tshul du bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i sngags ni 'bum tsho bzlas// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la k+ShaM k+Shi Tu big
375b6(rgyud 'grel): nan// bi na ya ka hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// ril bu mig sman mkha' spyod dang // rkang 'gyogs bum pa mchil lha ma dang // so 'og rig 'dzin gang 'dod pa// dpal ldan nag po chen pos bster// byin
376a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs pa'i nag po chen po'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs 'phags pa klu byad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / 'di'i brgyud pa ni/ rdo rje 'chang // mkha'
376a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma seng ge gdong can// 'phags pa klu byung / dus 'khor ba ka na ri pa// rdo rje gdan pa/ khyong po rnal 'byor/ rin chen brtson 'grus/ chos kyi seng ge/ chos kyi shes rab/ brtson 'grus seng ge/

376a4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen la byin gyis brlabs pa lags so// u u u/ oM badz+ra ma hA kA la k+She k+She tr-i big nan/ bi na ya ka hUM hUM phaT phaT/ un une un/ hr-i tri hri/ dza dzo/ wa shaM ku ru oM gu sha dza dza/ bya rog

377a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug ye shes mgon pa'i chos skor las mi bskyod pa la brten nas bgegs sel thabs bzhug so//

377b6(rgyud 'grel): bla ma gsal gdab sleb ma'i spyi bor byon par bsam/ slob ma'i gnas gsum du yi ge gsum bsam/ de nas dpral bar oM dkar po las/ bdud rtsi dkar po byung / slob ma'i spyi bor babs/ bum dbang thob 'dra/ mgrin

378b1(rgyud 'grel): hUMn da la thim/ na da thig le la/ thig le stong pa nyid la thim/ sems ma bcos pa'i ngang la bzhag/ gsal stod dang bla ma dbyer mi phyed par bsgom/ bsngo ba bya/ bkra shis brjod/ mi bskyod pa la brten nas mgon po'i gags/

378b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhi yi de nyid mngon du gyur// lam shes ngo bo nyid med cing // rnam mkhyen gsang ba bsam mi khyab// dus gsum sangs rgyas bkra shis shog/ slu med rgyu 'bras slab bya phra// lhag bsam dge ba rgya chen po// smin bral
378b5(rgyud 'grel): zung 'jug zab pa'i lamo// theg gsum dam chos bkra shis sheg/ ston pos bstan pa ngur smrig 'dzin// kun la phan+da sgrub rgyal ba'i sras// sgo gsum gsing sngags rnal 'byor 'chang // rigs gsum dge 'dun bkra

379a1(rgyud 'grel): bde legs 'phel gyur cig/ mgon po'i bkra shis yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya ba/ dpal sha wa ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / phyag drug ye shes mgon po'i chas skar
379a2(rgyud 'grel): mgon po dmar po'i tshe bsgrub bzhugs s+ho// na mo gu ru/ mgon po dmar po'i tshe bsgrub kyi zhal gdamyos ni/ bdag bskyed gang mo su bskyed pa'i mdun du ches 'byung dmar po gnyis rtsegs/ de'i phyir gzhal yas khang gru
379a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi 'khyams phyogs mtshon dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa/ de'i dbusu g+haM dmar po las tshogs bdag dmar po/ de'i steng du hUM dmar nag/ de las 'od zer 'phros/ gdug pa can thams cad tshar gcad/ chur
379a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dus hU~M la thi mau/ hUM mer gyis zhu ba las/ yid bzhin nor bu'i mgon po sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag drug pa/ zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor thabasu bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yon dang po gnyis gri thod/ bar pa
379a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyisna tsho ri bum po 'dzin pa/ tha ma gnyis TA ma ru dang dril bu bsnams pa/ rgyun cha lugs gzhan rnams mthun pa/ gnod sbyin bzhi/ lha mo gtsang ris/ dam tsAn rgya mtsho rnams bskyed la/ ye shes pa spyan drangs
379a6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig pa la stim/ gsol ba gang ba/ yige brgya bzlas/ bshags pa bya/ de nas mgon po'i thugs kar hUM dmar nag gi mtha' mar/ oM badz+ra ma hA kA la k+Sha rat+na gu ru hUM ces pos bskor ba la dmigs la
379b1(rgyud 'grel): nyer gcig bzlas/ bsnyen pa gzhan rnams kyang bya/ sku gsung thugs kyi gsol ba gdab bo// slob ma gzhug pa ni/ sngon 'gro rnams tshar ba dang / dngos gzhi ni maN+Dal dbus su mgon po gong bzhin gas
379b2(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ mgon po'i spyi bor mi bskyod pa sngo skya/ zhol gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa bsgom/ de'i thugs ka nas 'od 'phros/ rgyud pa'i bla ma spyan drangs bstim/ mi bskyod pa yang mgon pa la
379b3(rgyud 'grel): bstim/ dbyar mang du bsam/ de nas mgon po'i dpral bar oM dkar po/ mgrin par A dmar po// thugs kar hUM dmar po/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus la bzhengs nas rang gi sngags kyi sgra dang bcas pas slob

388b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// yid dang mthun pa'i dben gnas// mthun pa'i rkyen rnams chags pa dang // bde ba'i stan 'dug skyabs 'gro dang // se mos skyed tshad med bzhi bsgoms nas// swa b+hA wa yi stong par sbyangs// oM

388b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang gi rgyal po sku mdog dmar// zhal gcig spyan gsum dang po gnyis// gri thod bzung nas yum la 'khyud// bor gnyis lhang te ru rtse gsum 'dzin// 'og gnyis lcags kyu zhags pa bAsnams
388b5(rgyud 'grel): dbu skra sgyu ra smin me ser// thod rkam lnga'i dbu rgyun dang // rlon pa lnga bcu'i do shal byas// sbrang du gsang yum mkha' 'gro ma// chags pa'i nyams can sku madrug dmar// phyag gnyis gri thod
388b6(rgyud 'grel): yab la stob// phyag rgya lnga ldan yab la khyil// yab la sbrul rigs lce yi rgyan// 'od dpag med kyi spyod paN 'chang // mdun du ma hA kA la dmar// kri gug dang ni thod pa 'dzin// g.ya su k+She Ta pA
389a1(rgyud 'grel): la ni// du kha ljang te'u sdig 'dzub can// rgyab du dzi na mi tra ni// nag po gri gug thod pa can// g.yon du tra ki ra dza ster// rtse gsum dang ni sdig 'dzum 'gying // tham
389a2(rgyud 'grel): cad khro bo'i chas kyi brgyan// dam can+da rgya mtsho'i tshogs kyis bskor// yaM shes me dpung klong na bzhugs// kun gyi gnas gsum oM AHhUM// 'od kyi ye shes spyan drangs nas// dzaHhUM baM hos bgugs
389a3(rgyud 'grel): zhugs cing // mnyes par bzhugs pa'i sa bon las// 'od 'phros dbang gi lha tshogs bskul// mched nas gsol gdab dbang bskur bas// rang rigs bdag pos dbu la brgyan// yab yum thu gro
389a4(rgyud 'grel): kha ra nyi mar hUM// oM badz+ra ma hA ka la k+Shi k+She Ta big nan bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT d+hu ma gu ye swA hA/ 'od zer dmar po snod bcud khyab// 'gro ba'i nad gdon sdig sgrib sbyangs// brtan g.yo thams cad dbang du
389a5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus// bdag nyid ltar gsel drung du lhags// dad cing gus pos bdud par byas ma// de ltar rtse gcig ting 'dzin gyi// zhag bdun rgyun chad med par bzlas// dngosu zhal ston rmi lam du// bltas
389a6(rgyud 'grel): dang mtshan ma ci rigs 'byung // thun 'tshams mchod pa bzhi rdzogs dang // spos sbyor bzhi ldan gtor ma dbul// mgon po'i nang sgrub rje mi tri pa la bdag 'khyud po rnal 'byor gyi zhus pa'o// A
389b1(rgyud 'grel): // mgan pa'i myu sa brtag pa bkug to// @#// bla ma mgon po dbyer med phyag 'tsha lo// 'di ni mgon po rgyu ba'i dus so// dus gnyis las yang ngo'i zla ba dang // mar ngo'i zla ba'o// yar ngo'i tshes pa bcu gsum
389b2(rgyud 'grel): la nam gung rgyu de/ kha shar du ltas la bya'o// tshes brgyad la spyod dang tho rangs rgyu ste/ kha nub tu lta'o// tshwas bcu la bsrid la rgyu ste// kha byang du lta'o// bcu dang bco lnga la skya rengs shar nas rgyu ste/ kha
389b3(rgyud 'grel): nub tu ltas la bya'o// mAr ngo'i nyi shu gnyis la nyi me nub pa la rgyuste/ kha nub du lta'o// nyi shu laM sod la rgyu ste/ kha byang du lta'o// phur pe gdab pa dang thod pa mnan pa dang / khrag
389b4(rgyud 'grel): zor 'phangs pa thobs pa'i dus ni/ dbang phyug chen po skyed gdong ne ga po dang / lha mo dbu ma dang gnyis/ zla ba bcu gnyis pa la skye 'gro srang la 'jal zhing nyul bas de'i dus su byas na
389b5(rgyud 'grel): thebs che/ spyad zla ra ba'i tshes bcu la 'khor bstan ma bcu gnyis dang bcas nas nyul bas thabs che'o// 'ding po'i chos bcu drug la 'khor bdud bzhi dang bcas nyul bas thebos so//
389b6(rgyud 'grel): tha chungs gi nyir shu gnyis la ma bdud dang bcas nas nyul bas thabs so// dbyar zla ra ba'i tshes brgyad la 'khor bza' chen brgyad dang bcas nas nyul bas thebs so// 'bring po'i
390a1(rgyud 'grel): tshes bco lnga la 'khor klu drug dang bcas nas nyul bas thabs so// tha chungs lnga rigs lnga yab yum dang ma mo thams cad ltad mo la yangs pas mI byA/ ston
390a2(rgyud 'grel): zla ra ba'i nya gsum ka 'khor ma mo dang bcas nas nyul bas thabs so// 'bring po'i bcu bdun nas gnam stong gi bar 'khor rgyu skar gyis byas nas nyul bas thebs so// tha chungs kyis tshes
390a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad nus stong gyi bar du 'khor lha chen po brgyad kyis byas nas nyul bas thabs so// chun zla ra ba'i tshes bcu gsum nas bcu drug gau bar du 'khor gnod sbyin dang bcas nas nyul bas
390a4(rgyud 'grel): thabs so// 'bring po'i nyi shu nas stong gi bA ra du 'khor gshin rje dang bcas nas nyul bas thebaso// tha chungs kyi nyi shu dgu la lha srin yongs kyi kha lo bsgyur nas sems can la rtsis 'debs
390a5(rgyud 'grel): byed cing srog bdud pas thebs so// drag po'i las kyi phur bu 'debs pa dang / thod pa gnod pa dang / zor 'phen pa dang / hi spor ba dang / ser ba 'bebs pa cho gar song song byar mi rung byas
390a6(rgyud 'grel): noni phur pa btab kyang snang // thod pa gnon kyang rdzas 'drul/ zor 'phangs kyang khrag mdzad// ngan sngags zlas kyang rlung 'dang / lha mo sgrubs kyang don med/ log nas sngags po rang phung pos mi
390b1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// drug po ri las gang byed kyang mi rung / phyir zlog pa'i dus ni/ s+thi zla ra ba'i bcu bdun dang bcu dgu la byas na zlog/ 'bring po'i tshes gcig dang nyi rgyud pa bzlog/ tha chungs kyi gnam skyong la ldog/
390b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyar zla ra ba'i tshes gnyis dang lha la zlog/ 'bring po'i drug la ldog/ tha chungs go tshis bcu gcig la ldog/ ston zla ra ba'i nyi shu la ldog/ 'bring po'i tshes gsum la ldog/ tha chungs kyi ches gnyis
390b3(rgyud 'grel): la ldog/ rgun zla rA bi'i tshe sra bco brgyad la ldog/ 'bring po'i nyi shu la ldog/ tha chung spyi nyi shu bdun la ldeg/ de rnams su drag po'i las gang byed/ kyang log 'dren gdug pa can gnod pas rang gi sgrog
390b4(rgyud 'grel): la gnod do// rang ting nge 'dzin dang ldan yang / bu dang chung ma dang / byug la log to/ sngags pa tshe thung ba dang / bag ba ngan pa dang / dbul bar 'gyur ba'i kyon de lta bu 'ong ba yin no// slob dpon
390b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal ga shes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / 'thu rtsal thogs pa med par shog/ bkra shis
392a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug ye shes mgon pa'i chos skor las sha wa ri dbang phyug gi mdzang ba'i byin brlab nag po'i bsgrub thabs gos pa'i las mtha' can bzhug so//
392b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ s+yA thaM s+thA nA ma hA kA la sA da nam/ bod skad du/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i nag pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ myur mdzad spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo// zhabs
392b2(rgyud 'grel): bdub dang bcas bi nA ya ka mnan// naglo bo chen po steg gi sham thabs can// phyag drug sbrul gyis rgyan gyi rnam par brgya nAM// g.yas pa phreng bar pa gri gug 'dzin// tha ma Da ma ru nau drag tu 'khrol// g.yon
392b3(rgyud 'grel): pa thod pa dang ni mdung rtse gsum// de bzhin zhags pas bzung nas 'ching bar byed// drag po'o zhal lo mche ba rnam par gtsigs// spyan gsum drag po'i de bu skra gyen du 'bar// dpral bar sin+d+hu re yi legs
392b4(rgyud 'grel): par byug/ rin tshan thod rkum lnga yi dbu la brgyan// spyi bo mi bskyod pa yi dbu lo brgyan// khrag 'dzag mi mgo lnga bcu'i de shal tsAn// sna tshogs pad ma nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor steng // ye shes me dpung
392b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i dbus nas bzhengs// shing la byon nas gau torA ma len par dmigs// phas rdo rje gas kyi lha yin oM badz+ra ma hA kA l+yA k+She k+She tra big nan bi na ya ka hUM hUM phaT swA hA// oM shrI badz+ra ma hA kA lA k+ShaM k+Sha Ta yU ha na hA na/
392b6(rgyud 'grel): da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ pA k+ShA pU k+Shu/ ru ti ra mo sa ha ra stis/ g+h+ri hi da b+hA smi ku ru hri hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'phrin las sgrub pa'i sngag so// oM ma hA kA la ya sha sa na/ a pe ke brten pa'i sngags// ri ri/ ro sha a pa tsi ma hA ka l-i ya/ oM
393a1(rgyud 'grel): dan rad na tra ya ya/ a pa ka rA naM/ a ti pra tig dz+nyA sma ra si sarba duSh+Tan b+hU li kha kha kha hi khA him+bA ra mA rA/ g+ni snA g+ni h+nA/ b+hAn+ma d+hA b+hAn+ma d+hA/ ha na hA na/ drA ha da ha/ ba tsa pa tsa/ de na ma kaM ni hUM hUM phaT s+yAh+lA/ lAn
393a2(rgyud 'grel): bdun brjod la gtor ma sbyin// dpal ldan nag po che'i ba'i mchog/ ye shes phyag drug bsgrubs las sbyor dus tsha ge mo zhes 'don 'dod pa'i// rnal 'i byir pa ya 'di ltar bya// dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas mchog tu// las sbyor gyi sngagaso//
393a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi bya// 'thas par byas la chag chag gdabo// thig gdab sgo bzhi gru chad ldan// pho brang 'khor lo rtsib bzhi 'god// kha dog phyogs dang mthun par bya// sgo 'khyam nag po nang khyim dmar// gru
393a4(rgyud 'grel): tshad stug po mu khyud mthing // rti bas mtshan dkar bI zhi bar bya// pho brang dbus gtab gtor bca'// shwar skyer rdo rje ltar gri gug/ nub tu thod pa ltag spyod lnga// byid sgor rgyun gtor bzhag parar+ya bya// sha tshan gri khra gau drug gi brgya na//
393a5(rgyud 'grel): mgon po'i spos sregs mar me bltams// bde ba'i stan pa la 'dug nas ni// ye shes lha yi rnal 'byor bsgoms// dkyil 'khor pa las pad ma 'dab brgyad// de stong raM los nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor// de steng zla thogs bgeg
393a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal// la zug den le 'dzin bi na ya kaM kha sbub bsgyel// de yo steng du hU~M nag po// de la 'od 'phros las bzhi 'grub// tshur 'dus gri gug nag po yi// yu ba gser gyi rdo rjes byas// rno dngal thur la gtad pa'o// rdo rje'i lte bar nyi ma'i
393b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor// de steng hUM 'thing nag pos mtshan// de las 'od 'phros don gnyis byas// tshur 'dus pa las dam tshig pa'i// mgon po gzhung bzhin bsgom par bya// zhabs gnyis brkyang bsum bgegs chen gzer// rus
393b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhabs gdub rgyal rigs klu// dkar khra'i sbrul gyis brgyan pa'o// sdug gi pags pa'i sham thabs can// lto ba thur la 'phyang pa la// byung zhing rbom hwags gel ba'i gzugs// gnag cing gzi brjid che ba la// mi mgo lnga
393b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i do shal can// dril bu g.yer khas brgyan pa'o// zhal skud mche gtsigs lcags 'gril zhing // ag tshoms ser nag slor can// shangs rdog che zhing khro gnyer bsdus// spyan dmar gru gsum sdang mig gzigs// dam la
393b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i rtags kyi mchog/ dpral bar sin d+hu dag gi/ thig ler 'bar bas mtshan pa'o// dbu skra kham nag gyen la rjes// sangs rgyas rigs lngas mtshan pa yi// thod rkam lnga yi dbu la brgyan// dmang rigs nag khra'i sbrul gyi
393b5(rgyud 'grel): btsongs// mi bskyod pa yi rgyas btab cing // bram za dmar khras mgrin pa snyan// rdza rigs ser khros phyag gdub brgyan// g.yas kyi dang po thod 'phreng 'dzin// bar pa rdo NAM gri gug 'phyar// tha mu thod pa lcug sprod lnga// dril bu g.yer
393b6(rgyud 'grel): khas brgyan pa'o// g.yon gyi dang po thong khrig gsol// bar ba kha TaM rtse gsum 'dzin// tha ma rdo rje lcags sgeg gi/ zhags pa dgra bgegs lus la 'debs// de yi thugs kor pad nyi'i steng // hU~M nag 'bar bas mtshan
394a1(rgyud 'grel): par bsams// 'od 'phyos Da ma ru yi sgras// lho phyogs dur khrod bsil tshal gyi// tsan dun sdong po'i steng dag nas// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te// dzaHhUM baM hos gnyis med stim// thugs
394a2(rgyud 'grel): kar sa bon hUM nag las// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskor bar lta// phub rel can dang gri gug baing // dpal ldan lha mo la sogs pa'i// bka' sdod las mkhan phyogs bzhir bgodade// grang bcol 'phrin las sgrub par bsam// de nas
394a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi sngags bzlas pas// gtso bo'i thugs ka'i gsang ba'i sngags// gyen du phung te zhal nas 'thon// bdag gi zhal thim dngos grub thob// thugs kho nas thon thugs kar thim// thugs dem brgyud bskul 'gal me yaM//
394a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i tshul gyi sngags bzlas pas// sngags las 'phrin las bzhi yi 'od// 'phros nas las bzhi byas par lta// de nas mthun bzhir brjod bya zhing // thun mtshams dag tu gtor ma sngo// yi ge brgya pa nyams chags bskang
394a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mi shes snga sor gzhag/ sems can don du bsngo ba bya// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gyi// za 'chagau nyal 'dug spyod lam bzhis// dus dang yi ge'i grangs dang ni// rtags rnams ma rdzogs bar du bzlas// dus kyi snyen
394a6(rgyud 'grel): pa zla ba drug/ yi ge'i dbye ba khrag gnyis te// grangs gi bsnyen pa 'bum tsho gnyis// rtags ni sgrub la brtson pa yi// lus ngag yid gsum g.yeng ba spangs// dmigs pa rtse gcig gsal bar bzlas// bye nag lding dang khyi
394b1(rgyud 'grel): nag 'khor// sngags pas chas gro nag po can// bran g.yog tshul du 'grogs byed cing // zas nor ster ba smi ba'o// de dag khro zhing rgyags pa dang // bdag gi lang mo sna tshogs byed// mig log mchu med byed pa rnams//
394b2(rgyud 'grel): las mgon khros pa'i rtags yin pas// gtor ma gtang zhing gshegs pa bya// de la gtor ma'i man+ta ngag ni// rin chen snod dang ka pa lar// 'bruM s+t+waM gsum gyi zan gyi gang // gri sha gr-i khrag la sogs pa'o// rgyanau gyis brgyan
394b3(rgyud 'grel): chang gi bran// de nas sems bskyed yi dam bsgoms// swa b+hA wa yi sngags kyisau nI// phyi nang snod bcud stong par bsam// skad cig tsam las snad kyi nang+ga// ri las nyi dkyil de stingasu// sha lde bdud rtsi lnga nyid kyang // sa bon gsol ba
394b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa la// 'og tu yaM dang raM nyid las// yaM lus rlung byung raM las mi// 'bar te yig 'bru zhu ba las// 'bru aM AHhUM gsum brjod pas ye shes kyis// bdud rtsi dpag med 'phel bar bsams// de nas dam tshig mgron skyed
394b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas// bstims te phul bas mnyes par bsam// hUM bid gshegs bla ma mgon dang bcas// ye shes phyag drug gr-id+d+ho 'khor dang // dam can mkha' 'gro tshogs rnams kun// bstan bsrungs
394b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phrin las sgrub don du// rnal 'byor bdag gis gnas 'dir gshegs// gdungs pa'i sems kyis spyan 'dren gyi// thugs ram thugs rje'i dbang gi ni// da lta nyid du gshegasu gsol// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la k+She ces pa'i
395a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags lan bdun brjod// skar mnga' lam du bzhugs shul gyi// gnas nas byon nas thim par bsam// hUM mnyam med mthu chen me lhur 'bar// dgra bgegs ma lus thal bar rlog// thal byed
395a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhonu 'jigs pa'i sku// 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshalo// ces pas sgo gsum gus pas phyag 'tshalo// rtsa sngags bdun la b+ha ling gdags// gtso bo ye shes pa la dbul// las sngags bdun gyi 'khor la dbulo//
395a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa bya zhing 'phrin las bcol// de yi dus gsum spros bsregs te// bcan dug yungs kar sgo kyu gsum// gri khrag dang sbyar ril bu bya// yang na gu gul nag po dang // ba tsan dug yungs kar bu ram rnams// gri sha
395a4(rgyud 'grel): dag dang sbyor byas te// ril bu sran ma tsam byas nas// sol ba'i me la sregs par bya// lha rnams 'du zhing bgegs rnams bkrod// de las dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'di ni mAn ngag dam pa'o// de nasna gso ba'i las stan
395a5(rgyud 'grel): pa// 'khor lo rtsi thog bla phur rnams// bsrung byo'i gaM khra ba rdo rje yinA// 'khor lo rtsibaso brgyad mu khyud ldan// lte bar rtsa sngags bsrung bya'i ming // mu khyud nad ma sgrub sngags te// phyi ma rten 'brel sngags kyi skar// rtsib la hUM
395a6(rgyud 'grel): chen 'bar ba brgyad// rtsibs mtshan rnams la las sngags 'god// mchod pa lnga bshams rab gnas bya// de nyid gang srung lus la gdags// bgegs kyise maM dpung 'bar bar mthong // tshe yi thag pas bsrungs
395b1(rgyud 'grel): pani// dar ram g.yang mo lug gi sku// legs par bskal te sum sgril bya// bsnyen sngags bsgrub pa las sbyor sngags// stong rtsa brgyad la sogs pa bzlas// sngags de rdo rje lu gu brgyud// gser gyi kha dog 'bar ba la// yig
395b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'khril bar bsam// gus pa gsum la sku gsung thugs// sgoms te rab tu gnas par bya// gang bsrungs lus la btags pa yi// rdo rje ra ba'i nang zhugs pas// lag 'dren bgegs kyis mthong mi 'gyur// bla ma yi
395b3(rgyud 'grel): puphur bu bca' thubs ni// lcags sam seng ldeng sgeg po la// rab tshad khru gang yod pa la// rgyu 'dud gnyis dang bcung ba zhongs brgyad// dpal gsum rtsi me rno bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyi srog 'bru 'god// las sngags 'gul du rtag+sa
395b4(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// nag por mngar gsol la// gang bsrung de yi snga su gzugs// bgegs rnams skrag cing 'byer bar 'gyur// gal te 'tsho zhing nyod gyur na// zab mo dro ba 'bre gtsang sngags// dri bzang sman gyi legs bros te// rab gi nas
395b5(rgyud 'grel): rdul bzhin byas la gdags// zla gtor brgya rtsa mchag gtang // de yi khrag bcad bzhin du 'gro// aM na mo ma tI g+hA na saM tse'u d+he'u tar rdzo swAhA// chang lhag med pa rab tu gcas// tshur nas gting rag dus su bting // mying nyid tshwa
395b6(rgyud 'grel): mimer can gongadags// gdug pa can gyi gnod byang la/ dang po klud dang gtor ma sbyin// tshang ming bzhi yi ting 'dzin gyi// chos po shad bden par gdar bar bya// las ngan dbang gi sprog gyur no// drag sngags me yi 'khor lo 'di// /
396a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor sngags kyi sham bur gdags// dus bzhi drag tu gzir bar bya// oM ra khA/ ma hA ra khad+b+ha ka d+hA ki ni/ b+ha ra ma ra kha swa pre ta pra sa tsa ra ri/ ha ra hUM phaT swA hA/ a b+hi pa ga mU ra ya ra ka sa phaT swA hA/ gdug pa 'jil byed
396a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'god 'di// shra pa rings rab tu gsang // las ngan can gyi sri can la// mnan po'i las kyis 'dul 'dod na// kham pa'i bum pa gser pa gcig/ sa dkar chos kyis legs byug te// rgyal gsal dkor po gang gnod pa'i//
396a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma rtags la ling kha bca'// de yi snying gar yi gre tri// dri rgod yag pa'i khrag gi bri// ye shes lha yi nga rgyal dang // phyag rgya bzhi yi sngags kyi dgug/ lcags kyu lta bu'i 'od zer gyi// gang na gnas pa'i sa phyogs nas// drangs te
396a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med bstims par bya// sgrub pa zhag gsum par mi bya// ling ga bum+b+ha pAr bcug nas ni// de yi steng du dngul chu dang // dngul thal zangs dang ra gan dang // 'bras dang nas dang bra bo dang // yongasu bsngos te blug par bya// kham phor
396a5(rgyud 'grel): gsar bas khaM bcad lA// khaM rgyan shu dag nag pos bya// khang mgon po'i zhabs 'gra gram// mchod rten rnying pa'i 'og tu mnan// yat+ma na rgya gramya lam du// de yi gsang+ga sngags bstAn+na bA naM// i ka mi nai ra tsa swIhA/ ka ni rAk+ShA ni
396a6(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ taM b+ha ni phaT/ ma ha ni phaT/ dang po zhag gcig choso sbyong sngags// de nas man tra 'di nyid bzlas// gang gnod them bu bkag pa bzhin// 'gro 'gyur the tshom med pa yin// bsreg pa'i ling ga dpal 'bar la// mchod gtor
396b1(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga bshos zor gtor rnams// rim pa bzhin du gnasu gtang // rten gsum bca' ba'i man ngag ni// sku rten lugasu blugs pa dang // 'bur du gtong dang ris bris// tshad ldan bla mas rab gnas pa'o// gsung rten gsang sngags
396b2(rgyud 'grel): gser yig lA// thugs rten bde gshegs gdung la bya// las kyi bka' yi rten dag ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i skye dgra gcig/ g.yul lam pa tshan nang rma yi// skad cig tsam gyi srog gcad pa'i// dri rgod chu krog ma reg pa'i//
396b3(rgyud 'grel): tsit+ta 'bar ba gcig la bya// srog rtsa dbu mar ring bsrel gzhug/ g.yasu gsung rten gzhug par bya// g.yon du rin chen sna lde dang // dri bzang sman dang spos kyi gang // dar sna lnga yi dril byas te// rgyun par mchan khung g.yon par bcang //
396b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrubs pa'i dusu dkyil stengs gzhug/ de yi lus dang grib ma bzhin// 'phrin las rnam bzhi 'grub par 'gyur// gas dang gsad pa rnam gnyis 5/ mchog tu gas pa'i las l-i shis// bsad pa'i las mtha' gzhan du shes//
396b5(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi man ngag zab mo 'di// mu rgod sems can 'dul dka' rnams// chos 'dod slob dpon ma 'dod pas// gdam ngag thob nas bla ma spong // dam nyams lag tu shor ba srid// snod med rnams la gsang bar bya// sbyor ba dngos
396b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi 'jug gsum du// rtags 'di dag la yid rten bya// phyi rtags nang rtags gsang ba'i rtags// khros pa'i rtags dang bzhi ru bshad// phyi rtags bsnyen sgrub byed pa'i dus// dkyil las 'od dang me stag 'phros// sgrub
397a1(rgyud 'grel): khang thog tshig bya rnyog lding // bon pa nag po glu len cing // dar nag thogs nas 'phyar ba 'ong // nang rtags slob dpon chos 'chad cing // gdugs phub seng khrir sdod pa dang // phebs par smra ba
397a2(rgyud 'grel): dang lung ston dang // ban d+he mtshan ldan zas kyi gnod// byed par rmin lha nyi 'ong // gsang rtags mgon po rmi ba dang // dngos zhal ston gri gug dang // thod 'phreng cang te ka pa lar// rtse gsum zhags pa gter ba dang // stag seng
397a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa stong pa dang // shel ri mchod rten la 'dzeg cang // de la bskor ba byed pa dang // chas nor gter ston grub rtagaso// a tsa ra nag po 'khrugs byed dang // ral gri'i char pa 'beb pa dang // bya nag lug nag 'thab pa dang //
397a4(rgyud 'grel): bud med nag mo khro zhing sgeg/ mi sdug sna tshogs ston pa sogs// khros rtags yin bshags pa bya// dam rdzas dpung skyed bsnyen sgrubs la// brtson 'gros drag pos 'bad par bya// de ltar byas las 'grub ste// the tshom gnyis
397a5(rgyud 'grel): spang bar bya// chos skyong 'di yoM khyad par ni// 'khor la mi gnod rbad par 'gro// dkar po dang nag po klo bdud dang // btsan dang the'u rang rgyal po sogs// dkri bgegs rdul du rlog par byed// nag po chen po phyag drug pa'i
397a6(rgyud 'grel): sbubs thobs/ dpal sha wa ri dbang phyug gis zhal mngon sum gzigs nas mdzad pa rdzog s+ho// // bla ma rgyud pa ni/ dpal sha wa ri dbang phyug// rje mi tra pi/ a nan ta badz+ri/ a b+hi 'jug rta/ bla ma du gu pa/ las stong dkon mchog 'khor ro//
398a1(rgyud 'grel): mgon po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs sdus pa bram ze chen pos mdzad pa bzhugs
398b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ a hrIn+d+ha na ma hA ka la sA d+ha nA maHbod skad du/ nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// baM las
398b2(rgyud 'grel): pad ma nyi ma'i gdan stengs na// byi na ya ka brdul ba'i thog/ nag po chen po zhal gsum phyag drug pa// stag lpags dang ni rus pa'i rgyan gyis mdzes// sbrul chen rgyan dang ral pa thur stong pa'i ngab las
398b3(rgyud 'grel): du'aphyu mas/ srin po'i thod phreng rus pa nag po yi// thod pa rdulas gri gug gi sgo baphru las sa dbu la rab tu brgyan pa'o// g.yas dkar g.yon ni dmar zhing spyan gsum pa// khros pa'i so gtsigs
398b4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gtum pa'i mdog/ g.yas pa gri gug bar pa bskyung phreng ste// tha mas chos sgra Da ma ru// drag po khrol zhing gar stabs mdzad// g.yon pa thod pa dang ni mdung rtsi gsum// de bzhin zhags pas
398b5(rgyud 'grel): dgra bo 'dzin par byed// brkyang rkum gar thabs mdzad pa'i zhabs bzhi rol// mi bskyod byin gyis brlab cing rgyab tu ma hA ka la ni/ dmar nag g.yas pas gri gug 'dzin// g.yon pa thod khrag zhal
398b6(rgyud 'grel): durje bya// rus pa'i rgyun ldan gtsor bu mo// gar stabs keng rus gdan la bzhugs// mo che gtsigs spyan gsum khros pa'i zhal// gtso bo dang ni dus mnyam bskyed// las kyi lha mo bzhi po yis//
399a1(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa can kun 'gugs byed cing // bzung nas gcol stobs par byed// sngags kyi zlas pa de rjes btsal// oM shri badz+ra tsan d+ha ma hA kA la prA thi tha na ma ma
399a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngagasu bstan pa yin// I shri badz+ri tsAn d+ha ma hA ka l+yA dza li khro k+ShI tra big nan b+hi na yak+Sha hA ne hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ gtso 'khor nye snying sngags su bstan// oM ma hA ka li ni
399a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM Ta/ i ma hA ka li khr-i ta pa laM hUM hUM phyaT/ oM rad ni ta ki ra dzaM hUM/ oM ma hA kA lai ni sha druM ma ra ya hUM phaT/ 'khor gyi sngags su bstan+da pa yin// lha mnyes pa yi gtor ma ni// sha lA
399a4(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// ka pe la blugs byo ni brlabs te/ tsan dan shing la gtso 'khor rnams// de pes nAs rnal 'byor mdun du ni// sgra dang bcus pas byon pa la// gsang ba'i
399a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'dis dbul bar bya// au mau hwA ka la sha sa nan// a pa ka ri sha ra[:]shaM/ a pasa? tsi mA hU ka l-i paM ir+d+ha rod+b+ha tra ya a pa ka rI ni yu ta pra tI dza smA rA sau ta daM taM/ i dAM duSh+TaM kha
399a6(rgyud 'grel): khe hi kha hi/ mA re ma ra/ grih+Na gri h+na/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ di na mi ki na/ ma ra yo hUM hUM phaT phaT/ gtso 'khor gyos gsol bas sam// oM mai tsA
399b1(rgyud 'grel): krA lA sau sbyin tsa la nA na/ pu ra dza l-ing ni/ d+hakA rAn+d+ha b+hU d+hA krAn n+ti ra bAs wA ra d+hug+na kA tAk+Sha pA ma? kA ra d+hIb+hU sha na/ dA pa dI pI la d+hA madrA A pa lA sa ka kA la hA hU~M/ oM ya na sa nu
399b2(rgyud 'grel): kI nI na s+t+rai a naM dI a tse lu la e na sa ni pra nA wi saM n+du ra this spyan ma ma hA ka la d+hu hU~M phaT phaT swA hAsngags des legs par bstod pa'o// de ltar rtags dang ldan pa yis/
399b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i las las brtson par ni// sdug skye la shram b+hur gdag par bya// de nas gau snod pa'i les bye ba// gtse 'khor spyugs la ma rU ya// tha mas bstan pa shes par bya// sbyin
399b4(rgyud 'grel): sreg byas la mnan par bya// rab ched thod pa steng 'og la// gtso 'khor 'khor lo bris byas la// lte bar nag po'i ling ga bri// kha sbyar bar du ling gu gzhug/ re ros
399b5(rgyud 'grel): dr-I pA lA m+b+han nA pa bya// yod na dang dam 'brub khung du// man ngag bzhin du mnan par bya// gtor mas stong nas mnan la bzhag/ rtagaso byung skyes pa'i tsit+ti ru// ma hA
399b6(rgyud 'grel): ke li'i snying po dang // 'khor dang bdud rtsir bcas pa bzhug/ sku yi dril laM ngar nag gau tum// rang re mchin khung gdags par bya// skabs su lag pas gzung byas la/
400a1(rgyud 'grel): byasad pa'i sngags kun bzlas par bya// bdag gi nag po sgrub pa'i thabs// rang nyid byin gyis brlob pa 'di// rtsams pa'i dge ba'i gang yod pa//
400a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan mgon po'i zhal mthong shog/ nag po chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub thabs// sa ra ha sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi bla
400a3(rgyud 'grel): ma a te ya badz+ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba shangs pa tshul khrims mgon gyis bsgyur ba'o// / bkra shis//
400a4(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams stobs rgyus kyis mtshan mar gyur 'gro ba yis// tshe rabs du mar bsags pa'i sdig sgrib mye lus kun// dge 'dis dug lnga'i me lce chu yis
400a5(rgyud 'grel): bcil ba bzhin// ring min byang chub snying po'i go 'phang myur thob shog/ ces mi dbang po lta bas sgo gsum tshig dril gyi smon lam btab pa'o//
